GSP30abhiprvu:12: vṛttyā tātparyaṃ ṭīkayā tadvicāraḥ sūtreṣveteṣu granthakāreṇa dṛbdham /
GSP30abhiprvu:21: iha prameśvaraṃ prati yā iyaṃ kāyavāṅmanasāṃ tadekaviṣayatāniyojanālakṣaṇā prahvatā sā namaskārasya arthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:22: sā ca tathā kartum ucitā prāmāṇikasya bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:24: anyathā yuktim aparāmṛśataḥ aparamārthe 'pi namaskārodyatasya sāṃsārikajanamadhyapātitvameva / yathoktam @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:28: itarāpekṣayā tu katipayādhvottīrṇatayā samutkarṣo 'pi syāt / taduktam @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:36: na tu atra svātmīyaḥ puruṣakāraḥ ko 'pi nirvahati,
GSP30abhiprvu:37: sarvasya tasya māyāmayatvenāndhatamasaprakhyasyāmāyīyaṃ śuddhaprakāśaṃ svapratidvandvinaṃ prati upāyat/
GSP30abhiprvu:41: jayapadodīraṇe 'pi tādṛśasamutkarṣātiśayaśālini svātmānamaprahvīkurvāṇasya taṭasthasya paramanātmopakāritvam iti samutkarṣaviśeṣākṣipta eva namaskāro 'vaśyamabhyantarīkāryaḥ,
GSP30abhiprvu:42: ityanayā yuktyā jaya-namaskāraikataraprakrame anyatarasya arthākṣiptatā avaśyamaṅgīkartavyā /
GSP30abhiprvu:52: abhiprāyeṇa prasiddhajaya-namaḥ prabhṛtiśabdaśaṭyānāśleṣeṇa imāṃ saraṇim anusarasi sma granthakāraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:55: tatra tu upāyopeyabhāvaprabhṛtiḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'pi yathāprakāśaṃ paramārthabhūta eva,
GSP30abhiprvu:62: ityantam / tatra tu kāryakāraṇabhāve 'pi kvacit paripūrṇasvātantryalakṣaṇamāheśvaryanāntarīyakatākroḍīkṛtānantaśakticakracumbitabhāvabhāvitaprathāntaravyacadhānaṃ cakāsti ;
GSP30abhiprvu:68: eṣa ca anugrahalakṣaṇo 'ntyaḥ pañcamaḥ pārameśvaraḥ kṛtyaviśeṣaḥ parapuruṣārthaprāpakaḥ,
GSP30abhiprvu:71: na sarvata iti niḥśreyasābhāsa iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:76: iti / 'āsādya'; iti ā samantāt paripūrṇarūpatayā sādayitvā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:78: iyatā viditavedyatvena parārthe śāstrakaraṇe adhikāro darśitaḥ ;
GSP30abhiprvu:81: anyathā tu āsādanatāratamyaprāptau māyīyamalakalāpasaṃskāraprakṣaye kathaṃ paropadeśaḥ śakyakriyaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:85: te tu yadīyaiśvaryavipruḍbhirīśvarībhūtāḥ sa bhagavān anavacchinnaprakāśānandarūpasvātantryaparamārtho maheśvaraḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:88: dīyate asmai svāminā sarvaṃ yathābhilaṣitam iti dāsaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:92: ityanena adhikāriviṣayo nātra kaścinniyama iti darśayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:93: yasya yasya hi idaṃ svarūpaprathanaṃ tasya tasya mahāphalam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:104: karaṇena nāsti kṛtyaṃ kvāpi bhāvanayāpi vā /
GSP30abhiprvu:107: iti / janasya anavaratajananamaraṇapīḍitasya ityanena kṛpāspadatayā upakaraṇīyatvamāha /
GSP30abhiprvu:108: apiśabdaḥ svātmanaḥ tadabhinnatām āviṣkurvan pūrṇatvena svātmani parārthasaṃpattyatiriktaprayojanāntarāvakāśaṃ parākaroti /
GSP30abhiprvu:110: na hi ayaṃ daivaśāpaḥ svārtha eva prayojanaṃ na parārtha iti ;
GSP30abhiprvu:112: saṃpādyatvena abhisaṃhitaṃ yat mukhyatayā tata eva kriyāsu prayojakaṃ tatprayojanam /
GSP30abhiprvu:113: ata eva bhedāde 'pi īśvarasya sṛṣṭyādikaraṇe parārtha eva prayojanam iti darśayituṃ nyāyanirmāṇavedhasā nirūpitam @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:116: iti / icchan iti icchāviṣayīkṛtasya phalasya pravṛtto hetutvaṃ śatrā darśayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:117: icchāśaktiśca uttarottaram ucchūnasvabhāvatayā kriyāśaktiparyantībhavati ---- iti darśayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:121: parameśvaratālābhe hi samastāḥ saṃpadaḥ tanniḥṣyandamayyaḥ saṃpannā eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:131: samastasya bhāvābhāvarūpasya bāhyābhyantarasya nīlasukhādeḥ yā saṃpat saṃpattiḥ siddhiḥ tathātvaprakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:144: iti / iyatā ca upāye atidurghaṭatvāśaṅkā parākṛtā /
GSP30abhiprvu:148: iti / tamya maheśvarasya pratyabhijñā pratīpamātmābhimukhyena jñānaṃ prakāśaḥ pratyabhijñā /
GSP30abhiprvu:149: pratīpam iti ---- svātmāvabhāso hi na ananubhūtapūrvo'vicchinnaprakāśatvāt tasya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:150: sa tu tacchaktyaiva vicchinna iva vikalpita iva lakṣyate ---- iti vakṣyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:152: sa evāyaṃ caitra ---- iti pratisaṃdhānena abhimukhībhūte vastuni jñānam ;
GSP30abhiprvu:153: loke'pi etatputra evaṃguṇa evaṃrūpaka ityevaṃ vā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:154: antato'pi sāmānyātmanā vā jñātasya punarabhimukhībhāvāvasare pratisaṃdhiprāṇitameva jñānaṃ pratyabhijñā ---- iti vyavahriyate ;
GSP30abhiprvu:156: ihāpi prasiddhapurāṇasiddhāntāgamānumānādividitapūrṇaśaktisvabhāve īśvare sati svātmanyabhimukhībhūte tatpratisaṃdhānena jñānam udeti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:164: pratyabhijñopapattau svaparavibhāgābhāve tadapekṣaṃ kartrabhiprāyādi asaṃbhāvyam iti parasmaipadaprayogaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:171: iyati ca vyākhyāne vṛttikṛtā bharo na kṛtaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:175: iti / ṭīkākāreṇāpi vṛttimātraṃ vyākhyātumudyatena nedaṃ spṛṣṭam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:176: asmākaṃ tu sūtravyākhyāna eva udyama -- iti vibhajya vyākhyātam /
GSP30abhiprvu:184: tathā hi ---- samastasaṃpallakṣaṇo vyākhyāto yo'rthaḥ pūrvaṃ puṇyapāpādau saṃsāramūlakāraṇe hetuḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:185: sa eva pratyabhijñāyate anayā ---- iti karaṇavyutpattyā upāyaḥ iha lokottaramārgaṃ prati nirṇītaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:188: iti śākhānte nirūpayiṣyamāṇaṃ sūcayatā upāyaḥ darśitaḥ abhidheyatvena / ata eva
GSP30abhiprvu:199: pahlepsavo ye punaratra teṣāṃ mūḍhā sthitiḥ syādanavasthayaiva //}
GSP30abhiprvu:211: iti / evaṃ pratyabhijñātavyasamastavastusaṃgrahaṇena idaṃ vākyamuddeśarūpaṃ pratijñāpiṇḍātmakaṃ ca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:214: iti ca antyaśloko nigamanagranthaḥ -- ityevaṃ pañcāvayavātmakamidaṃ śāstraṃ paravyutpattiphalam /
GSP30abhiprvu:217: ityādiṣu uddeśeṣu prakaṭībhaviṣyati -- iti tāvad granthasya tātparyam sujanaśca laukikeśvaraparicita īśvaraviṣaye janam anujīviguṇasaṃpannaṃ prakāśayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:218: janaviṣaye ca abhigāmikādiguṇasaṃpannam īśvaraṃ prakāśayati - iti
GSP30abhiprvu:219: iyānarthaḥ sāmānyena ṣaṣṭhosamāsena darśitaḥ tasya pratyabhijñā iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:220: etacchlokākarṇanasamaye ca śiṣyāṇām etadarthasaṃkramaṇakrameṇa parameśvaratādātmyameva upajāyate tāvat /
GSP30abhiprvu:221: tathā hi ---- janasya ityākarṇanāt vayaṃ te jananamaraṇapīḍitā aparyupastavṛttayaśca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:226: itītthameva hi adhikāriṇi śāstrārthasya bimbapratibimbavat saṃkrāntiḥ loḍliṅādīnāṃ viṣayībhavati prathamapuruṣārtha uttamapuruṣārthe paryasyati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:229: ārogyakāmāḥ śivāṃ sevantāṃ sevadhvam ---- iti vā vākyārthasya sevāmahai -- ityevaṃrūpeṇa adhikāriṇi dvitīyā kakṣyā saṃkrāntau ,
GSP30abhiprvu:230: tṛṭīyakakṣyāmeva bhāvikoṭipatitāmapi puruṣārthasaṃpattim akālakalitasvarūpānupraveśena svātmīkṛtām abhimanyamāne ,
GSP30abhiprvu:232: anyasya tu anevaṃrūpatvenaiva anadhikāritā tāṭasthyaprāṇā ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:233: tadāstām avāntarametat atigahanaṃ ca ---- iti sthitametat /
GSP30abhiprvu:234: etena ślokena īśvarasāṃmukhyaṃ vineyānāṃ prayojanādipratipādanaṃ ca kriyate ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:236: upoddhātāyate yasya taṃ stumaḥ sarvadā śivam //} //1//
GSP30abhiprvu:247: svaprakāśe'pi vā īśvare pramātḥṇāṃ kiṃ vṛttaṃ yena teṣāṃ pramāṇavyāpārānupayoga ityāśaṅkyāha @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:250: ajaḍātmā niṣedhaṃ vā siddhiṃ vā vidadhīta kaḥ // Ipk_1,1.2 //
GSP30abhiprvu:251: iha ka īśvare kīdṛśe kīdṛśena pramāṇena asti iti jñānalakṣaṇāṃ siddhim ,
GSP30abhiprvu:253: pramātā iti cet , sa eva kaḥ ?
GSP30abhiprvu:254: dehādirjaḍaḥ uta tadanyo vā kaścit ātmādiśabdavācyaḥ ?
GSP30abhiprvu:257: sa eva svātmani asiddhaḥ paratra kāṃ siddhiṃ kuryāt ?
GSP30abhiprvu:263: bheditānāṃ ca antaranusaṃdhānena abhedanaṃ na syāt ;
GSP30abhiprvu:265: bheditānāṃ ca antaranusaṃdhānena abhedanaṃ na syāt ;
GSP30abhiprvu:268: kartṛjñātṛsvabhāvam iti cet nanu sa pramātaiva tathābhūtaḥ iti ko'nyaḥ saḥ ?
GSP30abhiprvu:270: na khalu sarvaśabdārtho jñātṛkartṛtvayoḥ svarūpaṃ bhinatti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:274: prakāśamānasvabhāvatve viṣayo'pi sarvātmanā prakāśa eva nimagna iti prakāśaḥ prakāśate ---- ityetāvanmātraparamārthatve kaḥ sarvajñāsarvajñavibhāgaḥ ?
GSP30abhiprvu:277: tasmāt viṣayābhimataṃ vastu śarīratayā gṛhītvā tāvat nirbhāsamāna ātmaiva prakāśate vicchedaśūnyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:285: bhedite ca antaranusaṃdhānena abhedanam ---- iti bahuprakāraṃ vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:286: etadeva asya pārameśvaryaṃ mukhyamānandamayaṃ rūpam ---- iti pūrvamupāttaṃ kartari iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:287: tadeva tu svātantryaṃ vibhajya vaktuṃ jñātari iti pañcānnirdiṣṭam /
GSP30abhiprvu:289: tena sarvakriyāsvatantre sarvaśaktike ---- iti yāvad uktaṃ bhavet tāvadeva kartari jñātari iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:291: saṃviditi tu ucyamānā vikalpyatvena prameyatāṃ spṛśanto sṛṣṭatvāt na paramārthasaṃvit ---- iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:292: kartā jñātā ca maheśvara ---- ityabhidhāne'pi sa eva prakāra āpatet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:293: iti yathā yathā prameyabhūmikāpādananyakkārakalaṅkaparihāraḥ śakyaḥ tathā tathā yāvadgati yatitavyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:295: upadeśāvasare hi sarvātmanā tāvat sā prameyatā asya parihartum aśakyā /
GSP30abhiprvu:304: yasya tu vaiśeṣikāderjaḍa ātmā sa siddhiṃ karotu īśvaraviṣayām ;
GSP30abhiprvu:306: sāṃkhyo'pi viṣayāvabhāsanarūpaṃ jñānaṃ buddhidharmamicchan ātmānaṃ vastuto jaḍameva upaiti ;
GSP30abhiprvu:307: na ca jaḍātmā svātmanyapi durlabhaprakāśasvātantryaleśaḥ kiṃcit sādhayituṃ niṣeddhuṃ vā prabhaviṣṇuḥ pāṣāṇa iva ;
GSP30abhiprvu:309: tathā hi ---- sa svātmani siddhimitthaṃ kuryāt ---- yadi asya so'bhinavatvena bhāsamānaḥ pūrvaṃ na bhāsate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:311: niṣedhaṃ ca itthaṃ vidadhyāt ---- yadi sa na prakāśate tathā ca jaḍaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:312: na ca jaḍasya etat yuktam ityuktam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:317: tat na tatra kārakavyāpāravat pramāṇavyāpāro'pi nityatvavat svaprakāśatvasyāpi tatra bhāvāt //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:318: nanu kārakavyāpāraḥ pramāṇavyāpāraśca yadi īśvare na saṃbhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:319: tarhi pratyabhijñāpayāmi ---- iti yo vyāpāra uktaḥ sa katamo vyāpāraḥ @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:326: tatra ca asya svātantryam iti na kenacidvapuṣā na prakāśate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:328: tatrāpi prakāśātmani sarvathā prakāśātmanā prakāśo bhāgaśo vā ;
GSP30abhiprvu:329: bhāgaśaḥ prakāśane sarvasya vyatirekeṇa avyatirekeṇa vā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:336: saiva bhagavato māyā vimohinī nāma śaktiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:337: tadvaśāt prakāśātmatayā satatam avabhāsamāne'pi ātmani bhāgena aprakāśanavaśād anupalakṣite sarvathā hṛdayaṃgamībhāvamaprāpte ata eva pūrṇatāvabhāsanasādhyām arthakriyām akurvati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:346: iti / etaduktaṃ bhavati ---- na kārakavyāpāro bhagavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:350: ghaṭo'yamagragaḥ pratyakṣatvāt ---- ityanena hi ghaṭo na jñāpyate pratyakṣeṇaiva prakāśamānatvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:355: na tu adhikaṃ kiṃcit ---- ityuktaṃ vakṣyate ca //3//
GSP30abhiprvu:356: nanu paridṛśyamāne bhāvarāśau kimīyā śaktirāviṣkriyate kaṃ ca prati iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:359: tathā ca ratho gacchati ---- ityādau upacāraṃ kecana pratipannāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:362: tarhi sarvasya svātmā maheśvara ---- iti dūrataraṃ viprakarṣitā pratyāśā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:366: jñānaṃ kriyā ca bhūtānāṃ jīvatāṃ jīvanaṃ matam // Ipk_1,1.4 //
GSP30abhiprvu:373: tata eva smaryamāṇena granthena varṇayiṣyamāṇena prakāreṇa yasmāt sarvametad yuktam iti tathā hi iti śabdasya vārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:374: iha tāvat bhāvarāśiryathā vimṛśyate tathā asti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:375: astitvasya prakāśaṃ śaraṇīkurvataḥ prakāśaprāṇitadeśīyaṃ āśritya samunmevāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:376: avimṛṣṭaṃ hi yadi vastu tanna nīlaṃ na pītaṃ na sat na asaditi kuta iti paryanuyoge kimuttaraṃ syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:377: tena yad yathā yāvat avādhitaṃ vimṛśyate tat tathā tāvat asti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:378: tat eva deśakālākāravitatātmāno 'pi dravyakriyāsaṃbandhādayaḥ ekatvena paramārthasanta iti vakṣyate
GSP30abhiprvu:380: ityādinā , tataśca vitatamapi idaṃ viśvaṃ saṃkṣepavimarśadaśādhirohe jaḍaṃ jīvacca ---- ityetāvatā dvayarūpeṇa asti /
GSP30abhiprvu:381: tatra jaḍā vimṛśyamānā na svatantrā bhavanti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:382: vimṛśyamānatā hi teṣāṃ na svaśarīraviśrāntaḥ ko 'pi dharmaḥ jaḍatvābhāvaprasaṃgāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:383: mama nīlaṃ bhāti mayā nīlaṃ jñāyate iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:384: teṣām jaḍabhūtānāṃ cinmayatve 'pi māyākhyayā īśvaraśaktyā jāḍyaṃ prāpitānām ,
GSP30abhiprvu:386: tato jaḍā nāma na pṛthak santi /
GSP30abhiprvu:391: iti / sa eva hi svātmanā san vaktavyo yasya anyānupahitaṃ rūpaṃ cakāsti ;
GSP30abhiprvu:392: na ca bhārūpānupahitaṃ jaḍaṃ nāma kiñcit ,
GSP30abhiprvu:393: tena jaḍānāṃ hi śaktirāviṣkriyate jaḍānprati ---- ityetat tāvat nirutthānameva /
GSP30abhiprvu:394: ye tu anye jaḍebhyo jīvanta ---- iti nāma prasiddhāḥ teṣāmapi śarīraprāṇapuryaṣṭakaśūnyākārāḥ tāvat jaḍā eva iti teṣāmapi kimucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:396: avarūpaṃ yallagnaṃ bhāti tadeva jīvarūpabhūtaṃ satyam ;
GSP30abhiprvu:397: tasya ca āpāte yadyapi bahutvaṃ bhāti tathāpi tat jaḍātmakavedyaśarīrādyupādheḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:399: jīvā hi jaḍabhedāt bhedabhāginaḥ jaḍāśca jīvabhedāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:403: tadayaṃ jīvānāmabheda eva saṃpanna iti jīvan pramātā ---- iti jātam /
GSP30abhiprvu:405: yo hi jānāti ca karoti ca sa jīvati ---- ityucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:406: tadayaṃ pramātā jñānakriyāśaktiyogād īśvara ---- iti vyavahartavayaḥ purāṇāgamādiprasiddheśvaravat ;
GSP30abhiprvu:408: tadapi ca kalpiteśvare rājādau tathā vyāptigrahaṇāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:409: yo yāvati jñātā kartā ca sa tāvati īśvarp rājeva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:411: ātmā ca viśvatra jñātā kartā ca ---- iti siddhā pratyabhijñā /
GSP30abhiprvu:416: anye ca jīvanta ---- ityāpāte tāvad bhāti na tu saṃvidāpāte bhātīti jīvatāmiti jaṅgamā eva amī itthaṃ nirdiṣṭāḥ //4//
GSP30abhiprvu:417: nanu jñānakriye eva kathaṃ siddhe yata aiśvaryavyavahāraḥ prasādhyate ---- iti śaṅkāṃ śamayitumāha @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:419: tatra jñānaṃ svataḥ siddhaṃ kriyā kāyāśritā satī /
GSP30abhiprvu:422: mayā jñātaṃ jñāsyate ca ---- ityevaṃ svaprakāśāhaṃparāmarśapariniṣṭhitameva idaṃ jñānaṃ nāma ,
GSP30abhiprvu:432: yena śuklāderguṇāt atyantajaḍāt jānāmi ---- iti ---- vapuḥ citsvabhāvatām abhyetiḥ ;
GSP30abhiprvu:436: iti / tena āntarī kriyāśaktiḥ jñānavadeva svataḥ siddhā svaprakāśā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:438: prāṇapuryaṣṭakakrameṇa śarīramapi saṃcaramāṇā spandanarūpā satī vyāpārātmikā māthāpade 'pi pramāṇasya pratyakṣāderviṣayaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:439: sā ca paraśarīrādisāhityena avagatā svaṃ svabhāvaṃ jñātmakamavagamayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:442: na ca anyadvastu anyena vapuṣā bhātaṃ bhātaṃ bhavet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:444: bhāti ca yat tadeva ahamityasya vapuḥ iti parajñānamapi svātmaivaḥ ;
GSP30abhiprvu:446: sa cāpi vicārito yāvat na anya iti viśvaḥ pramātṛvargaḥ paramārthata ekaḥ pramātā sa eva ca asti / taduktam @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:449: iti / tataśca bhagavān sadāśivo jānāti ityataḥ prabhṛti krimirapi jānāti ---- ityantam eka eva pramātā iti phalataḥ sarvajñatvaṃ pramātuḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:454: sadāśivātmanā vedmi sa vā vetti madātmanā //
GSP30abhiprvu:456: ityādi / ūhyate ityanena jñānena jñānasya prameyatvaṃ na nirvahati ---- iti darśayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:458: tadevaṃ yeṣāṃ tārkikapravādapāṃsupātadhūsarībhāvo na vṛtto 'smin saṃvedanapathe ,
GSP30abhiprvu:459: te iyataiva ātmānamīśvaraṃ vidvāṃso ghaṭaśarīraprāṇasukhatadabhāvān tatraiva nimajjayanta īśvarasamāviṣṭā eva bhavanti /
GSP30abhiprvu:461: upa iti ātmanaḥ samīpe ṭaṅkavat īśvarapratyabhijñānalakṣaṇa utkarṣo hanyate viśrāmyate yena ;
GSP30abhiprvu:462: etāvadeva ca asya granthasya tātparyam ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:464: upāṃśu avitataṃ kṛtvā uditi śāstrasya ūrdhva eva hanyate apasāryate prameyaviṣayo vyāmoho yena ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:467: kecittu gatiṃ striyaṃ gacchati ---- ityetadviṣayameva hantyarthamāhuḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:470: iti śrīmadācāryotpaladevaśiṣya ---- śrīmadācāryalakṣmaṇaguptadattopadeśa ---- śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptaviracitāyāṃ śrīpratyabhijñāvimarśinyāṃ jñānādhikāre upoddhātaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:476: iha yat paramārtharūpaṃ āśaṅkyamānapratipakṣapratikṣepeṇa nirūpayiṣyamāṇaṃ suṣṭhutamāṃ spaṣṭokṛtaṃ bhavati /
GSP30abhiprvu:480: jñānānandaṃ ca nirdvandvaṃ deva vṛtvā vivṛṇvate //}
GSP30abhiprvu:481: tatreha anātmānīśvaravādināṃ bhrāntibhedanapūrvakaṃ paramārthaṃ vivarīṣyan tadudbhāvanaṃ tāvat ekādaśabhiḥ ślokaiḥ karoti
GSP30abhiprvu:485: ityantaiḥ / tatra ślokadvayena ātmano dhruvasya dṛśyānupalabdhyā abhāva uktaḥ pratyakṣātmavādinaḥ prati /
GSP30abhiprvu:486: tatra ślokatrayeṇa smṛtyanusaṃdhānaṃ saṃskārāt siddham iti anyabāsiddhatvāt ātmānumānāya na paryāptam ---- iti proktam anumeyātmavādinaḥ prati /
GSP30abhiprvu:487: tatra ślokena jñānādi guṇairguṇini pratipattiḥ ---- iti anumānaṃ nirastam /
GSP30abhiprvu:489: tato jñānakriyāśaktisaṃbandharūpamaiśvarya nirākartuṃ jñānasya svarūpameva vyatiriktaṃ vādyantaramate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:490: sāṃkhyamate ca ayujyamānam ---- iti nirūpitaṃ ślokadvayena /
GSP30abhiprvu:491: tata ekena kriyā nāma na kācit kvacidapi asti ---- iti kathitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:492: tatra sādhakaṃ pratikṣipya bādhakaṃ ca upanyasyati /
GSP30abhiprvu:493: tataḥ saṃbandhasya ślokena nāstitvaṃ pratipāditaṃ pramāṇābhāvaṃ vadatā /
GSP30abhiprvu:495: na ātmā sthiro nāpi jñātṛtvakartṛtvalakṣaṇam asya aiśvaryam ---- iti svapakṣa upasaṃhṛtaḥ ---- iti pūrvapakṣasya piṇḍārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:498: sābhilāpaṃ vikalpākhyaṃ bahudhā nāpi tad dvayam // Ipk_1,2.1 //
GSP30abhiprvu:502: iha ātmā saṃvitsvabhāvaḥ sthiraḥ iti tāvadayuktam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:504: tathā hi ---- ghaṭaprakāśo ghaṭavikalpo ghaṭapratyabhijñā ghaṭasmṛtiḥ ghaṭotprekṣā ---- ityādirūpeṇa jñānānyeva prakāśante bhinnakāntāni bhinnaviṣayāṇi bhinnakārāṇi ca /
GSP30abhiprvu:505: tatra nīlasya prakāśaḥ svalakṣaṇābhāsaṃ jñānam svam anyānanuyāyi svarūpasaṃkocabhāji ,
GSP30abhiprvu:506: lakṣaṇam deśakālākārarūpaṃ yasya ābhāsaḥ prakāśanam antarmukhaṃ yasmin bahirmukhīnasvarūpadhāriṇi jñāne tat avikalpakam viṣayabhede 'pi ekajātīyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:516: sarvasya vikalpasya sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā nirvikalpakamūlatvāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:517: param iti ca anyarūpaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tasya viṣayaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:523: yatastat abhilāpena saṃjalpātmanā śabdarūpeṇa saha vartate /
GSP30abhiprvu:528: idaṃ vā idam ---- ityādi bahudhā bhidyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:530: api tu tasya vikalpasya svarūpameva vicitrokurvat pratibhāti iti vikalpo bahubhedaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:532: syādetat , yallagnāsau paramparā so'pi ābhāti ---- iti ; tatra ,
GSP30abhiprvu:533: yato dvayamapi etad avikalpetararūpaṃ na anyasya kasyacit etadatiriktasya draṣṭuḥ anubhavituḥ saṃbandhi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:538: nanu astyeva avabhāsaḥ ---- iti asiddhā dṛśyānupalabdhiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:541: smarāmi idam ---- iti vidādiprakṛtyartharūpāt jñānasmṛtyādeḥ idam ---- iti ca karmarūpāt viṣayāt atiriktameva aham ---- iti anuyāyini prakāśe anuyāyirūpaṃ bhāti /
GSP30abhiprvu:556: etaduktaṃ bhavati ---- ahaṃpratītireva tāvat na ātmā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:560: tathāpi saṃvitsaṃvedyavyatiriktasya ātmano na siddhiḥ ---- ityetat apiśabdena dyotitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:561: evaṃ nāsti ātmā saṃvitsaṃvedyatryatirikto dṛśyasya tasyānupalabdheḥ ---- iti // 1// //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:566: kathaṃ bhavenna nityaḥ syādātmā yadyanubhāvakaḥ // Ipk_1,2.3 //
GSP30abhiprvu:571: tathā hi ---- smṛtau na arthasya prakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:579: tadā tatprakāśarūpā kathaṃ smṛtistaddvāreṇa arthaviṣayā syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:580: tayā ca sarvo vyavahāraḥ kriyamāṇo dṛṣṭaḥ ityasau svarūpeṇa anapahnavanīyā satī anubhavasya nāśe kiṃcit avinaṣṭam āvedayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:584: tattu na adhikam ihaiva unmīlitam ācāryeṇa ,
GSP30abhiprvu:585: vaktavyaśeṣavivakṣayā pūrvapakṣo mā tāvat samāpat ityāśayena /
GSP30abhiprvu:588: anubhavaśca dhvastaḥ iti na kenacitprakāreṇa smṛtiḥ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:589: tadabhāve ca saṃketaśabdasmṛtyāyattā api astaṅgatāḥ sarve vikalpāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:590: nirvikalpaṃ ca andhabadhiramūkaprāyam iti hanta nirākrandam avasīdet viśvam ---- iti //3//
GSP30abhiprvu:591: iha kāryātirekeṇa tādṛk kalpanīyaṃ yat kāryasiddhaye paryāpnoti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:597: etadapi hi vaktavyam ---- ākāśamapi asti ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:598: atha ucyate ---- na kevalena ātmanā etat siddhyati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:599: api tu anubhavasaṃskāro 'pi atra upayogī ---- iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:605: dṛṣṭeṣu anubhūteṣu vastuṣu yā smṛtiḥ tasyām anubhavo dṛgātmā dvāram arthāśasparśe ,
GSP30abhiprvu:607: tasya hi anāśe idam ---- ityeṣa eva atruṭitaḥ prakāśaḥ iti kā smṛtiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:609: yatraiva viṣaye anubhavo vṛttaḥ tadeva tasyāḥ smṛteḥ padaṃ smaryamāṇam /
GSP30abhiprvu:612: nanu jñānāntarasya viṣayeṇa kathaṃ tasyāḥ viṣayitvābhimānaḥ ---- ityāśaṅkyāha @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:619: tena atrāpi saṃskāraḥ tāṃ smṛtiṃ pūrvānubhavānukāriṇīṃ karoti ---- iti tadviṣaya eva smṛterviṣayaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:620: evaṃ tarhi antargaḍuḥ yathā āyāsāya param ,
GSP30abhiprvu:621: tadvat ātmā sthiraḥ kalpanāyāsamātraphalaḥ iti kiṃ tena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:622: sarvaṃ hi saṃskāreṇa jagadvyavahārakuṭumbakaṃ kṛtakarāvalambam ---- iti //5//
GSP30abhiprvu:625: ya āśrayaḥ sa ātmā syāt ---- ityāśaṅkyāha @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:631: sa tarhi avyatiriktaḥ iti na nityaḥ syāt ;
GSP30abhiprvu:635: tarhi na vyatirikto 'sau iti punarapi anitye jñāne saṃskāraḥ ---- ityāyātam /
GSP30abhiprvu:636: anubhavādviśiṣṭaṃ viśiṣṭasmrṭyākhyakāryakāri jñānaṃ paramparayā jāyate ---- iti iyāneva saṃskārārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:641: etadāha ---- tataḥ iti ātmano bhinneṣu dharmeṣu aṅgīkriyamāṇeṣu teṣu satsvapi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:642: ātmanaḥ svarūpe viśeṣābhāvāt sa tāvat ātmā smrṭau na vyāpriyeta ,
GSP30abhiprvu:644: anapāyāt , iti saṃskārādeva smṛteḥ siddhiḥ ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:645: ahaṃ smarāmi ---- iti yaḥ smartā so'pi śarīrasaṃtāno jñānasaṃtānaśca adhyāvasīyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:650: iti / evam ātmani sādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca parākṛtam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:660: jñānaṃ ca citsvarūpaṃ cet tad anityaṃ kimātmavat /
GSP30abhiprvu:662: parābhyupagamena prasaṅgāpādanam etat pūrvapakṣavādī karoti ---- prasaṅgaviparyayalābho me bhaviṣyati ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:663: tatra ātmavādī nityatvam ātmana itthaṃ brūte ---- iha kālo nāma idaṃbhāvaviśiṣṭasya viśeṣaṇatām avalambamānaḥ taṃ viśiṣṭīkurvan tatsaṃkocāt anityaṃ saṃpādayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:664: ātmanaśca citsvabhāvatvāt idam ---- iti prathanābhāvena viśeṣyatvaṃ nāsti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:667: sa itthaṃ bruvāṇaḥ paryanuyujyate ---- jñānamapi tarhi svaprakāśam iti tatrāpi eṣaiva vārtā iti tadapi kasmāt na nityam ?
GSP30abhiprvu:670: tata ātmano jñānaṃ śaktiḥ iti avasannam adaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:671: atha na svaprakāśaṃ jñānaṃ tarhi parasyāpi ado na prakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:672: svaprakāśarūpāveśanaṃ hi asau parasya vidadhat bodhaḥ prakāśo bhavati parasyāpi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:673: tataḥ svaprakāśatāśūnyo na asau arthasya prakāśaḥ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:675: jaḍo'pyasau ittham arthasya prakāśo bhaviṣyati ---- iti sāṃkhyamatam āśaṅkate @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:683: na kaṃcitprati vā iti sarvajñam ajñaṃ vā jagat syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:686: tat nūnam anyatraiva ayaṃ dharmaḥ tattvāntare ,
GSP30abhiprvu:687: tatrāpi katham arthasya prakāśaḥ syāt iti nūnaṃ tatra tattvāntare so'rthaḥ pratibimbatvena upasaṃkrāmati /
GSP30abhiprvu:688: tat tattvāntaraṃ sattvaprādhānyāt pratibimbagrahayogyaṃ tamasā''cchāditatvāt sakalapratibimbanato vyāvartitam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:689: bhāge rajasā tamaso'pasāraṇāt kiṃcideva pratibimbakaṃ gṛhyāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:692: evam arthasya tāvat rūpaṃ buddhiḥ dhārayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:693: iyaśca sattvādīnāṃ sukhaduḥkhamoharūpatayāṃ bhogyatvāt jaḍam iti darpakṣavat aprakāśam /
GSP30abhiprvu:694: na ca bhogyasya aprakāśasya tadviruddhabhoktṛtārūpaprakāśātmakasvabhāvasaṃbhavo yuktyanupātī iti tadvilakṣaṇena bhoktrā bhavitavyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:696: svabhāvāntaraṃ hi aprakāśarūpaṃ bhogyaṃ kathaṃ bhoktuḥ svabhāvatayā saṃbhāvyeta /
GSP30abhiprvu:697: sa ca prakāśamātrasvabhāvatvenaiva yadi viśvasya prakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:699: ghaṭaprakāśo'pi paṭaprakāśaḥ syāt iti viśvaṃ saṃkīryeta /
GSP30abhiprvu:700: sa ca arthāt arthapratibimbāt tadādhārācca buddhitattvāt anyaḥ katham arthasya prakāśaḥ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:703: tataḥ prakāśapratibimbaparigrahamahimopanataprakāśāveśabuddhitattvāveśitapratibimbakanīlādyarthaparyantasaṃkrānteḥ prakāśāveśasya arthaḥ prakāśate iti siddho vyavahāraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:704: tadevaṃ jñānaṃ jaḍabuddhitattvāvyatirekāt jaḍamapi citpratibimbayogāt viṣayasya prakāśaḥ ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:705: etadeva tāvat anucitam ---- yat prakāśātmā pumān buddhau pratibimbam arpayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:709: ātmāpekṣayā ca na buddhirvimalā tat bahvatu tāvat etat ---- iti atha śabdena sūcayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:710: kiṃtu pratibimbavādenāpi na kiṃcit pratisamāhitaṃ bhavet ---- iti darśayati @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:713: caitanyapratibimbayoge yadi tāvat tatpratibimbakamapi mukhyaṃ prakāśarūpameva na bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:715: na hi pratibimbatavahnipuñja ādarśo dāhyaṃ dahet /
GSP30abhiprvu:717: tat tarhi buddheravyatiriktam iti mukhyaprakāśarūpaiva buddhirjātā iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:719: sa eva punaḥ jājvalyamānaṃ nijam ojo jṛmbhayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:722: evam arthapratibimbakadvāreṇa arthamayī ---- ityapi āyāto vijñānavādaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:729: yasya jñānaṃ nāma śaktiḥ syāt iti jñānamātrameva asti /
GSP30abhiprvu:730: yo 'rthaprakāśarūpo bodho yaśca vikalpasmṛtyādirūpaḥ tāvatā arthavyavahārasiddheḥ ---- iti prasaṅgaviparyayalābhaḥ jñānaṃ ca citsvarūpaṃ cet ityādeḥ ślokadvayasya tātparyam //8//
GSP30abhiprvu:738: tatra gṛhaseśagatadevadattasvarūpāt anantaraṃ bāhyadeśavartidevadattasvarūpam ---- ityetāvat upalabhyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:739: na tu tatsvarūpātiriktāṃ kāṃcit anyāṃ kriyāṃ pratīmaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:740: devadatto dinaṃ tiṣṭhati ityatra tu prabhātakālāviṣṭadevadattasvarūpaṃ tataḥ praharakālāliṅgitatatsvarūpam ---- ityādi bhāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:741: dugdhaṃ pariṇamate ityatra madhuravasturūpam amlavasturūpam dravarūpaṃ kaṭhinarūpam ---- ityādi /
GSP30abhiprvu:742: evaṃ sādṛśyācca tatra pratyabhijñā bhinne'pi kāyakeśanasvādāviva /
GSP30abhiprvu:747: tathāpi sthūladṛṣṭyā asti bhedaḥ iti te hi bhedena bauddhairucyante ---- iti tātparyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:748: evaṃ pratyakṣeṇa na dṛśyate kacit kriyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:750: kāryaṃ ca prāmaprāptyādyuttarakṣaṇarūpaṃ taddeśavasturūpādi iti kāryānyathānupapattyāpi na sā kalpyā /
GSP30abhiprvu:751: evaṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ tasyā adṛṣṭiḥ ---- iti sādhakapramāṇābhāva uktaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:756: na tu svātmani kiṃcit pūrvam aparaṃ vā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:758: ato vikalpaprāṇitaṃ pūrvāparībhūtatvaṃ kramarūpatā kriyāyāḥ kiṃcit kṣaṇaṃ na vastu spṛśati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:759: te hi kṣaṇā na anyonyasvarūpāviṣṭāḥ iti katham ekā kriyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:760: kramo hi bhedena vyāptaḥ abhiśne tadabhāvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:761: bhedasya viruddham ekyam iti kathaṃ kramikā ekā ca iti syāt ?
GSP30abhiprvu:765: kiṃ ca tathābhūtairbhinnadeśakālākāraiḥ kriyākṣaṇairāviṣṭa āśrayaḥ kathamekaḥ syāt ?
GSP30abhiprvu:767: sa eva grāmaṃ prāptaḥ iti sādṛśyāt bhavantī pratyabhijñā na aikyaṃ vāstavaṃ gamayitumalam //9//
GSP30abhiprvu:770: taṃ saṃbandhaṃ dhvaṃsayituṃ tadviṣayaṃ pramāṇābhāvaṃ tāvadāha @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:775: tatra sati śiviko yāvat ghaṭaḥ ityevaṃ bhāvakṣaṇā eva upalabhyante ,
GSP30abhiprvu:778: sarvatra ādhārādheyabhāvādau ayameva panthāḥ ---- pṛthagrūpakuṇḍavadarakṣaṇānantaraṃ nirantarātmakaviśiṣṭakuṇḍavadarodayaḥ ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:779: ayameva ca bhāvo bhāvāntareṇa saha niyatapūrvāparatayā vikalpena vyavahiyamāṇaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ ---- iti abhidhīyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:780: na ca jñānakriyābhyāṃ saha ātmanaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ ātmanastatkāryatvābhāvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:782: kriyāyāśca abhāvāt iti na jñānakriyāsaṃbandho yato jñātṛtvakartṛtve syātām //10//
GSP30abhiprvu:788: saṃbandhastāvat parasparaprāptirūpo dvayoḥ prāptibhājorekastiṣṭhati ---- iti sāmānyalakṣaṇam /
GSP30abhiprvu:790: na hi ekatra viśramitāśeṣaśarīrasāro'nyatra viśramitum alam svarūpabhedaprasaṅgāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:791: etena saṃyogasamavāyau tanmūlāśca anye'pi saṃbandhā bādhavidhurāṃ dhuram adhyāropitā mantavyāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:792: yo'pi cetaneṣu tatkalpanayā ca acetaneṣu pāratantryātmā saṃbandho vyavahiyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:793: tatra siddhasya na pāratantryam asti siddhatvādeva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:799: tasmāt jñānasaṃbandhāt jñātā iti yathā vikalpakalpito 'rtho na vastu tathā kriyāsaṃbandhāt kartā ityapi kalpanāmātram ---- iti pūrvapakṣasya saṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:801: iti śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptaviracitāyāṃ pratyabhijñāsūtravimarśinyāṃ jñānādhikāre pūrvapakṣavivṛtirnāma dvitīyamāhnikam // 2 //
GSP30abhiprvu:806: etasmin pūrvapakṣe yaduktaṃ smṛteḥ saṃskāramātrādeva siddhiḥ ---- iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:812: kriyāyāṃ saṃbandhe ca dūṣaṇoddharaṇaṃ dvitīye kriyādhikāre bhaviṣyati /
GSP30abhiprvu:813: yattu pareṇa vyatiriktaṃ jñānaṃ kāśādasāṃkhyādidṛṣṭau nirākṛtaṃ tadabhimatameva granthakṛta iti tat dūṣaṇāntarameva /
GSP30abhiprvu:814: tatra ślokadvayena jñānasya svasaṃvedanarūpatayā anubhavasya smṛtau aprakāśatvaṃ darśitaṃ saṃskārajatve 'pi /
GSP30abhiprvu:815: tataḥ ślokadvayena smṛteḥ bhrāntitvam āśaṅkāpūrvakaṃ parākṛtya tṛtīyena prasaṅgāt sarvādhyavasāyānāmapi bhrāntitvāśaṅkā śamitā /
GSP30abhiprvu:816: tataḥ satyapi saṃskāre smṛtyanupapattau vyavahārocchedaḥ ---- iti ślokenoktvā svapakṣe tadupapattiḥ ---- iti ślokenoktam ---- iti tātparyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:820: pūrvapakṣamadhyāt mayā tāvat bahu aṅgīkartavyam ---- iti satyam ityanena darśitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:821: yattu na aṅgīkartavyaṃ tat dūṣyate ---- ityetaduktaṃ kiṃtu ityanena viśeṣābhidhāyinā /
GSP30abhiprvu:822: iha smṛtau viṣayamātrasya prakāśo na samarthanīyo vartate yaḥ saṃskārādeva siddhyet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:823: kiṃtu anubhavaprakāśena vinā tat ityevaṃrūpā kathaṃ smṛtiḥ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:824: kathaṃ ca tayā vinā abhilāṣeṇa vyavahāraḥ syāt ?
GSP30abhiprvu:831: ātmaniṣṭhe svaprakāśajñāne viṣayasyeva anubhavasya prācyasya aprakāśāt //1//
GSP30abhiprvu:832: nanu saṃsk/arajatvādeva prācyamanubhavamapi viṣayīkurutāṃ smṛtiḥ ---- ityāśaṅkyāha @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:835: rase saṃskārajatvaṃ tu tattulyatvaṃ na tadgatiḥ // Ipk_1,3.2 //
GSP30abhiprvu:836: dṛk jñānam , tacca jaḍāt vibhidyate svaprakāśaikarūpatayā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:839: ābhāsaḥ prakāśamānatā sā svaṃ rūpamavyavhicāri yasyāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:841: satyapi bāhye taccharīrasaṃkrāntaṃ na prakāśanaṃ jñānasya rūpaṃ bhavitumarhati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:843: nanu svābhāsameva sat tat anubhavajñānaṃ smaraṇe bhāsiṣyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:845: paratra yadi dṛk bhāseta tarhi na sā svābhāsā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:846: idameva hi svaprakāśasya lakṣaṇam ---- svayaṃ hi yadi prakāśeta tadā pareṇa saha asaṃbandhāt saṃbandhaprāṇā kathaṃ paratra iti saptamī saṃgacchatām ;
GSP30abhiprvu:847: tathā ca rūpajñānena rase dṛk rasaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ na vedyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:848: evaṃ hi cakṣuṣaiva rasaḥ phalato gṛhīta eva syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:849: nanu yadi na ābhāti smaraṇe 'nubhavaḥ kiṃ tarhi saṃskāreṇa kṛtaṃ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:853: naitat , yato hi asau tatsaṃskārasaṃskṛtāt samanantarapratyayāt utthitaḥ smṛtibodhaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:854: tena tatsadṛśo bhavatu śāsvāsaṃniveśa iva pūrvasaṃniveśatulyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:855: na tu yo yatsaṃskārāt jātaḥ sa tasya vedanasvabhāvo bhavati ---- iti yuktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:860: abhyasya ca tadubhayavedanarūpasya abhāvāt iti saṃskārāt paraṃ saviṣayatāmātraṃ smṛteḥ siddham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:862: nāpi asya viṣayasya pūrvānubhavaviṣayīkṛtatvam ---- iti niścayaḥ eṣaḥ //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:863: nanu yadi smṛtijñāne anubhavasya satyataḥ prakāśaḥ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:866: yāvatā smṛtirvikalparūpatvāt kevalamaparakāśamānameva anubhavaṃ tadviṣayaṃ ca adhyavasyati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:883: anubhūtasya anubhavaprakāśitasya viṣayasya apramoṣo'napahāraḥ tathaiva prakāśanaṃ yat etat smṛteḥ ātmīyaṃ rūpaṃ tat tathāprakāśanābhāve vighaṭetamām /
GSP30abhiprvu:884: kiṃ ca bhrāntau asadvā ātmākāro vā prakhyāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:885: na tu tayā arthaḥ svīkriyate tasya aprakāśanāt iti tayā artho na vyavasthāpita eva /
GSP30abhiprvu:888: na ca tadaprakāśane saṃskārajatvena kiṃcit kṛtyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:890: na ca anubhavena viṣayaprakāśanātmanā smṛtyabhidhānāyā bhrānteḥ kicidapi sādṛśyam asti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:892: nanu yo'nubhavo yaśca tadviṣayaḥ sa yataḥ tayā adhyavasīyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:897: na prakāśyate iti cet punarapi viṣayo na spṛṣṭa eva anayā iti sādṛśyamiti śabdagaḍumātram ,
GSP30abhiprvu:902: iha smṛteḥ anyasya vā bhrāntibodhasya svasaṃvedanāṃśe prakāśamāne na bhrāntitā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:904: yastu tatra adhyavasīyate svākāraḥ sa viparītatayā asvākāratvena arthatayā iti tatrāṃśe bhrāntitā /
GSP30abhiprvu:905: sa cāṃśo'rthalakṣaṇo na smṛtyā anyayā vā bhrāntyā spṛśyate iti tatra asau tūṣṇīkā iti balādeva tatrāṃśe jaḍatvam asyā āyātaṃ ghaṭajñānasyeva paṭe /
GSP30abhiprvu:906: na ca jaḍena viṣayasya kiṃcit kṛtyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:908: atha tu tam avasāyarūpaṃ svasaṃvedanāṃśaṃ svākāraṃ vā avalambya ajaḍatvam asyāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:909_0: evamapi ajāḍye nijaṃ svasaṃvedanam ullekhaśca svākāraḥ ---- itīyati eṣā pariniṣṭhitā
GSP30abhiprvu:909_1: smṛtiḥ iti viṣayasya nāmāpi prahītum aśaknuvataḥ tataḥ smṛtyadhyavasāyāt kathaṃ viṣayasya
GSP30abhiprvu:910: saṃskāre satyapi smṛtiḥ na kathaṃcana ghaṭate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:911: tataśca parasparasaṅgatihīnāni sakalāni jñānāni ---- iti yaduktaṃ ślokapañcakena tat idānīṃ prakṛte yojayati @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:915: janasya lokasya yā kācana sthitiḥ vyavahāraḥ sā sarvajñānānāṃ yat anusaṃdhānam ekaviṣayabhāvopapannasmṛtitāprāptirūpam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:918: prathamamapi hi pratyakṣajñānam ahamitipūrvāpararūpānusaṃdhānena smaraṇānuprāṇitena vinā na ghaṭate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:922: evaṃ jñānānām yat anusaṃdhānam tato jāyamānā janasthitiḥ evam iti parābhyupagame sati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:926: anyonyam tāvat bhinnāni jñānāni ---- anyat anubhavajñānam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:931: evaṃ na svarūpato na vedyayo vā ekībhāvarūpam anusaṃdhānam asti /
GSP30abhiprvu:933: na ca turyaṃ jñāteyanibandhanam anusandhānādhāyi saṃbhāvyate iti dhvaṃseran vyavahārāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:934: na ca dhvaṃsantām iti bhavadabhīṣṭaśāpamātrāt te dhvaṃsante ,
GSP30abhiprvu:935: prakāśante yataḥ tata etat āpadyate ---- etadeva samarthayitum udyantavyam ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:936: tacca asmadabhimataprakāreṇa vinā vidherapi aśakyasamarthanam ---- iti darśayati @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:940: saṃvit tāvat prakāśate iti tāvat na kecit apahnuvate /
GSP30abhiprvu:941: sā tu saṃvit yadi svātmamātraviśrāntā arthasya sā kathaṃ prakāśaḥ ?
GSP30abhiprvu:942: sa hi arthadharma eva tathā syāt ;
GSP30abhiprvu:943: tataśca arthaprakāśaḥ tāvatyeva paryavasita iti galito grāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:944: ato 'rthaprakāśarūpaṃ saṃvidam icchatā balādeva artho'pi tadrūpāntargata eva aṅgīkratavyaḥ ;
GSP30abhiprvu:945: sa ca arthaprakāśo yadi anyaśca anyaśca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:946: tat na smaraṇam upapannamityata eka eva asau ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:947: ekatvāt sarvo vedyarāśiḥ tena kroḍīkṛtaḥ ---- ityetadapi anicchatā aṅgīkāryam /
GSP30abhiprvu:948: evamapi satatameva unmagnena nimagnena vā viśvātmanā prakāśeta ,
GSP30abhiprvu:950: na caivam , ataḥ svarūpāntarbruḍitam artharāśim aparamapi bhinnākāram ātmani parigṛhya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:951: kaṃcideva arthaṃ svarūpāt unmagnam ābhāsayati ---- iti āpatitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:953: unmagnābhāsabhinnaṃ ca citsvarūpaṃ vahirmukhatvāt tacchāyānurāgāt navaṃ navaṃ jñānamuktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:954: evamapi navanavābhāsāḥ pratikṣaṇam udayavyayabhāja iti saiva vyavahāranivahahāniḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:955: tena kvacit ābhāse gṛhītapūrve yat saṃvedanaṃ bahirmukham abhūt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:956: tasya yat antarmukhaṃ citsvarūpatvaṃ tat kālāntare 'pi avasthāsnu svātmagataṃ tadviṣayaviśeṣe bahirmukhatvaṃ parāmṛśati iti eśā smṛtiśaktiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:957: yacca tat navaṃ bhāsayati smarati vā tat vastutaḥ saṃvidā viśvamayyā tādātmyavṛtti iti viśvamayaṃ pūrṇameva iti navaṃ na kiṃcit ābhāsitaṃ smṛtaṃ vā syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:958: idamapi pravāhapatitam urīkāryam ---- yat kila tat ābhāsyate tat saṃvido vicchiidyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:966: yataḥ eṣa eva paritaśchedanāt pariccheda ucyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:970: sa eva hi tena tena vapuṣā jānāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:975: jīve niruddhā tatrāpi paramātmani sā sthitā //}
GSP30abhiprvu:976_0: ityādi / etāsāṃ ca jñānādiśaktīnām asaṃkhyaprakāro vaicitryavikalpa iti tatsāmarthyaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:977: tadevaṃ cidvapuḥ ityekaṃ kṛtvā iyadāyātam viśvarūpaḥ iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:978: tata eva ca pariniṣṭhitaikarūpajaḍabhāvavailakṣaṇyāt jñānādiśaktiyuktatāmāheśvaryam upasaṃprāptaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:979: etadanupagame na kiṃcit idaṃ bhāseta ---- iti prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:980: bhāsate tu , tasmāt etat avaśyāṅgīkartavyam ---- iti prasaṅgaviparyayaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:982: yadyevaṃ na syāt ---- iti prāktanena ślokena saha saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:985: iti śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptaviracitāyāṃ īśvarapratyabhijñāsūtravimarśinyāṃ jñānādhikāre paradarśanānupapattirnāma tṛtīyamāhnikam // 3 //
GSP30abhiprvu:991: tadubhayānugrāhiṇī apohanaśaktiḥ ---- iti tāvat vastusaṃbhavakrameṇa pradarśitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:995: tatra saṃskāramātrāt tāvat mā nāma udapādi smṛtiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:996: idaṃ tu vaktavyam ---- tathābhūtabhavadabhyupagatabhagavatprabhāvo'pi katham enāṃ kuryāt ---- iti śaṅkāṃ śamayituṃ smṛtitattvanirūpaṇāya
GSP30abhiprvu:1001: tatra ślokena svapakṣe smṛtirupapannā ---- iti kathitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1003: tṛtīyena anubhavena tadviṣayeṇa ca ekībhāvaparyanta āveśaḥ smaraṇasya uktaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1004: turyeṇa anubhavasya na viṣayatayā smṛtyā prakāśanam ---- iti nirūpitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1005: pañcamena yogijñānamapi anubhavaṃ pṛthagbhāvena na viṣayīkaroti ---- iti baḍatā turyaślokārtha eva upodvalitaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1006: ṣaṣṭhenāśaṅkyamānam anubhavasya smṛtyā pṛthagviṣayīkaraṇaṃ kākpanikam ---- ityavāstavīkṛtam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1007: saptamena smṛtiprasaṅgāt vikalpe'pi pūrvānubhavena aikyātmāveśo darśitaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1008: aṣṭamena smartavyasya smṛteḥ smartuśca ekacittattvaviśrāntiḥ uktā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1009: prasaṅgācca dṛśyasya darśanasya draṣṭuśca ---- iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1013: pūrvamanubhūtasya arthasya ya upalandhā antarmukho bodhaḥ sa tāvat adyāpi parataḥ smṛtikāle'pi astyeva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1015: anubhavasya ca antaḥ artho'pi apṛthagbhāvena avasthitaḥ ---- ityetadapi ayatnasiddham /
GSP30abhiprvu:1016: iyat tu cintyam ---- akālakalite saṃvedane tadantarvartini ca viśvatra bhāvajāte yadi tāvat cinmayatāparāmarśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1017: tat aham iti etāvataiva pūrṇena vimarśena bhāvyam ;
GSP30abhiprvu:1024: apūrvatābhāsanācca tat anubhavanameva syāt na smaraṇam ---- ityāśaṅgyāha svairī iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1025: svam ātmīyam upakaraṇam īrayati svakartavyeṣu avaśyaṃ tacchīlaśca ;
GSP30abhiprvu:1026: svaṃ ca ātmānam īrayati na punaḥ svakartavye prerakamapekṣate ---- iti svairī svatantraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1028: sa iti vimarśanasya ca iyadrūpam ---- yat sarvathā akālakalitasvarūpaparāmarśanameva na ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1029: nāpi atyantaṃ bhedena vimarśanameva api tu yo bhāvaḥ pūrvamanubhavakāle taddeśakālapramātrantarasācivyena pṛthakkṛto na ca ahantāyāmeva līnīkṛtaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1030: sa tādṛgeva tamaseva ācchādya avasthāpitaḥ saṃskāraśabdavācyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1032: tatra apahastite sa pūrvavat pṛthakkṛte evāvabhāti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1033: nanu ca idantayā avabhāset pūrvavadeva , naivam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1035_1: pūrvakālaparāmarśaḥ iti viruddhapūrvāparaparāmarśasvabhāva eva sa iti parāmarśa ucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1036: evaṃ ca sa eva parameśvaraḥ smarati /
GSP30abhiprvu:1037: etadeva hi tasya smartṛtvam ---- yat evaṃprakāraparāmarśocitakālakalādisparśasahiṣṇumāyāpramātṛbhāvaparigrahaḥ iti māyāvidyādvayādvayamayam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1038: tata eva sakalasiddhivitaraṇacaturacintāmaṇiprakhyam āgamikāḥ smaraṇameva mantrādiprāṇitaṃ manyante / tathā ca @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1042: anena tṛnnantasamāsena yatnato 'nubhavasyārthamukhena kālasparśam arthaviśrāntatāṃ dvayorapi pramātari nirūḍhiṃ bhedābhedābhyāṃ darśayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1046: tatra yadi kaścid brūyāt ---- iha smṛtirvikalpaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1049: anubhavena ca yena so'rthaḥ prakāśatāṃ nītaḥ sa idānīṃ kīrtimātramūrtirjātaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1050_0: na ca so'pi smṛtyā prakāśyate ---- jñānasya jñānāntareṇāsaṃvedyatvāt asattvācceti
GSP30abhiprvu:1050_1: arthasya prakāśanābhāvāt idaṃ smarāmi iti jñānaṃ bhrāntimātrameva ---- iti punarapi āpatitam ---- iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1057: evaṃ ca yāvat adhyavasāyo'rthasya tāvat arthāt iti sāmarthyāt iyat abhyupagantavyam ---- yat so'rthaḥ prakāśate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1067: ābhāsāntaravyāmiśraṇābhāve 'pi tu kālābhāsasaṃbhedenaiva svālakṣaṇyaṃ tasya ābhāsasya karoti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1070: tāvatyeva vā smṛtiḥ ābhāsāntarairapi vyāmiśrā atisphuṭeti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1075: bhāsayet iti vidhirūpeṇa niyogena niyamo lakṣyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1080: pūrvābhāsitaṃ svalakṣaṇam iti vedyāṃśasparśī bhūtakālo ghaṭābhāsasyāpi kevalasya svālakṣaṇyāpattiheturdarśitaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1082: arthitātiśayāt tu sphuṭatvam iti atha śabdo dyotayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:1085: nanu evaṃ svalakṣaṇasya prakāśane bhedena bahistadavabhāseta /
GSP30abhiprvu:1086: etadeva hi bahiravabhāsanam ---- yat svalakṣaṇaprakāśanam iti śaṅkāśamanāya nirūpayati @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1088: na ca yuktaṃ smṛterbhede smaryamāṇasya bhāsanam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1089: tenaikyaṃ bhinnakālānāṃ saṃvidāṃ veditaiṣa saḥ // Ipk_1,4.3 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1090: smaraṇajñānāt bhinnatvena bahīrūpatayā yadi so 'rtho bhāseta smaryamāṇasya ca yat bhāsanaṃ tadeva na syāt smaryamāṇameva tat na syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1092: nanu caivaṃ kathaṃ svalakṣaṇasya prakāśanam uktam ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1093: etat na idāṇīṃ prakāśanam api tu pūrvakāle eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1098: tataḥ kim ? ubhayamapi na kiṃcit syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1100: maivam , yasya hi saṃvedanānyeva bhinnāni tattvam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1102_0: asmaddarśane tu bhinnakālā api saṃvidaḥ tatkālātyāgenaiva ekatāvabhāsanena svatantraḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1102_1: pramātā yāvadantarmukhatayā tāvatyaṃśe vimṛśati tāvat prakāśasya tātkālikabahirbhāvābhāso
GSP30abhiprvu:1103: etadeva vedanādhikaṃ veditṛtvaṃ ---- vedaneṣu saṃyojanaviyojanayoḥ yathāruci karaṇaṃ svātantryam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1105: ghaṭamahamanvabhūvam iti vā sa ghaṭaḥ iti vā aikyam anusaṃdhānam anusaṃdhāturabhinnam iti darśayituṃ yadeva aikyaṃ sa eva veditā iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena darśitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1106: eṣa sa iti ācchāditasyeva pramātṛtattvasya sphuṭāvabhāsanaṃ kṛtam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1114: nanu ca prācya eva anubhavo yadi smaryamāṇasya bahiravabhāsanarūpaḥ prakāśaḥ tarhi iyat ucyatām ---- so'nubhava idānīṃ smaraṇena viṣayīkriyate ---- iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1115: aikyena tu alaukikena ko'rthaḥ iti vyāmohaṃ vihantumāha @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1119: pūrvo ghaṭādiḥ arthaḥ pṛthak iti idantayā bhāti sma naivaṃ smaraṇakāle smṛtijñānāt pṛthaktvena idaṃ pūrvamanubhavanam iti bhāti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1120: yathā ca smṛtikāle tasmāt smṛtijñānāt so'rthaḥ prāk iti pūrvasvabhāvo na bhedena ābhāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1121: smṛtikāle bahiravabhāsābhāvāt evaṃ tata eva hetoḥ pūrvo 'pi anubhavo na bhedena ābhāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1125_0: aham ---- ityevaṃsvabhāvo ya ātmā pūrvāparasaṃvidantarmukhasvabhāvaḥ tatra yat ārohaṇam
GSP30abhiprvu:1125_1: viśramaḥ tena hetunā pūrvasaṃvidrūpatāyāḥ svaprakāśāyā bhāsanāt tallonasyāpi ghaṭasya
GSP30abhiprvu:1126: ātmani ca ārohaṇam viśramaṇā anubhavasya arthasya ca /
GSP30abhiprvu:1127: prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ saha brūtaḥ ---- iti nyāyāt saṃkhyākṣipte tadvati vā kartṛbhūte 'smadarthe 'nubhavo bruḍitaḥ taddvāreṇa artho'pi ca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1131: hi yasmāt naiva bhāti pūrvo 'nubhavaḥ pṛthak aparārdhoktāt hetoḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1133: luṅā bhūtakālasya dyotitatvāt prāk iti bhinnakramaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1137: nanu ka evamāha ---- anubhavaḥ pṛthak na bhāti iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1138: ghaṭavat na bhāti iti cet kiṃ tataḥ ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1139: ghaṭo'pi hi na anubhavasakhyaḥ bhāti iti kiṃ na bhāti ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1140: svabhāvena bhāti iti tu ubhayatrāpi samānam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1141: tathā hi ---- atītānāgatasūkṣmādi yathā yogijñāne viṣayībhavati iti abhyupagatam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1146: ālambanayogaśca kathaṃ śaṅkayeta na ca sālambanam iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1147: tasmāt parakīyamanubhavanamiva nijamapi viṣayīkriyatām ityāśaṅkya dṛṣṭānta evāsiddhaḥ iti bhānti ityantena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1148: abhyupagamena vā siddhatve 'pi prakṛte 'rthe viṣamaḥ iti śeṣeṇa darśayati @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1152: yoginām yat etat darśanāntaram bhāvanādyudbhavaḥ paracittaviṣayo jñānaviśeṣaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1153: tatra dṛśaḥ iti upalabdhayo na bhānti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1154: tathā hi ---- saugatānāṃ tāvat svaprakāśaikarūpaṃ jñānam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1156: tarhi yad asya nijaṃ vapuḥ ananyavedyatayā prakāśanaṃ nāma ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1159: puruṣaśca asaṃvedya parvā iti kathaṃ vedyā syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1160: vaiśeṣikāṇāmapi ātmani abhedena samavāyi saṃvedanaṃ paragataṃ manasā kathaṃ gṛhyeta antaḥśarīravṛttinā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1161: taccharīrāntaranupraveśe tu tasyaiva aham iti śarīrīkaraṇāt ahantāvabhāsitatvāt ātmano bhedo vigalet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1164: tasmāt yoginaḥ paracittavedanāvasare iyān prakāśaḥ ---- etaddehaprakāśasahacārī ghaṭasukhādiprakāśaḥ ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1167: pramātrīkṛtaparadehaprāṇādisamavabhāsasaṃskārāt tu tanniṣṭhām idantām eva prakāśabhāge 'pi manyamāna idaṃ parajñānam iti abhimanyate avigalitasvaparavibhāgo yogī /
GSP30abhiprvu:1168: prāptaprakarṣastu sarvam ātmatvena paśyan svasṛṣṭameva svaparavibhāgaṃ manyate iti jñānasya na yogijñānena prakāśyatā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1169: bhavatu vā tathāpi prakṛtaṃ na etatsamam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1170: tathā hi ---- ayamanubhavati iti paraniṣṭha eva asau anubhave yoginaḥ prakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1171: na tu ahamanubhavāmi iti ātmāroheṇa vartamānaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1172: iha tu anvabhūvam iti ahamaṃśaviśrāntiḥ anālīḍhedaṃbhāvaiva anubhavasya iti yuktamuktam ---- yasmāt anubhavaḥ pṛthak na bhāti tasmāt aikyaṃ bhinnakālānāṃ saṃvidāṃ veditā iti //5//
GSP30abhiprvu:1173: yadyahaṃabhāvaviśrāntivaśāt anubhavaḥ smṛtau pṛthak na bhāti iti ucyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1174: tadā parāmarśāntaraṃ sākṣādeva idantayā anubhavaṃ parāmṛśat yadi vā idaṃbhāvocitaghaṭādiviśrāntatām anubhavasya prathayat upalabdham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1175: iti tadanusāreṇāpi kiṃ na vyavahriyate iti parābhiprāyaṃ pratikṣipati @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1180: sa hi na pṛthagbhūtāṃ dṛśaṃ kāṃcit manyate ---- sā dṛk me āsīt ityevam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1181: evamapi tu yat smaryate evaṃbhūtamapi yat smaraṇaṃ kasyacit vivecakaṃmanyasya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1183: padasyeva prakṛtipratyayārthanirūpaṃaṃ kālpanikaṃ vibhajya ākaraṇaṃ paratra pratipādanamātram /
GSP30abhiprvu:1186: yata eva tat rāhoḥ śiraḥ itivat kalpitaṃ bhedaṃ manyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1187: anyathā sa ghaṭaḥ itivat sā dṛk ityatrāpi prāktanaṃ dṛgantaram apekṣaṇīyaṃ syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1188: tat ityanena hi ghaṭasya vā dṛśo vā pūrvānubhavaviṣayāpattiḥ ucyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1190: tataśca dṛk mayā dṛgantareṇa anubhūtā iti āpatet /
GSP30abhiprvu:1194: nanu atra dayitāvadananalinādiviśrāntaṃ darśanam uktam na tu ātmārūḍham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1197: kartuḥ kriyayā hi āpyaṃ karma iti dṛśikriyāyāḥ kartṛniṣṭhataiva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1198: tathā ca kartṛsthāmeva dṛśikriyāmāhuḥ darśayate bhṛtyān rājā ityādau /
GSP30abhiprvu:1199: jaiminīyairapi jñānarūpā dṛśiḥ bhāvanātmikā pramātṛviśrāntaiva uktā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1201: anyā saṃvit vā'svatantrā iti anyat etat /
GSP30abhiprvu:1206: anye tu bhinnakramatvena yojayanti ---- dṛk āsīt sā me ityevam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1207: mayā dṛṣṭam iti ca yat smaraṇaṃ tat vyākaraṇamasyāḥ iti anantaroktānvabhūvamityucitaparāmarśāyāḥ smṛteḥ iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1209: nanu dṛṣṭamapi nirvikalpakena yāvat na parāmṛṣṭaṃ vimarśaviśeṣaviśrāntyā tāvat na smaryate mārgadṛṣṭamiva tṛṇaparṇādi viśeṣeṇa rūpeṇa ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1211: samanantarabhāvivikalpakāle taddarśanam idantayā avabhātapūrvaṃ vā na vā iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1216: iha darśanaṃ yādṛśaṃ nijena vapuṣā tādṛśenaiva tena bhātavyaṃ sarvadā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1217: tacca svakāle'nanyaprakāśam aham ityetāvatā svarūpeṇa ucitaprakāśam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1220: kiṃ tu avasāyo 'pi evaṃbhūtaḥ iti apiśabdena sūcayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:1221: tatra samanantarabhāvinā vikalpena vastu parāmṛśyamānam anubhavaparāmarśamukhena vā parāmṛśyate ahamimaṃ paśyāmi iti vartamānatayā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1222: imam ityanena ca pratyakṣavyāpāratvaṃ pratyakṣāyamāṇatvena darśitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1225: tatra antye vikalpe darśanasya pṛthak parāmarśa eva nāsti iti kā tatra idantāśaṅkā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1226: tataśca pāriśeṣyāt ahantayā tasya atrāsti parāmarśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1227: tadabhāve vikalpasya nimīlitākṣe 'pi bhāvāt svayamarthasparśe sati sphuṭamaviṣayaparyavasitaḥ kathamadhyavasāyo bhavet /
GSP30abhiprvu:1228: ādye tu darśanaṃ parāmṛṣṭamapi asmadarthe 'ntarbhūtam ahaṃbhāvāspadam avasātari viśrāntaṃ svaprakāśameva parāmṛṣṭam iti vikalpo'pi na bodhāntarabodhyatāṃ bodhayati bodhasya /
GSP30abhiprvu:1235: jñānasya jñānāntareṇa parāmarśe hi ayameva nyāyaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1239: smṛtaṃ mayā iti ahantārūḍhyaiva vikalpādeḥ avabhāsāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1240: ata eva ātmano'mī vikalpādyāḥ śaktiviśeṣāḥ tadviśrāntaśarīratvāt iti darśitam jñānasmṛtyapohanaśaktimān ityatra //7//
GSP30abhiprvu:1245: tat iti tasmādarthe pūrvoktasya prameyasya hetubhāvena upajīvanam iha sūcayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:1246: yata evamuktam ---- anubhavasya arthasyeva smaraṇāt na bhedena avabhāsaḥ smrṭiśaktiśca parameśvarasyaiva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1250: ---- parāmarśabhedāt kadācit svātmaparāmarśapūrvakam anubhāvyam parāmṛśati yatra asya abhisaṃdhipradhānatā mayā dṛśyate iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1251: kadācit anubhavanīyameva pradhānatayā parāmṛśati yatra anabhisaṃdhereva sahasā vastūpanipātaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1252: arthakriyāṃ prati āgrahaviśeṣo vā ayam iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1255: evamubhayathānubhave pratyekaṃ smṛtirapi dvayaparāmarśamayī udeti iti catvāraḥ smaraṇabhedāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1261: teṣu ca grāhyaṃ tāvat prakāśāt abahirbhūtam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1267: tadevāpṛthagbhūtaṃ atra pṛthagbhūtaṃ ca bhavati iti nūnamanyaḥ kalpitaprakāśātmā kaścit atra artho 'sti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1268: yato 'yam artharāśiḥ pṛthagbhavan anyonyamapi pṛthaktām adhigacchet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1269: anyathā prakāśābhinnānāṃ parasparamapi kathaṅkāraṃ pṛthagbhāvo bhavet /
GSP30abhiprvu:1273: aham iti vicchedaśūmyaprakāśocitena parāmarśena parāmṛśyamāno māyāpramātā iti vakṣyate {dehe buddhau ...................... /

GSP30abhiprvu:1276_1: avabhāsayati parameśvaraḥ tadeva etat bhagavato jñānakartṛtvaṃ smaraṇakartṛtvaṃ jñānaśaktismṛtiśaktirūpam
GSP30abhiprvu:1278: ayam iti ca yat āmṛśati pramātā prakāśarūpo yena anubhavati iti ucyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1280: grāhyarūpeṇa grāhakarūpeṇa yojitau ghaṭādidehādisvabhāvau arthau vedyau pramātari viśuddhaprakāśarūpe bhātaḥ prakāśete /
GSP30abhiprvu:1281: evaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ iti sa iti ca yat parāmṛśati prakāśarūpaḥ pramātā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1284: anubhavarūpopajīvitvaṃ pūrvoktaṃ draḍhayituṃ prasaṅgāt atra jñānaśakterapi unmīlanaṃ kṛtam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1288: grāhako māyīyaḥ kalpitaḥ pramātā aśuddhaprakāśasvabhāvaḥ iti śivam / āditaḥ ślo. 31//
GSP30abhiprvu:1289: iti śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptaviracitāyāṃīśvarapratyabhijñāsūtravimarśinyāṃ prathame jñānādhikāre smṛtiśaktinirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturthamāhnikam // 4 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1293: jñānaśaktipradīpena yaḥ sadā taṃ stumaḥ śivam //}
GSP30abhiprvu:1298: tatrādyeva ślokena vastuni pratijñāṃ karoti evaṃbhūtā jñānaśaktiḥ iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1299: tataḥ ślokadvayena prakāśa evārthānāṃ svarūpa, ityāha /
GSP30abhiprvu:1300: tato dvayena prakāśabāhyānāmarthānāṃ sadbhāvaṃ vijñānavādyupagatavāsanādūṣaṇena dṛḍhīkṛtam āśaṅkya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1301: tṛtīyena tadanabhyupagame 'pi tāvat na kiñcit uparudhyata iti darśayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:1302: atha ślokena svadarśane 'rthatattvam upadarśayan bāhyārthasadbhāve pratyakṣaṃ parākaroti pramāṇatvena /
GSP30abhiprvu:1304: anantaraṃ ślokena cidātmani arthānām avaśyaṃ sadbhāvaḥ parāmarśātmanā iti prakaṭayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:1305: tato 'pi prakāśasya pramātṛrūpasya pratyavamarśa eva jīvatam iti ślokacatuṣṭayena anubhavāgamanyāyasvarūpanirūpaṇābhiḥ abhidhatte /
GSP30abhiprvu:1306: anantaraṃ jñānaparāmarśa eva jñeyaṃ śuddhaṃ pramātṛrūpatānujjhitaṃ ca prakṣayati iti tasyaiva pradhānatve nyāyaṃ ślokatrayeṇāha /
GSP30abhiprvu:1307: prakāśaikarūpatve ca jñānajñātrādi bhinnam iti ślokenāha /
GSP30abhiprvu:1308: tato jñātari iva viśuddhe jñāne 'pi avikalpakasavikalpakarūpe vimarśa eva prāṇitam iti ślokadvayenāha /
GSP30abhiprvu:1310: yat bhinnatvaṃ tat upasaṃhāradiśā ślokena samarthayate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1314: tatra yadi bhedena ābhāsānte 'rthāḥ tat teṣvapi tathaiva avabhāsa ucitaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1316: tadanubhava eva tāvat jñānaśaktirūpo vicāraṇīya ityāśayenāha @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1320: vartamānatvena sphuṭatayā avabhāsanam idamityevamākāraṃ yeṣāṃ teṣām ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1322: bhinnānām tato māyāpramātuḥ vicchinnānām avabhāsanam tat paramārthapramātari śuddhacinmaye antaḥsthitavatām tena saha aikātmyam anujjhitavatāmeva ghaṭate pramāṇena upapadyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1323: tena anujjhitasaṃvidabhedasya bhāvasya kalpitapramātrapekṣayā bhedena prakāśanaṃ bhagavato jñānaśaktirityuktaṃ bhavati //1//
GSP30abhiprvu:1327: na ca prakāśo bhinnaḥ syādātmārthasya prakāśatā // Ipk_1,5.2 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1329: tasya nīlādirūpataiva yadi prakāśamānatā na punaḥ sāparā kācit arthaśarīrottīrṇā prakāśātmatā tarhi yathā sarvān prati nīlameva tatsaṃbhāvanayā bhaṇyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1331: vastuto vā svātmanyeva tat nīlaṃ parasya paraniṣṭhatvānupapatteḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1332: svātmani vā na nīlaṃ na anīlam prakāśānugraheṇa vinā vyavasthānāyogāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1333: tathā prakāśamānatāpi asya sarvān prati na kaṃcit vā prati api tu svātmanyeva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1334: svātmanyapi vā na syāt iti andhatā jagataḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1335: atha indriyālokādikṣaṇavargāt prakāśarūpo 'sau nīlakṣaṇo viśiṣṭa eva jātaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1338: sarvathā arthaśarīraviśrāntaḥ cet prakāśo mama avabhāsate iti pramātṛlagnatayā prakāśasthitiḥ durupapādā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1339: pramātā hi tadānīm indriyādimayo 'rtharūpaprakāśasya kāraṇaṃ bhavet bījamivāṅkurasya /
GSP30abhiprvu:1341: tato yadi na prakāśātmā sa syāt prāgiva jñānodayāt pūrvaṃ yathā'sāvaprakāśaḥ tathā jñānodaye 'pi syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1343: tat kathaṃ jñānasya udayānudayayoḥ arthasya tulyatā syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1345: yāvatā arthāt bhinnaṃ yat jñānaṃ prakāśarūpam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1347: yadi tāvat arthaḥ prakāśate ityevaṃbhūtaṃ jñānasya svarūpaṃ tat arthajñānayoḥ abheda evāyātaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1349: arthasvabhāvatve ca sati prakāśasya arthātmatāyām uktaṃ dūṣaṇam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1350: atha arthaṃ prakāśayati iti jñānasya svarūpam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1351: tarhi prakāśamānamarthaṃ karoti jñānam iti āpatite punarapi sa eva doṣaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1352: kṛtapratānaśca ayaṃ prakṛtyarthaṇyarthaviveko mayaiva bhedavidāraṇe iti tata eva anveṣyaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1353: tasmāt bhinnaḥ prakāśo 'rthasya saṃbandhī bhavati iti saṃbhāvanaiva nāsti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1354: tacca idam upapattyā āyātam ---- arthasya svarūpaṃ prakāśamānatā prakāśābhinnatvam iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1355: prakāśaśca yadi ghaṭe 'nyaḥ paṭe 'nyaḥ tadā anusaṃdhānasya ayogaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1356: dvayoḥ prakāśayoḥ svātmamātraparyavasānād iti vitatya upapāditaṃ naśyet janasthitiḥ ityatra /
GSP30abhiprvu:1358: etadeva āvṛttyā darśitaṃ na ca prakāśo bhinnaḥ syāt iti //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:1361: bhinne prakāśe cābhinne saṃkaro viṣayasya tat /
GSP30abhiprvu:1363: yadi arthāt anya eva jñānātmā prakāśaḥ ata eva bhinno 'rthataḥ tarhi svātmani tasya prakāśamātrarūpatvāt abheda eva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1365: pītasya prakāśaḥ iti yo nīlāṃśaḥ pītāṃśaśca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1366: sa na tāvat jñānasya svarūpam bhedavādatyāgāpatteḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1368: tadevedaṃ vicāryate ---- iha prakāśabalāt nīlapītayoḥ bhedo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1369: yenaiva ca prakāśena nīlo nīla eva iti upagamyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1370: tenaiva ca prakāśena pītaḥ pīta iti kathaṃ saṃgacchatām ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1373: tena vā saha samānasāmagrīka ityādi yat ucyate tat siddhe nīlapītayorbhede syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1375: atha nīlākāro 'sau tat yadi pratibimbabalāt taddvitīyabimbānavabhāsāt ayuktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1378: tathā karaṇatādivāde śikharasthajñānaṃ bahutaranīlādijanyam ekatra paṭu anyatra mandam iti kathaṃ bhedaḥ prakāśaśarīrasya abhedāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1379: tathābhūte ca anyataradarśanodbhūte 'pi saṃskāre balādeva aśeṣasmaraṇaprasaṅga iti bhūyān saṅkaraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1383: svātmani hi nīlaṃ yadi pūtaṃ na kiṃcit vā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1389: iti / tat yadi prakāśaḥ tadā bhavati arthaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1391: yadi prakāśataiva ghaṭasya vapuḥ saiva paṭasya ityādi viśvavapuḥ prakāśaḥ siddhaḥ //3//
GSP30abhiprvu:1395: tatra prakāśasya avicitrasya krameṇa vicitratākāraṇaṃ pratibimbātmakaṃ tatpratibimbasajātīyaṃ yat tadeva nīlādirūpaṃ bāhyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1397: tathāpi idaṃ nīlamiti pratyakṣeṇa adhyavasāyāt adhyavasāyaprāṇitatvācca pramāṇasthiteḥ pratyakṣavyapadeśyaṃ bhaviṣyati /

GSP30abhiprvu:1414: tasya ca abhinnasya kadācit nīlābhāsatā kadācit pītābhāsatā iti ye vicitrābhāsāḥ tatra kāraṇatvam hi yasymāt na upapannam hetau abhinne kāryabhedasya asaṃbhavāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1415_0: tasmāt sa sa vicitranīlapītādirūpa ākāsmiko 'jñātapratyakṣasiddhahetukaḥ san bāhyaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:1415_2: jñānāt sarvathā pṛthagbhūtam anumāpayati iti saṃbhāvayate bāhyārthavādī //4 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1418: tathā hi vijñānavādinā yo hetuḥ vaicitrye vāsanāprabodhalakṣaṇa uktaḥ sa na upapadyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1419: smṛtijanakaḥ saṃskāro vāsanā iti tāvat prasiddham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1421: astu vā nīlādyābhāsasaṃpādanasāmarthyarūpā jñānasya yogyatātmikā śaktiḥ vāsanā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1424: tatrāpi tu brūmaḥ ---- iha yadyāpi ābhāsānāṃ jñānāntarvartinām apāramārthikatvaṃ saṃvṛtisattvam ucyetāpi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1425: tathāpi yadeṣāṃ tad vastusadeva aṅgīkāryam avastunaḥ sarvasāmarthyavirahitālakṣaṇasya kāryasaṃpādanaprāṇitasāmārtthyātmakasvabhāvānupapatteḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1426: evaṃsthite yā etā vāsanā ābhāsakāraṇatvena iṣyante ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1432: tathā yena rūpeṇa āsāṃ pāramārthikatā tena kāraṇatā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1433: tat tarhi jñānamātraṃ tacca abhinnam iti nīlādyābhāsarūpasya kāryabhedasya asiddhiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1434: evaṃ vāsanānām abicitratve tatprabodho vicitra iti kā pratyāśā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1436: tathāpi bodhamātrātiriktasya deśakālabhāvādeḥ prabodhakābhimatasya vicitrasya kāraṇasya abhāvāt prabodho'vicitra iti eka eva prabodhaḥ iti samameva nīlādivaicitryaṃ bhāseta /
GSP30abhiprvu:1437: atha svasaṃtānavartīni jñānāntarāṇi vicitrāṇi prabodhakāraṇāni iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1439: sukhaduḥkhanīkapīlādipūrvāparādideśakālabhedasya vijñānamātrarūpatve vijñānasya ca prakāśamātrapramārthatāyāṃ svarūpabhedāsaṃbhave tathā bodhavailakṣaṇyānupapatteḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1444: anumātrabhimatasaṃbinmātrarūpābhede paratvaṃ kasya bhavet iti na vidmaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1446: so 'pi pramāṇena yadi na siddhaḥ tat asat eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1447: siddho 'pi prameyatayā cet tat jaḍa eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1448: tathāpi ca kāyādivat eva jñānamātrasvabhāvaḥ svasaṃvinmātrarūpatve paraṃ prati asya asiddheḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1449: nanu vyāhārādikriyā svātmani icchayā vyāhareyam ityevaṃrūpayā hetubhāvena vyāptā dṛṣṭā tat caitrakāye'pi tayā taddhetukayā bhāvyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1450: na ca matsaṃtatipatitā samīhā asti iti svasaṃvedanena niścitam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1453: atrocyate ---- iha anumātuḥ vyāhārābhāso dvidhā bhavati ---- vyāptigrahaṇakāle 'vicchedaprāṇo 'haṃ vyāharāmi ityevaṃrūpaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1454: anumānāvasare ca vyāharati ayam iti vicchedajīvita iti anyasya vyāptiḥ gṛhītā anyaśca ābhāsaḥ katham idānīṃ hetuḥ syāt ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1455: vyāharati iti ābhāsasya hetuḥ avidita eva iti kathaṃ tato hetoḥ samīhā anumīyeta ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1456: kiṃ ca vyāharati ayam iti yaḥ pramātrantare 'numātṛsaṃmate vicchinnatayā avabhāsaḥ so'numeyasaṃmatāyāḥ paramīhāyāḥ kathaṃ kāryaḥ syāt ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1457: tasyā hi vyāharāmītyābhāsaḥ kāryo yo'sau avicchedajīvitaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1458: na ca avicchedamayasya vicchedamayaḥ kāryam iti yuktaṃ tathābhūtakāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇopāyābhāvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1459: na hi svātmani yo'yam avicchinnābhāsaḥ sa paratra vicchinnaṃ vyāharati ityevaṃrūpam ābhāsaṃ janayati iti kenacit pramāṇena siddham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1462: na ca avaśyan avicchinnāt vicchinnena bhāvyam iti niyamo 'sti vyavhicārāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1463: na ca vicchinno 'pi ābhāsa upadyatām iti tadanusaṃdhānāt tadutpattiḥ niyatā tatsadbhāve 'pyasyānutpatteḥ tadabhāve ca utpatteḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1464: vicchinna ābhāsaḥ paratra utpadyatām iti yā samīhā tayā saha pratra utpannasya vicchinnābhāsasya kāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇameva parāsiddhau na yukta,
GSP30abhiprvu:1466: pramātrantarāṇi ca yadi bhinnāni tadā tanniṣṭhānām avabhāsānāṃ bheda eva jñānādavyatiriktaṃ ca iti nyāyāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1467: tataśca ekābhāsaniṣṭhatvābhāvāt ekābhāsaviśrāntaḥ saṃbhūya pramātḥṇāṃ vyavahāro na syāt iti anyosaṃbhavaḥ ---- yat prameyaṃ bodhāt bhinnaṃ bhavati iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1468: sahopalambhaniyamādeḥ anaikāntikatvāt nīlapītādināpi prameyarāśinā kim apakṛtam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1471: siddhau vā sarvapramātrantargatā ābhāsā ekaikatra paratra ābhāsavaicitryahetuṃ vāsanodvodhavaicitryaṃ janayeyuḥ niyame hetvantarābhāvāt iti tathāpi na nīlādivaicitryasiddhiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1472: evaṃ vāsanānāṃ tadudbodhahetūnāṃ ca vicitrāṇām anupapattireva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1474: abhinno bodhaḥ tasya ākasmikābhāsabhedahetutvānupapatteḥ bāhyo'rtho'numeyaḥ saṃbhāvyate iti yadi bāhyārthavādinā ucyate iti ślokadvayārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1477: adhunā tu enāṃ saṃbhāvanāṃ śithilayituṃ tāvadāha @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1481: syādetat iti pūrvoktasaṃbhāvanābhyupagame yadā vyākhyāyate tadā kiṃ tu iti vākyaśeṣeṇa tacchaithilyaviṣayaṃ saṃbhāvanāntaraṃ śeṣaślokena darśayate iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1482: yadi tu adhyāhāro na sahyate tadā syādetaditi idamapi saṃbhāvanāntaraṃ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1483: yadanena ślokena ucyate iti ekavākyatayā yojyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1484: anayāpi kaṣṭakalpanayā bāhyān arthān prasādhayatā bhavatā taiḥ na kiṃcit kartavyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1486: na hi nityānumeyena kaścit vyavahāra iti kiṃ bāhyena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1488: bādhakaṃ ca prakāśāt bhede anumeyatayāpi prakāśanābhāva iti tāvat mukhyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1492: aṇusaṃcayabāhyavāde 'pi saṃcayasya anyasya abhāve paramāṇava eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1493: te ca yadi saṃyujyante nirantaratayā tat avaśyaṃ digbhāgabhedaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1494: evanākṣe ṣaṭsu dikṣu saṃcīyamāneṣu ṣaṭsu aṇuṣu madhyamasya paramāṇoḥ yatraiva dhāmni eko lagnaḥ tatraiva yadi aparaḥ tat ekaparamāṇumātratā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1495: atha anyatra ekaḥ anyatar aparaḥ tat avaśyaṃ bhāgabhedāpattiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1497: tasyāpi eṣaiva saraṇiḥ iti na kiṃcit avaśiṣyate bāhyaṃ tattvataḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1499: saṃyoge bhinnadeśatvāvyāvṛtteḥ tanniṣṭaṃ dvyaṇukaṃ nāma kāryadravyam aṇuparimāṇam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1503: yacca avyāpyavṛttitvaṃ saṃyogasya ucyate tanniraṃśe kathaṃ saṃgacchatām /
GSP30abhiprvu:1504: svāśraye hi yadi asau samavaiti kim anyāt asya avaśiṣyate yat na vyāpnuyāt iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1505: abhyuścayabādhakaṃ ca idam iti na atra asmābhiḥ bharaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1507: nanu bādhakaṃ nāma pramāṇasiddhe vastuni na kiṃcit kartuṃ samartham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1508: tenaiva dṛḍhena pramāṇena bādhakābhimatasya bādhitasya apramāṇatvasaṃpādanāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1509: darśitaṃ ca iha sādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ kāryahetuḥ tattadākasmikābhāsa iti kārikayā ityāśaṅkya āha @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1513: iha tāvat svapna -- smaraṇa -- manorājya -- saṃkalpādiṣu nīlādyābhāsavaicitryaṃ bāhyasamarpakahtuvyatirekeṇaiva nirbhāsate iti yadyapi asti saṃbhavaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1514: tathāpi tadābhāsavaicitryam asthairyāt sarvapramātrasādhāraṇyāt pūrvānubhavasaṃskārajatvasaṃbhāvanāt avastu iti śaṅkyeta /
GSP30abhiprvu:1515: yat punaridaṃ yoginām icchāmātreṇa purasenādivaicitryanirmāṇaṃ dṛṣṭam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1516: tatra upādānaṃ prasiddhamṛtkāṣṭha-śukra -- śoṇi -- tādivaicitryamayaṃ na saṃbhavatyeva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1517: na hi evaṃ vaktuṃ śakyam ---- sarvagatāḥ paramāṇavo yogīcchayā jhaṭiti saṃghaṭitāḥ kāryam ārapsyante iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1519: na ca etat prasiddham ---- pramāṇubhya eva sthūlaṃ ghaṭādi jāyate iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1521: tathāpi niyatasahakārisamavalambanam karacaraṇādivyāpāre viśiṣṭadeśakāladharmādhipatyayogaḥ śikṣābhyāsaprakarṣa iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1522: iyati ca āṃśrīyamāṇe yogī kumbhaṃ nirmimāṇaḥ kumbhakāraprasiddhasanastasāmagrīsanarjanapuraḥsaraṃghaṭaṃ ghaṭayan kumbhakāra eva syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1524: tatra yogisaṃvida eva sā tādṛśī śaktiḥ ---- yat ābhāsavaicitryarūpam arthajātaṃ prakāśayati iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1525_0: tadasti saṃbhavaḥ ---- yat saṃvit eva abhyupagatasvātantryā apratīdhātalakṣaṇāt icchāviśeṣavaśāt
GSP30abhiprvu:1525_1: saṃvido 'nidhikātmatāyā anapāyāt antaḥsthitameva sat bhāvajātam idamityevaṃ prāṇabuddhidehādeḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1525_2: vitīrṇakiyanmātrasaṃvidūpāt svātantryaṃ kiṃ na abhyupagamyate svasaṃvedanasiddham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1527: evakāreṇa idamāha ---- sarveṇa tāvat vādinā viṣayavyavasthāpanaṃ saṃvidrūpam anapahnavanīyam ādisiddhaṃ hi tat iti uktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1528: tasya ca svātantryameva devaśabdanirdiṣṭaṃ cidrūpatvam iti kim aparakāraṇānveṣaṇavyasanitayā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1529: hi yasmāt evaṃ prakāśayati deva iti saṃbhāvyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1530: tasmāt kiṃ bāhyena anupapattinā iti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ //7//
GSP30abhiprvu:1532: tatra kiṃ makurapratibimbitaghaṭādidṛṣṭāntena jñānapratibimbatābhāsavaicitrye vijñānadarpaṇātiriktaṃ tata eva bāhyābhimataṃ hetuṃ kalpayema ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1533: kiṃ vā yogidṛṣṭāntena saṃvitsvātantryameva hetubhāvena brūyāma ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1534: tadidaṃ sāṃśayikaṃ vartate iti āśaṅkya bāhyārthānumānasaṃbhāvanāṃ sūtradvayena apākartumāha @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1540: na kevalam anantaraślokanirdiṣṭābhiḥ yuktabhiḥ pratyakṣeṇa bāhyo'rtho na bhāsate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1541: iyadeva hi pratyakṣaṃ tacca nīlaṃ bhāti iti svaprakāśasaṃvidrūpaṃ nādhikaṃ kiṃcit iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1542: yāvat anumānenāpi na asya bāhyāsya siddhiḥ iti apiśabdasyābhiprāyaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1543: tatra anumānam atra naiva pravartitum utsahate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1544: pravṛttamapi na prakṛtasiddhim ādavyāt iti anena sūtradvayena upadarśyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1547: tena yat sarvathā anābhātapūrvam ananubhūtacaraṃ tatra anumānam anumitivyāpāro vikalpātmā naiva kenacit vādinā iṣyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1548: nanu bhavatu pratyakṣato dṛṣṭe 'numāne saṃkathā iyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1549: sāmānyato dṛṣṭe tu kiṃ vakṣyasi yathā arthopalabdhyā indriyānumāne ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1550: ucyate ---- tatrāpi vikalpena yathā so'rthaḥ spṛśyate tathā anumeya iti sthitiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1551: vikalpaśca na indriyādikam arthaṃ kenacit saṃniveśaviśeṣādinā viśeṣātmanā spṛśati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1552: api tu kiṃcidupalabdheḥ kāraṇam iti amunā svabhāvena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1553: sa ca svabhāvaḥ kāraṇatālakṣaṇaḥ pratyakṣagṛhīta eva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1554: tathā ca bījāt aṅkuraḥ tantubhyaḥ paṭa ityādau kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pratyakṣānupalambhabalena tāvat niśceyaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1555: tatra ca pratyakṣaṃ pratyābhāsaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ bhajate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1556: vimarśalakṣaṇasya pramitivyāpārasya ekaikaśabdavācye'rthe pravṛtteḥ tadanusāritvācca pramāṇasya iti vakṣyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1558: iti / ābhāsamātraṃ ca sāmānyam iti nir.eṣuate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1559: anupalambho'pi anyopalambharūpa ābhāsamātraviśrānta eva iti kāraṇābhāso viśeṣaśūnyaḥ parigṛhīta eva bījāt aṅkura iti pratītau /
GSP30abhiprvu:1560: yat yasya niyamam anuvidhatte avyatiriktam tat tasya kāryam iti pratighaṭaṃ mṛttikādirūpahetutadvanmātrasya āmāsāt //8//
GSP30abhiprvu:1563: anābhāse ca nāsti vikalparūpasya anumānasya vyāpāraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1564: grāmagṛhādestu yat bāhyaṃ tat agrāmādirūpaṃ na ucyate pratyekaṃ vāṭānūpakuṇyatulādeḥ bāhyatvaprasaṅgāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1566: tasmāt grāmabāhyam ābhāsabāhyam iti ca śabdasāmyamātram etat na vastusāmyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1567: evaṃ ye vikalpe vastu na ābhāti iti manyante teṣāmapi tāvat anumānavikalpo na bāhye upapannaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1568: asmābhistu upapāditam ---- adhyavasāyasyāpi ābhāsamānaviṣayatvam bhrāntitve cāvasāyasya iti sūtre /
GSP30abhiprvu:1569: tena anumānavikalpātmanāpi prakāśena yadi anāviṣṭo nīlādiḥ arthaḥ tat na anumita eva syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1571: tarhi prāgivārtho 'prakāśaḥ syāt iti nyāyena prakāśamātrasvabhāva eva , na bāhyaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1572: tena bāhye sādhye yat kiṃcit pramāṇam ānīyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1575: kenāpi prakāreṇa pratyakṣātmanā anumeyātmanā vā ābhāsanam ābhāso bāhyasya anābhāsasya na kadācit abhūt iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1576: tasmāt siddham cidātmaiva hi deva iti //9//
GSP30abhiprvu:1577: nanu antaḥsthitaṃ bahiḥ prakāśayedityuktaṃ tat antaḥsthitatvam upapādanīyam iti āśaṅkya āha @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1580: astyeva na vinā tasmādicchāmarśaḥ pravartate // Ipk_1,5.10 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1587: kiṃ tu tatra aham iti ucite parāmarśe yo 'yam idantāparāmarśaḥ saiva bāhyatā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1588: tacca iha antaḥsthitatvam ahamityetāvatā citsamucitenaiva bapuṣā parāmarśanameva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1591: yadi hi na syāt kumbhakṛto ghaṭaṃ karavāṇi iti ya uttarakriyāmapekṣya icchāśabdavācyaḥ parāmarśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1592: eṣaṇīyena sa parāmṛśyena aniyantritaḥ cet tataḥ paṭecchāpi sā na kasmāt iti saṃkīryeran vyavahārāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1593: atha tatrāpi ca eṣaṇīyaḥ tadānīmeva nirmitaḥ san tathā jātaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1594: tarhi tannirmāṇaṃ cidātmani vinecchayā nopapannam iti tiṣṭhāsorevamicchaiva hetutā ityatra varṇayiṣyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1595: tacca icchāntaramapi viṣayaniyantritaṃ na vā iti vikalpe 'navasthā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1598: atha tatrāpi tadānīmeva iti kṛtvā anavasthā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1599_0: tasmāt sarvo 'yaṃ bhāvarāśiḥ cidātmani aham ityeva vapuṣā satatāvabhāsuravapuḥ aiśvaryarūpācca
GSP30abhiprvu:1599_1: svātantryalakṣaṇāt svāmibhāvāt vicitreṇa vapuṣā kramākramādinā saṃvit enaṃ bahiḥkaroti
GSP30abhiprvu:1600: tatrāpi kvacit ābhāse pramātḥn ekīkaroti nitambanīnṛtta iva prekṣakān /
GSP30abhiprvu:1602: śarīraprāṇabuddhisukhādyābhāsāṃśeṣu tu bhedasya avigalanāt na sarvathā aikyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1603: ata eva pratikṣaṇaṃ pramātṛsaṃyojanaviyojanavaicitryeṇa parameśvaro viśvaṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhārādinā prapañcayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:1611: iti / tasmāt sthitam antaḥsthitaṃ bhāvajātaṃ tena vinā tadviṣayasya parāmarśāyogāt iti //10//
GSP30abhiprvu:1613: sa ca avikalpaśuddhasaṃvidvapuṣi bhagavati kathaṃ syāt ityāśaṅkyāha @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:1618: anavabhāsasya ca aprakāśasya ghaṭādeḥ parasparaparihāreṇa dvayoḥ svātmani cet vyavasthānam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1619: tat ghaṭapaṭayoḥ iva idamjaḍam idaṃ jaḍam iti durupapādaṃ vailakṣaṇyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1622: tarhi saṃbandhamātreṇa mṛt api ghaṭasya iti ajaḍā syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1623: atha na svasaṃbandhamātram api tu avabhāso 'rthasya prakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1624: tarhi arthātmanā sa prakāśa iti samāpatitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1625: na ca anyātmanā anyasya prakāśa upapannaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1627: tarhi avabhāso'pi ghaṭasya kāraṇam iti ghaṭo'pi ajaḍaḥ syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1628: atha anyena satāpi ghaṭena yato 'vabhāsasya pratibimbarūpā cchāyā dattā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1629: tām asau adabhāso bibhrat ghaṭasya iti ucyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1631: tarhi sphaṭikasalilamakurādiḥ api evaṃbhūta eva iti ajaḍa eva syāt /
