GSP30abhiprvu:2231: na jaḍānāṃ svataḥ samanvayaḥ kadācidapi iti pratipādayitum //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:2237: tajjñānāṃ tadvikalpānāṃ tanniścayānāṃ ca deśakramaṃ kālakramaṃ cātyajatām ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2241: yato hi asau samanvayaḥ sakṛdābhāsena deśakālākāramiśrīkaraṇātmanā yojanābhāsena sādhayituṃ śakyaḥ nānyathā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2242: na hi pṛthakpṛthak parikṣīṇeṣu srotaḥsu taduhyamānāḥ tṛṇolapādayaḥ samanvayaṃ kaṃcit yānti iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2243: anekatvena deśakālādibheda ityāśayena sakṛcchabdaḥ tanniṣedhatātparyeṇa prayuktaḥ //3//
GSP30abhiprvu:2244: tatra ko 'sau samanvaya ityāśaṅkya bahutaravyāpakaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ tāvat darśayati @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2249: tatra viṣayasyāsau smṛtiḥ na nūtanaḥ prakāśaḥ api tu asya sa prakāśaḥ prācyo 'nubhava eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2250: sa cānubhavo jñānarūpatvena jñeyarūpatvābhāvāt na jñānāntarasaṃvedyaḥ api tu svaprakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2251: sa ca smṛtikāle yadi asan tat kathaṃ prakāśatām ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2252: bhavatu vā asau tathāpi smṛtiḥ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2256: na tu aparaṃ svasaṃvedanavyatiriktaṃ pratyakṣam anumānādikaṃ vā tatra kramate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2257: tataśca tāvatkālāpi avichinnamekaṃ yat svasaṃvedanaṃ tadeva pramātṛttvam iti siddham /
GSP30abhiprvu:2258: anyatra anubhavitari smartā anyo na upapadyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2260: idānīṃ tu svasaṃvedanaikībhāvena bhaṅgyantareṇa iti viśeṣaḥ //5//
GSP30abhiprvu:2263_0: bādhābhāve tat kathaṃ syād ityāśaṅkya so 'pi ayaṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ satyāsatyapravibhājanayā
GSP30abhiprvu:2263_1: viśveṣāṃ vyavahārāṇāṃ jīvitabhūto na ekena pramātṛtattvena vinā ghaṭata iti vitatya darśayati @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2267: bādhābhāve prāmāṇyam ityetadartham avaśyasamarthyo yo bādhavyavahāraḥ so 'pi katham iti api śabdasyārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2268: iha śuktyā tāvat rajatasya na kācit bādhā nāma kriyamāṇā dṛśyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2269: śuktijñānena rajatajñānaṃ bādhyate ityapi na yuktam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2270: svasmin viṣaye ātmani ca svarūpe dvayoḥ jñānayoḥ pariniṣṭhitayoḥ viśr/
GSP30abhiprvu:2272: atha ayaṃ parasparaparihāra eva virodhaḥ tarhi sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ virodhāt bādhyabādhakabhāvasya svātmani pariniṣṭhaiva na labhyeti sutarāṃ vighaṭeta satyetarapravibhāgaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2274: etaduktaṃ bhavati ---- yadi jñānaṃ svayaṃ naśyati tadā kiṃ jñānāntareṇa asya kṛtam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2275: na hi tena tatkāle 'saṃbhavatā tasya viṣayāpahāraḥ kartuṃ śakyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2276: na rājatam ityapi jñānaṃ svaṃ rajatābhāvaṃ viṣayīkurvat na viṣayam apaharet rajatajñānasya /
GSP30abhiprvu:2278: tatrāpi sarveṣāṃ jñānām iyameva saraṇiriti kiṃcideva bādhyam iti kathaṃ syāt ?
GSP30abhiprvu:2279: yadā tu rajatajñānaṃ śuktijñānaṃ ca ekatra svasaṃvedane viśrānyataḥ tadā etat upapadyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2280: tathā hi ---- ekatrāpi pramātṛtattve viśrāmyatāṃ jñānānāṃ naikaprakāraiva viśrāntiḥ api tu vicitratayaiva sā saṃvedyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2281: tathā hi ---- nīlam iti utpalam iti jñāne pramātari viśrāmyantī parasparoparāgābhāsena viśrāmyataḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2283: śuktikā iti na rajatam iti vā jñānaṃ rajatam iti jñānasya unmūlanaṃ tadīyavimarśātmakapramārūpavyāpārānuvartanavidhvaṃsaṃ kurvat pramātari pratiṣṭhāṃ bhajate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2284: evaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvādau viśrāntivaicitryaṃ prameyāsaṃbhavi pramātrā svātantryeṇa nirmitaṃ tata eva asya pramāsvatantratādāyi vācyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2285: evamekatra pramātari pūrvajñānasya parivarjanena yato niścitā sthitiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2287: nīlādivat kila tānapi vyavahārān sa eva parameśvaraḥ svātantryāt ābhāsayati tat te 'pi satyā eveti //6//
GSP30abhiprvu:2292: iha śuktikājñānaṃ svātmānaṃ saṃvidat svātmābhinnaṃ pramāṇatvaṃ budhyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2294: tatparicchedanāntarīyakaśca anyavyavaccheda ityaśuktijñānarūpasya rajatajñānasya apramāṇatvavedanaṃ tadeva ucyate yat etat śuktikāsaṃvedanābhinnapramāṇatvavedanam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2295: na ca etat apūrvaṃ yat vastvantarajñānameva vastvantarābhāvajñānam iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2298: ataśca bādhyabādhakatvam evaṃ siddham iti cet asmābhiḥ ucyate ---- tat kiṃ pramātraikyeneti //7//
GSP30abhiprvu:2299: atra prasaṅgāt abhāvavyavahārasya siddhau tattvamupapādayiṣyan dṛṣṭāntameva tāvat paradarśane dūṣayati @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2303: yo dṛṣṭānta uktaḥ sa eva na ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2304: kuta iti cet ucyate iha bhūtalaṃ na ghaṭaḥ iti tādātmyena abhāvo vyavahartavyaḥ kadācit ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2305: kadācit vyatirekeṇa iha bhūtale ghaṭo na iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2308: upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptirapi hi yasya nāsti piśācādeḥ svabhāvabalāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2309_1: tasyāpi tādātmyenāyamabhāvo gṛhyate bhūtalaṃ na piśāco na śabdaḥ iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2310: yatra tu dṛśyatvaṃ viśeṣaṇam avaśyam apayogi tatra vyatirekeṇa abhāve vyavahartavye na eṣo 'bhyupāyaḥ //8//
GSP30abhiprvu:2319: iti satyapi ghaṭe katham abhāvo vyatirekeṇa na vyavahriyate atra bhūtale ghaṭo nāsti iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2322: bhinnasya ghaṭasya abhāvaṃ sādhayati na tu sarvadā iti kena prakāreṇa bhavet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2323: etena atra bhūtale piśāco nāsti ityapi syāditi āpatitaṃ mantavyam //9//
GSP30abhiprvu:2324: nanvevaṃ vyatirekābhāvaniṣṭho vyavahāro loke tāvat avigītaḥ asyāṃcideva daśāyāṃ dṛṣṭaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2325: tatra kā gatirityāśaṅkya cirantanairaparidṛṣṭaṃ tatsiddhiprakāraṃ darśayati @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2329: iha bhāva eva bhāvāntarasya abhāva iti vyavahartavyaḥ iti ayaṃ tāvat aparityājyaḥ prātītikaḥ panthāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2330: tatra bhāvasya bhāvāntareṇa ya ādhāryādhārabhāvaḥ sa eva bhāvatadabhāvayoḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2331: tataśca bhūtale ghaṭavyatiriktaṃ vastvantaraṃ śilādikam ālokapuñjādikaṃ vā yat cākṣuṣe jñāne bhāti tadeva vyavahriyate bhūtale ghaṭābhāvaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2333_0: yatrāpi nāsti cakṣurvyāpāro netranimīlanasaṃtamasādau tatrāpi bhūtale ghaṭocitakaṭhinasparśaviviktaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:2333_1: mṛdum uṣṇaṃ śītam anuṣṇāśītaṃ vā gṛhṇan tameva atra ghaṭābhāva iti vyavaharati vāyusparśasya
GSP30abhiprvu:2335: padārthastu ---- kiṃ tu iti svamatopakṣepāya svapratibhāpraśnaparāmarśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2336: kiṃ punaratra nyāyyamiti tatrāha tatra bhūtale ālokacayaḥ tāvat asti jñeyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2338: tasya ālokacayasya sparśasya vā yat svajñānam anyaghaṭādiviviktena svena rūpeṇa jñānam tat kartṛ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2339: tasya ālokādeḥ aghaṭarūpatāṃ ghaṭābhāvarūpatāṃ tatra bhūtale sādhayati iti śakyo '; yamarthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2341: āntaraprāṇaspandanajanitasūkṣmaśabdākarṇanācca śrotrādisākalyaṃ saṃbhavāyamānaḥ tameva śabdam ekajñānasaṃsargiṇaṃ śṛṇvan śabdāntaraṃ niṣedhayati na iha anyaḥ śabdaḥ iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2343: rasagandhasparśābhāvo 'pi dantodakarasaṃ tripuṭikāgandhaṃ kāyīyaṃ ca sparśaṃ saṃvedayamānenaiva rasābhāvo vedyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2346: acirapravṛttatattadviṣayānubhavakalpitasya tadaiva dhvaṃsānāśaṅkanāt karaṇasya kāraṇasākalyaniścayaḥ kim ekajñānasaṃsargitayā iti cet na ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2348: nanvevam adṛśyāsyāpi piśācādeḥ niṣedhavyavahāro vyatirekeṇāpi prāpnoti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2349: sa hi ālokapuñjo yathā ghaṭāt anyaḥ tadvat piśācāderapi /
GSP30abhiprvu:2353: adṛśyo bhūtalasyāntarna niṣedhyaḥ sa sarvathā // Ipk_1,7.11 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2354: ālokapuñjo yadyapi piśācād vyatirikto yadyapi ca āloko 'sti apiśācātmā ityetāvat siddhyati tathāpi atra piśāco nāsti ityetat aśakyam adhyavasātum ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2357: ataśca siddhyatīdam atra ghaṭo nāsti iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2358: piśācastu tādṛksvabhāvo yo bhūtalamadhye ālokamadhye 'pi vā bhavan bhūtalasya ālokasya vā tāṃ nibiḍatāṃ na vihanti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2359: tataśca ālokamadhye tasya saṃbhāvanāt kathaṃ vyatirekeṇa niṣedhavyavahāraḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2360: evaṃ rūpamadhye rasādeḥ saṃbhāvanāt tasyāpi aniṣedhaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2361: yadyapi anālokaḥ ālokāt anyaḥ piśācaḥ tathāpi asau bhūtalasya antarmadhye 'dṛśyo bhavati iti saṃbhāvyate yathā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2362: tadvadeva ālokasyābhyantarepi so'sti iti saṃbhāvyata eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2363_0: tataśca yadyapi ālokastato 'nyaḥ ityanena pathā niṣiddhaḥ piśācaḥ tathāpi sarvaprakāreṇa
GSP30abhiprvu:2363_1: na niṣiddhaḥ iti tadabhāvanibandhanāḥ kathaṃ tatra vyavahārāḥ pravartantām iti ślokārthaḥ //11 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2364: evaṃ prasaṅgāt abhāvavyavahārasya tattvam upadarśya prakṛte yojayati @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2368: yathā āloko ghaṭābhāva iti āloke gṛhīte prāk gṛhītasya ghaṭasya na kiṃcit āyātam tathaiva śuktijñānaṃ rūpyajñānābhāva iti iyat saṃbhāvyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2369: yathā ghaṭajñānaṃ ghaṭajñānaprāmāṇyasaṃvit paṭajñānābhāvaḥ paṭajñānābhāvaprāmāṇyasaṃvit iyatā ca na pūrvapravṛttaṃ paṭajñānam apramāṇībhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2370: eṣā hi tasya ghaṭajñānasya svarūpacintā sarvā na jñānāntarasya ādyasya kimapi ato jātam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2372: na rajatam idam iti ca jñānameva svātmanā prakāśatām ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2373: ahaṃ śuktau rajatābhāve ca pramāṇaṃ na tu rajate iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2374: tāvatā tu prāktanasya rajatajñānasya na kiṃcit vṛttam iti tadviṣayīkṛtaṃ rajataṃ katham asatyaṃ syāt //12//
GSP30abhiprvu:2375: nanvidamityanena tadeva parāmṛśyate yatra rajatajñānam abhūt tatraiva idānīṃ na rajatam iti śuktiḥ iti ca jñānaṃ pramāṇabhūtaṃ jātam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2376: tat ato 'numīyate ---- tat prācyaṃ rajatajñānam apramāṇam iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2377: na hi etat saṃbhavati ---- viruddhaviṣayadvayāvagāhi jñānadvayaṃ pramāṇam ekatra viṣayībhavati iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2382: na kevalaṃ svasaṃvedanāt na siddhyati bādhā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2387: iha dharmiṇi siddhe siddhena hetunā smaryamāṇavyāptikena sādhyadharmāyogavyavacchedo 'numānavyāpāraḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2388: iha ca prācye rūpyajñāne dharmiṇi aprāmāṇyaṃ sādhyo dharmaḥ tatra śuktikājñānaṃ vā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2391: na caitat yuktam tatkāle prācyarūpyabodhasya dharmiṇo 'bhāvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2394: ataḥ smaryamāṇaṃ taddharmi syāt ityapi asat /
GSP30abhiprvu:2395: atha śuktiḥ na rajatajñānasya viṣaya iti sādhyate śuktikājñānaviṣayatvāt iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2398: kena caivaṃ vyāptirgṛhītā ---- yatra idānīm anyat jñānam tatra pūrvam anyat na bhavati iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2401: etena etat pratyuktam ---- ekasmin viṣaye kathaṃ jñānadvayaṃ syāt iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2403: te hi tāvat svātmani svaviṣaye ca viśrāmyate iti uktam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2405: na ca tathābhūtamapi vyavadhānam atra pratītau saṃvedyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2407: ata eva etadapi aśakyaṃ vaktum ---- mā bhūt bādhā nāma iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2408: evaṃ parapakṣe 'nupapattiṃ pradarśya svapakṣe ekapramātṛpariniṣṭhiteḥ udiyāt bādhyabādhakabhāva iti vākyena pratijñātaṃ nigamayati ---- yuktā sā ekasmāt pramātuḥ yadi jāyeta iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2409: sa eva hi tathā nirmātā iti vyākhyātameva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2410: sthite caivaṃ yadi vyavahārasiddhaye 'nyathānupapattirapyucyate tat ucyatāṃ kāmam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2413: yāvat avāntaravyavahārā api ye krayavikrayādayaḥ samalāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2416: vyavahārā hi sarve samanvayaprāṇāḥ iti upasaṃhārakrameṇa darśayati @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2422: tathā ślokāntarairuktena vyavahārodāharaṇaprakāreṇa idamapi mantavyam ---- yat vibhau deśakālānavacchinne ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2423: ata eva atyarthabhinnaiḥ māyābalāt bhedaikaprāṇitaiḥ nīlasukhādyābhāsaiḥ pratibimbakalpaiḥ anatiriktatayā vartamānaiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2426: anubhava eva atra dṛḍhatamaṃ pramāṇam iti yāvat ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2427: anubhūyate ca sopadeśaiḥ avadhānaparaiḥ yena eṣāṃ yaiva saṃsāradaśāsaṃmatā vyavahāradaśā saiva pramātṛtattvaprakhyātmikā śivabhūmiḥ / yaduktam @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2438: nityaṃ maheśvaraḥ siddhaḥ siddhānāṃ taṃ stumaḥ śivam //}
GSP30abhiprvu:2439: evaṃ jñānasmaraṇāpohanāni vyutpādya eṣāmekamāśrayaṃ vinā vyavahāro na yuktaḥ iti nirūpitam etāvatā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2441: ityatra yat uktam ekaḥ iti tat parighaṭitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2444: yadatraiva maheśvaraḥ iti uktam tanmāheśvaryaṃ svātantryarūpamupapādayitavyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2445: tacca jñānaviṣayaṃ kriyā ---- viṣayaṃ ca ityubhayaprakāram ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2446: tatra yato bhagavān jñātā kartā ca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2447: yadyapi ca prakāśavimarśātmakaṃ cidekaghanam ekameva saṃvidrūpam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2448: tathāpi vyutpādanāya tatparighaṭita eva ayaṃ vibhāgaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2449: tena jñānātmakakriyāviṣayaṃ svātantryaṃ yadyapi kriyāśaktirūpaṃ tathāpi tat jñānādhikāra eva nirṇetavyaṃ tadviṣayatvāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:2450: evaṃ ca jñātṛśabdārthaḥ prakṛtitaḥ pratyayataśca saṃpūrṇatayā nirṇīto bhavati /
GSP30abhiprvu:2452: tatrābhāseṣu yat svātantryaṃ tadeva jñānaśaktiviṣayaṃ svātantryaṃ saṃpadyate iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2457: tatra abhāsāntarāpekṣī ca ābhāso 'nyathā vā iti ślokena uktvā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2458: sa eva ābhāsa eka iti ślokāntareṇa ucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2459: arthakriyābhāso 'pi tathaiva ābhāsaniyata iti ślokadvayena uktvā kasmin ābhāse sā arthakriyā iti punaḥ ślokadvayena /
GSP30abhiprvu:2463: ślokāntareṇa maheśvaratvam upasaṃharatā bhāvinaḥ kriyādhikārasya upakṣepa iti saṅkṣepārtha āhnikasya /
GSP30abhiprvu:2465: nanu yadi parameśvaraniṣṭhatayaiva samasto 'yaṃ vyavahāraḥ tat asya sphuṭatvāsphuṭatvaprāyaprasiddhavaicitryānupapattiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2466: yena kila ayam anuprāṇitaḥ sa eka eva bhagavān ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2467: na ca tadvyatirekeṇa vyavahārasya nijaṃ kiṃcana tattvam utpaśyāma ityāśaṅkyāha @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2473: kevalam etāvatā ābhāsānāṃ bhedo na punararthāvabhāsasya svātmagataḥ kvacidapi bheda iti ślokadvayasya saṃmelitasya saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2474: yasminneva kāle sa ābhāsa ābhāti tatkāle eva bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2475: yat akṣasāmakṣyaṃ bāhyendriyapratyakṣatvaṃ nāma ābhāsāntaraṃ paśyāmītyevaṃrūpaṃ tatsāpekṣāḥ tadvyāmiśrāḥ kvacit ābhāsā bhavanti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2477: andhaviṣayaḥ andhakārasthapramātṛviṣayaḥ punaḥ yo 'nyo vyavahārosphuṭatāmayaḥ tatra te ābhāsā anyathā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2478: tathā hi jātyandhasya bāhyendriyapratyakṣatvalakṣaṇam ābhāsāntaraṃ naivāsti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2479: dṛṣṭavatastu andhībhūtasya saṃtamasashtitasya ca tātkālikaṃ tat nāsti api tu prāktanameva bāhyendriyapratyakṣatvam anusaṃdhatte //1//
GSP30abhiprvu:2480: tasmāt arthāvabhāsasya keṣucidapi vikalpeṣu sattāyāṃ svarūpe viśeṣo 'sti iti saṃbhāvanā na kartavyā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2481: te hi vikalpā bhāvivastugāmino vā bhaviṣyanniṣṭhā vā bhavantu avrtamānaniṣṭhā vā atītavastuviśrāntā vā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2488: te punarābhāsāḥ svātantryeṇa yadā bhagavatā saṃyojyante viyojyante ca tadā ayaṃ sphuṭatvādirvyavahāraḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2489: nīlamityābhāsasya utprekṣe ityādyābhāsāntaravyavacchedanena paśyāmīti ābhāsavyāmiśraṇāyāṃ sphuṭatāvyavahāraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2491: parameśvarasvarūpāntarbhūtatve punarābhāsānāṃ na kutaścit vyavacchedaḥ na kenacit vyāmiśraṇā iti //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:2492: nanvetat nīlādiṣu upapadyatāṃ yatra bāhyendriyavyāpāro 'sti sukhādau tu tadabhāvāt kathaṃ vaicitryamityāśaṅkyāha @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2499_0: duḥkhe ahikaṇṭakādau ca taddhetau atīte 'nāgate vā yadyapi ābhāsaḥ sa eva tathāpi
GSP30abhiprvu:2499_1: atītamidam anāgatamidam iti ābhāsāntareṇa yato vyāmiśraṇā anubhavāmīti ābhāsācca
GSP30abhiprvu:2499_2: yato vyavacchedaḥ tena vidyamāneṣvapi teṣu tasya pramātuḥ tena prakāreṇa sthitirna
GSP30abhiprvu:2499_3: bhavati yathā pūrvan abhūt aham adhunā sukho duḥkhīti samarjitatattannimitasāmagrīko vā iti //3 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2500_0: yadā tu vikalpena tāni vastūni bāḍham ullikhati tadā paunaḥpunyaviśiṣṭasukhataddhetūllekhanābhidhānakāraṇābhāsānupraveśāt
GSP30abhiprvu:2500_1: ābhāsāntaravyāmiśraṇātmanā tenaiva asmaduktena prakāreṇa na punaranyena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2502: sukhī ahamityādikena sthitiḥ bhavati iti saṃbhāvyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2503: ucitametat yatastadānīṃ sphuṭatvābhāsamiśraṃ sukhābhāsam upalakṣayati asau /
GSP30abhiprvu:2505: nanu iyatā kimuktam bhavati ---- bāhyarūpāḥ sragādayaḥ sukhādihetavo bāhyajanitāśca sukhādayaḥ sukhyahamiti abhimānahetavaḥ iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2506: tataśca bāhyatvābhāve tajjanyatvābhāve ca na tathā uktaṃ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2507: tatra ca ta eva na kecit ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2508: tataśca kathamuktam arthāvabhāsasya sattāyāṃ na kvāpi viśeṣa iti sattāyā eva abhāvāt ityāśaṅkyāha @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2511: nātmā sattā tatasteṣāmāntarāṇāṃ satāṃ sadā // Ipk_1,8.5 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2513: duḥkhaṃ nāsti mameti ye bhāvābhāsā abhāvābhāsāśca teṣāṃ bāhyatvaṃ nāma ātmā svarūpaṃ na bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2514: na hi sukhamityasya svarūpaṃ bāhyam iti vapuṣā bhāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2515_0: sukhasya hi sukhameva svarūpam kevalaṃ bāhyatvaṃ nāma abhāsāntaram īśvareṇa svātantryabalādeva
GSP30abhiprvu:2515_1: yadā tatra sukhābhāse miśratayā bhāsyate tadā tat tasya upādhirūpatām uparañcakatāṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:2516: tataśca yathā nīlābhāsābhāve utpalābhāsasya na kiṃcit vṛttaṃ svarūpato rājābhāsābhāve vā puruṣābhāsasya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2517: tathā bāhyatvābhāsābhāve 'pi sukhābhāsasya duḥkhābhāvābhāsasya kāntābhāsasya ca na svarūpataḥ kācana mlānatā iti āntarāṇāṃ sadaiva sthitiḥ eṣām //5//
GSP30abhiprvu:2518: iha antaḥkaraṇe buddhidarpaṇātmani nīlādīnāmavabhāsānām āntaratvamapyasti antaḥkaraṇamadhyebhavatvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2521: atra ca avasthādvaye 'pi arthakriyām amī kurvantyeva antato jñānaṃ svaviṣayam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2522: yat punaḥ pramātṛtādātmyalakṣaṇam āntaratvaṃ tatra amī kathaṃ na kāṃcit arthakriyāṃ vidadhīran ityāśaṅkyāha @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2528: eṣām ābhāsānām arthakriyā na kācit asti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2529: sā hi arthakriyā bhede sati bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2530: sa hi nīlābhāsaḥ pītābhāsāt yato bhidyate yataśca pramāturbhidyate tataḥ svena sādhyāṃ bhinnam arthakriyāṃ tasya pramātuḥ kuryāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2531: na ca eṣa tadā bhede 'sti pramātraikyāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:2533: tathā ca kāntābhāsasya bāhyatve 'pi sati ābhāsāntarasya āliṅganalakṣaṇasya vyapagame dūrībhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2534: iyam iti ca ābhāsāntarasya upagame 'nyaiva prāktanāhlādaviparītā dṛśyate arthakriyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2535: ata ābhāsabhedābhāvaḥ yataḥ pramātraikyakṛte āntaratve tasmāt na arthakriyā iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2536: arthakriyābhāso 'pi ca ābhāsāntarameva iti arthakriyākāritvamapi na bhāvānāṃ sattvam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2538: nanu ca bāhyābhāsavyatibhedanakāle āntarābhāso virodhāt vicchinna iti katham idam uktam āntarāṇāṃ ya ābhāsaḥ sa sadā iti ?
GSP30abhiprvu:2543: iha avabhāsānāṃ sadaiva bāhyatābhāsatadabhāvayoḥ api antareva pramātṛprakāśa eva sthitiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2545: anyathā naiva prakāśeran iti uktaṃ yataḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2546: yadā tu māyāśaktyā vicchedāvabhāsanasvātantryarūpayā bāhyatvam eṣām ābhāsyate tadā tat avalambya avabhāsamānānām asau sthitiḥ bahirapi antarapi /
GSP30abhiprvu:2547: nāyam antarābhāso bāhyatvasya virodho pratyuta sarvābhāsabhittibhūto 'sau ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2548: tat kathaṃ virodhaḥ iti yuktamuktam sadaiva āntarāṇāṃ sattā iti //7//
GSP30abhiprvu:2553: dṛśyate ca vikalpollikhitaḥ piśācādiḥ trāsādividhāyī ityāśaṅkyāha @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2556: pramātraikātmyamāntaryaṃ tato bhedo hi bāhyatā // Ipk_1,8.8 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2557: vimarśaviśeṣarūpe vikalpajñāne ya ullikhyamānaḥ kāntācaurādiḥ arthaḥ sopi bāhyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2559: yasmāt so 'pi pramātuḥ sakāśāt pṛthageva prathate ayam iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2560: yacca pramātari ahamityeva viśrāntatvaṃ tat āntaratvam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2564: tataśca pramātari nikaṭaṃ tādātmya ---- prāptameva iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2565: tato yat bhinnaṃ tat bāhyameva iti yuktā ullekhasyāpi arthakriyā //8//
GSP30abhiprvu:2567: antaḥkaraṇagocarasya tu kiṃ kṛtaṃ tat ityāśaṅkya āha @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2571: antarvikalpapratibimbatasya nīlādeḥ yo bahirātmanā pramātṛvicchinnena svabhāvena prakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2572: sa bhartuḥ antarābhāsān bibhrato bahiḥ sṛṣṭiṃ ca puṣṇataḥ īśvarasyaiva icchayā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2573: yathaiva cakṣurādiviṣayabhūtānāṃ pratyakṣajñānaśabdavācyo bāhyātmanā prakāśo nīlādīnām /
GSP30abhiprvu:2574: etaduktaṃ bhavati ---- kumbhakāravyāpāro nāma paramārthataḥ īśvarecchaiva tadabhāsitakāyaspandaparyantā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2576: tataśca tathā īśvarecchayā prakāśāt avahirbhūtā api nīlādyā bāhyakaraṇagocarībhūtāḥ kalpitāt pramātuḥ vicchinnarūpatvena bāhyatvena bhāsante ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2577: tathā antaḥkaraṇagocarībhūtā api iti ko viśeṣaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2578: sukhaduḥkhaprāyāstu bharatādyuktarūpāḥ sthāyivyabhicārirūpā ritinirvedādayo 'ntaḥkaraṇaikagocarībhūtā bahirātmanā bhānti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2579: saṅkalpeṣu yadyapi kṣetraJñasyaiva svātantryam tathāpi citparamārthatāyā nyagbhāvayitum aśakyatvāt īśvarasyaiva tat vastutaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2583: jīve niruddhā tatrāpi paramātmani sā sthitā //
GSP30abhiprvu:2585: iti / yatra tu anicchoreva kṣetrajñasya svarasavāhivyākṣepasārā sāṅkalpikī sṛṣṭiḥ tatra sphuṭaḥ īśvarasyaiva vyāpāraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2586: tasmāt sāṅkalpikānāmapi bahirbhāve parameśvarecchiava heturiti siddhāntaḥ //9//
GSP30abhiprvu:2587: adhunā pūrvoktam aikyaṃ māheśvaryaṃ ca nigamayati @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2590: prakāśaikyāttadekatvaṃ mātaikaḥ sa iti sthitam // Ipk_1,8.10 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2592: vimarśa eva devasya śuddhe jñānakriye yataḥ // Ipk_1,8.11 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2597: lokapaddhatiḥ lokamārgaḥ sarvo vyavahāro na saṃbhavet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2600: na caitat durghaṭam yato viṣayaprakāśa eva saṃvit ucyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2605: sa eva ca pramātā ucyate iti sthitam idānīmupapattitaḥ //10//
GSP30abhiprvu:2606: na ca asya asau prakāśalakṣaṇaḥ svātmā nīlādyuparāgaśca parāmarśan śūnya eva āste sphaṭikrama.eriva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2610: sa eva hi ahaṃbhāvātmā vimarśo devasya krīḍādimayasya śuddhe pāramārthikyau jñānakriye ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2611: prakāśarūpatā jñānaṃ tatraiva svātantryātmā vimarśaḥ kriyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2615: aparāvasthāyāṃ ca māyāpade idaṃbhāvaprādhānyena vartamāne iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2616: sarvathā tu vimarśa eva jñānaṃ tena vinā hi jaḍabhāvo 'sya syāt iti uktam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2617: sa eva ca kriyā iti bhāvinaḥ kriyādhikārasya upakṣepaṃ karoti iti śivam //
GSP30abhiprvu:2629: prakaṭayatu naḥ śrīmāngaurīpatiḥ sa ṛtaṃ param //1//}
GSP30abhiprvu:2632: atha kriyāśaktisvarūpaṃ vitasya nirṇetum adhikārāntaram ārabhyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2644: viṣayavibhāge ca sati vastutaḥ ekatraiva tayoḥ viśrāntiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2648: tatra pūrvokte jñānaśaktisamarthanopayoganimeye siddhe prameyāntaramapi ayatnataḥ siddham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2651: ata eva yadapyuktaṃ kriyā naikasya sakramā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2653: yat tāvat uktam jñānānyeva anubhavavikalparūpādibhinnāni na teṣām āśrayo 'sti kaścit ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2654: saṃskārācca smṛtiḥ siddhā jñānaṃ ca jaḍaṃ cet na arthasya prakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2655: ajaḍaṃ cet deśakālasaṃkocavaikalyāt ātmatattvāt abhinnam iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2656: tat tāvat pratikṣiptaṃ bhinnānāmanubhavādīnāmanupapatteḥ vitatya darśitatvāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:2659: tatsvātantryāvabhāsitajñeyoparāgavaśāt tu tasya saṃkocāvabhāsa ityapi darśitaṃ yataḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2660: na kevalam ato hetukalāpāt jñānaśakticodyāni nidāritāni ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2661: yāvat kriyāśaktiviṣayāṇyapi dūṣaṇāni ata eva hetukalāpāt apasāritāni iti apiśabdaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2662: ekā kriyā kramikā katham āśrayasya ekasvabhāvatve sati ghaṭate ?
GSP30abhiprvu:2668: yataḥ iyati pūrvapakṣe iyadeva jīvitamekamanekasvabhāvaṃ kathaṃ syāt iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2669: atra ca uktaṃ citsvabhāvasya darpaṇasyeva ekatānapabādhanena ābhāsabhedasaṃbhave ka iva dhirodha iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2670_0: tasmāt pratyabhijñānabalāt eko 'pi asau padārthātmā svabhāvabhedān viruddhān yāvat
GSP30abhiprvu:2670_1: aṅgīkurute tāvat te virodhādeva kramarūpatayā nirbhāsamānāḥ tamekaṃ kriyāśrayaṃ saṃpādayanti iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2677: ghaṭate na tu śāśvatyāḥ prābhavyāḥ syātprabhor iva // Ipk_2,1.2 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2678: utkṣipati apakṣipati hastam iti ye pūrvottare kṣaṇāḥ te kramavantaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2679: tatra yeṣāṃ ta eva kriyā kāṇādādīnāmiva teṣāṃ sā sakramā pratyakṣeṇaiva bhāti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2680_0: ye tu manyante tathābhūtapratyakṣaparidṛśyamānarūpabhedasaṃpādikā yā asau kācit atīntriyā
GSP30abhiprvu:2680_1: hastagatā śaktirvyāpārodbodharūpā nityānumeyā tasyāḥ kevalaṃ pūrvāparībhūtatvam anumīyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2681: iti laukikyāḥ kriyāyāḥ sakramatvaṃ kālaśakteḥ ābhāsavicchedanapradarśanasāmārthyarūpāt pārameśvarāt śaktiviśeṣāt ghaṭate upapadyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2682: yā tu prabhoḥ saṃbandhinī tadavyatiriktā kriyāśaktiḥ śāśvatī kālena aspṛṣṭā tasyāḥ sakramatvam asti iti saṃbhāvanā'pi nāsti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2683: yathā prabhoḥ sakramatvamasaṃbhāvyaṃ tathā asyā api / uktaṃ hi ----
GSP30abhiprvu:2686: nanu kālo viśeṣa bhāvam upagacchan bhāvaṃ svena rūpeṇa avacchinatti tatra ko'sau kālo nāma ityāśaṅkyāha @#-----
GSP30abhiprvu:2689: śītoṣṇe vātha tallakṣyaḥ krama eva sa tattvataḥ // Ipk_2,1.3 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2691_1: ta eva kālaḥ yato'pariniṣṭhitaṃ gamanapaṭhanādi tairiyattayā pariniṣṭhīyate parivartakairiva kanakam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2692: sa eva ca sūryādīnāṃ svabhāvaviśeṣastattvataḥ paramāśrataḥ kramo nānyaḥ kaścit kramo nāma ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2693: krama eva ca kālo nānyo'sau kaścit ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2698: iti tena tena pratimānavartakatulyena sūryasaṃcārādinā saha mīyamāno hemasthānīyo devadattābhāsasya vaicitryabheda ittham ucyate divasaṃ gacchati iti //3//
GSP30abhiprvu:2699: nanu evaṃ kālo nāma bhāvasvabhāva eva astu ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2706: tasmāt aruṇābhāsasya sadbhāvaḥ sphuṭaprabhāpuñjasya ca asadbhāvaḥ ityevaṃbhūto yo bheda ābhāsasadbhāvāsadbhāvābhyanuprāṇitaḥ tatkṛtaḥ kramaḥ kālātmā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2707: tau ca ābhāsānāṃ bhāvābhāvau na bāhyahetukṛtau iti vistārya upapāditam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2708: iti ya eva saṃvitsvabhāva ātmā svaprasaṃkalpādau ābhāsavacitryanirmāṇe prabhuḥ prabhaviṣṇuḥ iti svasaṃviditastata eva tau bhavataḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2709: sa hi ātmani nīlādīn ābhāsān ābhāsayan citratayā aparimeyayā bhāsayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2710: tathāhi ---- lohitābhāsaṃ ghaṭābhāsam unnatābhāsaṃ dṛḍhābhāsaṃ ca sāmānādhikaraṇyena ghaṭābhāsaṃ paṭābhāsaṃ ca pṛthaktvāvabhāsena anyonyatra ābhāsābhāvena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2713: yadā tu śaradābhāsaṃ hemantābhāsena ca sarvathaiva śūnyamābhāsayati hemantābhāsaṃ ca śāradābhāsena tadā kālātmā krama uttiṣṭhati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2714: iti seyam itthaṃbhūtā bhāvavaicitryaprathanaśaktiḥ bhagavataḥ kālaśaktiḥ ityucyate //4//
GSP30abhiprvu:2727: tasmāt vaicitryāt ābhāsyamānāt deśarūpo dūrādūravitatatvāvitatatvādiḥ kramo bhagavatā avabhāsyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2728: yadā tu gāḍhapratyabhijñāprakāśabalāt tadeva idaṃ hastasvarūpam iti pratipattau mūrterna bhedaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2729: atha ca anyānyarūpatvaṃ bhāti tadaikasmin svarūpe yadanyat anyat rūpaṃ tadvirodhavaśāt asahabhavatkriyā ucyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2730: tasyā yat vaicitryaṃ parimitāparimitātmakaṃ tadekānusandhānena phalasiddhyādinibandhanavaśāt yathāruci carcitena nirbhāsayan kālarūpaṃ kramamevāvabhāsayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:2731: na caitat vācyam ---- ekasvarūpasya katham anyat anyadrūpamiti ?
GSP30abhiprvu:2732: yato na asau kaścit bhāvo ya evaṃ kalpyate ;
GSP30abhiprvu:2735: na hi bhāsane virodhaḥ kaścit prabhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2744: dṛśyete ca abhavam ahaṃ bhavāmi bhavitāsmi iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2745: gṛhe tiṣṭhāmi araṇye devagṛhe iti ca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2746: kiṃ ca svayaṃ deśakālakramaśūnyasya kiṃ dūraṃ kim antikaṃ kiṃ vartamānaṃ kim atītaṃ kiṃ bhāvi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2747: iti pramātrāśrayo bhāveṣvapi kramo na yuktaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2748: na ca pramātṛnirapekṣeṣvapi teṣu svātmani dūratvādi bhūtatvādi vā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2754: svātmeva svātmanā pūrṇā bhāvā bhāntyamitasya tu // Ipk_2,1.7 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2755: sarveṣu vastuṣu ekānekarūpeṣu yaḥ kālātmā kramaḥ tasya ya ākaraḥ ---- utpattinibandhanam iti vyākhyātaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2756: ābhāsasya bhāvābhāvakṛto bhedaḥ sa śūnyaprāṇabuddhidehādeḥ bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2759: na hi tasya bhāsanaṃ svarūpaṃ nīlādivat jaḍatvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2762: yathā supto dehasya saṃsārayātrāpatitatve śūnyasya prāṇādeḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2767: sa ca yataḥ pramātā ahaṃbhāvasamāveśanāt aparipūrṇāt ata eva udriktakālakramavattvāt bhāveṣvapi kālakramam ābhāsayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2768: yo 'haṃ bālo 'bhavaṃ tatsahabhāvī vaṭābhāso 'pi abhavat iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2769: na tu yaḥ sakṛd vibhātaḥ iti anayā vācoyuktyā avicchinnabhāsanaḥ pramātā saṃvidrūpaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2773: evaṃ deśakramo'pi mitātmanaḥ paricchinnasvarūpasya śūnyādeḥ dehāntasya svātmani bhāti iha tiṣṭhāmi iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2774: svāpekṣayā ca bhāveṣvapi yat mama saṃyogapārimityena vartate tadantikam itarat dūram iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2775: amitasya svarūpeyattāśūnyasya tu saṃvittattvasya bhāvāḥ svātmanā ahaṃbhāvena yato bhānti tataḥ pūrṇāḥ ---- aparicchinnasvarūpeyattākāḥ ,

GSP30abhiprvu:3033: anyathā na kathaṃcidvyavahāraḥ iti sakaladeśakāladaśāpuruṣopayogī yadi ayaṃ vyavahāro na satyaḥ tarhi na anyasya satyatvaṃ vidmaḥ ---- iti na atra bhrāntiḥ iti bhramitavyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3039: yasya vaktrāvalokīni prameye taṃ stumaḥ śivam //1//}
GSP30abhiprvu:3040: evaṃ kriyāśaktivisphāranirūpaṇaprasaṅgena saṃbandhapuraḥsaraṃ sāmānyādīnāṃ tattvam upapāditam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3042: tacca dvividhameva paramārthataḥ jñāpyajñāpakatā kāryakāraṇatā ca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3043: tatra pūrvasyāṃ mānameyabhāvādicintāspadabhūtāyāṃ sarvam uktacaraṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ ca āyattaṃ ---- pramāṇādhīnā vastusiddhiḥ iti tatra tatra prasiddheḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3044: evaṃ ca prakṛtasamarthanīyavastūpayogitayā svayaṃ ca saṃbandha rūpatayā avaśyavicāryāṃ mānādisthitiṃ nirūpayitum
GSP30abhiprvu:3050: tataḥ prameyasya svarūpaṃ nirūpayituṃ pratyābhāsaṃ pramāṇasya vyāpāro na tu svalakṣaṇātmakavastvekaniṣṭhatāniyamena ---- iti darśayituṃ pratyavamarśabalena ābhāsavyavasthā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3055: sa ca eṣa sarvaḥ pramāṇatatphalaprameyādipravibhāgaḥ sati pramātari pradarśitarūpe ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3056: tato na tasya prameyatā yena atrāpi pramāṇavyāpārasaṃbhavaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3062: vastu pramāṇaṃ tat so 'pi svābhāso 'bhinavodayaḥ // Ipk_2,3.1 //
GSP30abhiprvu:3066: vastu nīlasukhādikaṃ vyavatiṣṭhate ---- niyatāṃ prakāśamaryādāṃ na ativartate idamiti svarūpeṇa etādṛk iti ca viśeṣaṇabhūtanityatvānityatvādiyogena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3068: tacca vivecakena vicāryam ---- iha vastunaḥ svarūpaṃ svātmavaśenaiva na tāvat vyavatiṣṭhate ---- jaḍatvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3069: mama nīlaṃ prakāśate caitrasya veti ca tadā kathamavabhāsaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3071: anyo 'pi cet jaḍaḥ tat andhena andhasya hastādānam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3073: so 'pi yadi śuddho nirviśeṣo na tarhi nīlasyaiva vyavasthāhetuḥ bhavet ---- pītādāvapi tasya tathātvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3074: tadasau nīloparakto nīlonmukho nīlaprakāśasvabhāva ityābhāsaḥ san nīlasya vyavasthāpakaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3076: sa ca nīlasya prakāśo yadi avyatiriktasya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3079: nīlaṃ ca ittham tato vyatirekābhāsayogyaṃ yadi so'pyā ---- bhāso mahataḥ prakāśāt vyatiricyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3082: iti nūnaṃ tena saṃkoca ātmani nirbhāsanīyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3083: saṃvido vastūnāṃ ca saṃkocanaprāṇo nañartharūpo'sau śūnya ityucyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3086_1: anantakālāntarmukhasaṃvedanarūpāt sa pramāṇābhimata ābhāso yāvat prameyonmukhatāsvabhāvaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:3086_2: tāvat prameyasya deśakālākārābhāsasaṃbhedavattvāt so 'pi tathaiva kṣaṇe anyānyarūpaḥ sraṣṭavyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3087: taduktam abhinavodayaḥ iti ---- abhinavaḥ ---- kṣaṇaparivāsamlānyāpi na kalaṅkitaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3089: so'pi yadi tathābhūto māyāpramātṛlagno na bhavet tato mama nīlāvabhāso yasya tasyaiva pītābhāso mama iti na syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3090: asti ca idaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ ---- yat sarvatra abādhyamānam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3091: ityevaṃ svatvena ābhāsamāno ya ābhāso ---- navanavaprameyaunmukhyāt navanavodayaḥ sa pramāṇam yataḥ pramāṃ vidhatte /
GSP30abhiprvu:3093: āha ---- sa eva bodharūpa ābhāso mitiḥ pramāṇaphalam iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3094: nanu evaṃ paryāyatvamuktaṃ bhavet na tu phalabhāvaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3095: āha ---- bāhyonmukhatayā prakāśarūpayā tatra tat pramāṇam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3096: yā tu tasyaiva antarmukhātmā vimarśarūpatā prāk upapāditā tatsvabhāvena kevalaṃ viṣayadaśāsaṃkucitena sa eva bodhaḥ phalam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3097: yathāhi yaḥ śūro'haṃ sa eva vijayī iti ekaniṣṭhe śūratvavijayatve vivekavatā hetuphalabhāvena vyavasthāpyete ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3098: yato hi ahaṃ śūraḥ tato vijayī iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3099: evaṃ yato nīlaprakāśaḥ tato nīlamidam iti parāmarśa iti ekarūpatve 'pi hetuphalabhāvaḥ , yayoktaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:3101: iti / kiṃ ca iha vyāpārarūpameva phalaṃ vyāpāraśca vyāpriyamāṇāt vyāpāryamāṇāt vā ananyākāra eva siddhaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3102_0: iti ---- abhedaḥ pramāṇaphalayoḥ vimarśabalena ca yataḥ pramāṇaṃ vimarśaśca śabdajīvitaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:3103: tato deśakālābhāsayoḥ svalakṣaṇatvārpaṇapravaṇayoḥ anāmiśraṇāt sāmānyāyamāne ābhāse pramāṇaṃ pravartate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3104: ayam ityapi hi avabhāsa ābhāsāntarānāmiśre puro'vasthite bhāvāvabhāsamātre ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3109: svalakṣaṇaṃ tu tadābhāsasāmānādhikaraṇyābhāsarūpam ābhāsāntaram ekam anyadeva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3111: tatparaṃ miśrīkāreṣu teṣu ābhāseṣu gṛhītagrāhi na pramāṇam iti agre bhaviṣyati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3112: adhyavasāyasya asmaduktanayena śabdaprāṇitasya pratyābhāsaviśrāntau tadapekṣamapi prāmāṇyaṃ vadatā pratyābhāsaniṣṭhameva prāmāṇyamupetyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3115: nanu yadi vimarśaḥ pramāṇavyāpāraḥ sa tarhi dvicandre 'pi asti ?
GSP30abhiprvu:3116: maivam , sa hi saṃskārayogāt ātmānamabhimataprasiddhārthakriyāprāptiparyantamanubandhayan anunmūlitavṛttiḥ sthiraḥ san tathā bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3117: madhye punarunmūlanaṃ cet sahate na tarhi asau tathā vimarśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3118: nāyaṃ vimarśaḥ pūrvamapi ---- ekena antarmukhena vapuṣā pūrvameva ---- tasya nirmūlanāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3120: tadaiva na idaṃ rajatam iti vṛttapūrvasyaiva vimarśasya avimarśīkaraṇaṃ saṃvedyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:3124_0: ityatra , evaṃ sthite dvicandre 'pi yāvat parakutūhalasaṃpādanamarthakriyāsaṃmatam
GSP30abhiprvu:3126: nanvevaṃ yatra arthakriyāṃ na anvicchati tatra kathaṃ bādhābādhavyavahāraḥ ?
GSP30abhiprvu:3127: mā bhūt ---- kiṃ naḥ truṭitam pravṛttirhi na sarvatra pramāṇata eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3129: arthapakṣādhikyāt arthitvatāratamyādapi vā kṛṣyādau saviṣānna bhojane niścitasaṃbhāvitadṛṣṭapratyavāye ca cauryādau pravṛttidarśanāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3131: sa ca pravṛttaḥ kvacana anummūlitapramitikaḥ pramāṇatāṃ pratipadyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3133: evam ājanma yato 'nena abhyasta ājanmaśatebhyo vā pramāṇāpramāṇavibhāgaḥ tato maṇirūpyādivat tatsvarūpam āpātamātra eva vilakṣaṇamīkṣate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3134: asti hi tasya paramārthato vailakṣaṇyaṃ kāraṇabhedādikṛtam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3135_0: tataśca yadārtiṃ parimitāṃ sahyām abhimanyate tata eva arthitāmahāgraheṇa yatra tatra
GSP30abhiprvu:3135_1: na preryate tadā visaṃvādabhīruḥ niścitaprāmāṇyāt bodhāt adṛṣṭe dṛṣṭe'pi vā pravartamāno na visaṃvādyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3137: tena laukilaṃ pramāṇasvarūpam anūditaṃ sāmānyasaṃbandhādijñāne'pi mohāt aprāmāṇyaśaṃkāṃ śamayitum ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3138: ata eva vibhāgaviśeṣalakṣaṇaparīkṣādibhiriha na āyāsito lokaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3139: yat yat abādhitasthairyam ata eva apratihatānuvṛttikaṃ vimarśaphalaṃ vidhatte tattad bodharūpaṃ bodhyaniṣṭhaṃ pramātṛsvarūpaviśrāntaṃ pramāṇam iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3140: tacca aindriyake bodhe sukhādisaṃvedane yogijñāne ca avivādameva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3142: anumānajā tu pratītiḥ ābhāsāntarāt kāryarūpāt svabhāvabhūtāt vā ābhāsāntare pratipattiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3143: vastvantarasya ca tena sākaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaniyamaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaniyamaśca īśvaraniyatiśaktyupajīvana eva avadhāryo bhavati na anyathā /
GSP30abhiprvu:3144: tena yāvati niyatirjñātā tāvati deśe kāle vā anumānaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3145_0: āgamastu nāmāntaraśabdanarūpo dṛḍhīya stamavimarśātmā citsvabhāvasya īśvarasya antaraṅga
GSP30abhiprvu:3145_1: eva vyāpāraḥ pratyakṣāderapi jīvitakalpaḥ tena yat yathāmṛṣṭaṃ tat tathaiva yathā
GSP30abhiprvu:3145_2: naitat viṣaṃ māṃ mārayati garuḍa eva aham iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3146: tatra tu tathāvidhe śabdanātmani vimarśe ānukūlyaṃ yo bhajate śabdarāśiḥ so 'pi pramāṇam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3149: tena hi yat śabdanam utpātitaṃ jyotiṣṭomakārī ahaṃ svargaṃ gantā iti dīkṣito 'ham apunarāvṛttibhāgī iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3154: anyasya tu dṛḍhapratipattirūpatvābhāvāt apramāṇameva tathāvimarśanātmakaṃ śabdanam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3155: nanvevaṃ tadeva śāstraṃ kaṃcitprati pramāṇaṃ kaṃcitprati na iti syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3159: apakṣapāti pramāṇam iti kaḥ asya vacanasya arthaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3160: kiṃ yat ekasya nīlajñānaṃ pratyakṣarūpaṃ tat kiṃ sarvasya nīlaṃ bhāsayati dhūmajñānaṃ vā agnim ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3161: tvaṃ prātarnidhimanena vidhinā landhāse iti ca yaḥ siddhādeśa āgamaḥ sa kiṃ sarvānprati pramāṇam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3163: tathā ihāpi dṛḍhavimarśanarūpaṃ śabdanam ā ---- samantāt arthaṃ gamayati iti āgamasaṃjñakaṃ pramāṇaṃ sarvasya tāvat bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3164: tatra yathā mithyājñānasahāyatāṃ bhajamānam ālokendriyādikam apramāgatāsavivam apramāṇam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3165: na ca etāvatā samyagjñānarūpasya pratyakṣasya kācit pakṣapātitā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3166_0: tathā sa eva vyotiṣṭhomādiśabdaḥ śūdrāderadṛḍhavimarśātmani ata evāpramāṇe āgamābhāse
GSP30abhiprvu:3167: sarva eva hi āgamo niyatādhilārideśakālasahakāryādiniyantritameva vimarśa vidhatte ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3169: tena prasiddhiḥ iti śloke yatra yadā ityuktam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3172: tasmāt pramāṇalakṣaṇe jñāte sarvaṃ pramāṇasvarūpaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati kiṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3173_0: yastu avisaṃvādakatvaṃ tasya lakṣaṇam āha tenāpi prāpakatvaṃ pravartakatvaṃ pravṛttiyogyaśakyaprāptikavastūpadaśakatvaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:3173_1: pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ bruvatā na kiṃcit pramāṇābhimatabodhaviśrāntaṃ svarūm uktam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3174: tacca anenaiva lakṣaṇena nirvāhyate tat nirvyūḍhaṃ bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3177: nanu ca ekābhidhānaviṣaye mitiḥ iti yat uktam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3178: tatra ---- ekamabhidhānaṃ bāhye svalakṣaṇa eva pravartate yadi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3180: ābhāsamiśrīkaraṇābhāsastu svalakṣaṇam ityāśaṅkāṃ śamayan pramāṇasya yat prameyaṃ tat paramārthato nirūpayitum āha ----
GSP30abhiprvu:3183: yadyapi ghaṭa iti bahiḥ paridṛṣṭa eko 'rthaḥ tathāpi tāvāneva asau na ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3185: tathāhi ---- svatantraṃ vā vivecanam arthitvānusāreṇa vā pūrvaprasiddhyupajīvanena vā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3186: tatra tridhāpi vivecane kriyamāṇe pṛthageva bhānti ābhāsāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3188: ucyate ---- teṣāṃ pṛthak bhāsamānānāmapi ābhāsānāṃ yo vimarśaḥ anuprāṇitabhūtaḥ sa kadācit pratyābhāsameva viśrāmyati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3190: kadācit punaḥ guṇapradhānatāpādanena atra idam ittham iti miśraṇāprāṇo vimarśaḥ tadā tadekaṃ svalakṣaṇam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3191: apiḥ bhinnakamaḥ anusandhānena miśratāvimarśena sādhito ya eko 'rthaḥ svalakṣaṇātmā tanna ekasminnapi sati ruci ---- svātantryam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3193: vyutpattiṃ ---- vṛddhavyavahāraśaraṇatāṃ ca anatikramya bhidyata eva ābhāsaḥ //3//
GSP30abhiprvu:3199: iha tāvat ekasminnapi cetanatayā prasiddhe puruṣasvalakṣaṇe vitatadeśavyāpitāṃ dīrghatāmeva kadācit vimṛśati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3201: niḥsaṃdhibandhanarūpatāṃ vā vṛttatāṃ yā śilānāmapi saṃbhavinī ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3202: ūrdhvadigākramaṇarūpāṃ vā ūrdhvatāṃ yā sthāṇorapi saṃbandhinī ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3204: tathā hi ---- svatantrayā vā icchayāṃ rucirūpayā yāvadevaṃ kuryāt yathouktam
GSP30abhiprvu:3206: iti / vitatadeśavyāpina eva vā arthān tirodhilakṣaṇām arthakriyām arthayamāno vibhajet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3207: evaṃ vyavahāre vṛddhaiḥ kīdṛk dīrghaṃ nāma gīyate iti vyutpitsamāno vyutpādayitumicchuḥ vā vibhāgaṃ kuryāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:3209: ekasvalakṣaṇaṃ tu ---- ekasmin deśābhāse kālābhāse ca viśrānteḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3211: evaṃ puruṣatvavat anye 'pi brāhmaṇādyābhāsā api nirūpyāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3212: evam atra tāvat prasiddhatara ābhāsabhedo ---- jaḍājaḍasādhāraṇabahutaradharmāspadatvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3213: anena nidarśanena dhūme'pi dhūmatvacāndanatvaśrīkhaṇḍacandanotthitatvādayaḥ prasiddhā ābhāsabhedā vibhajanīyāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3214: prasiddhena dṛṣṭāntena aprasiddhabhāgo 'pi yo ghaṭaḥ tatrāpi ābhāsabhāgabhedo bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3215: tathāhi kiṃcidapi atra nāsti iti hṛdbhaṅgamiva āpadyamāno ghaṭaṃ paśyan asti idam iti sattvābhāsameva paśyati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3223: evam ete ābhāsabhedā eva vastu ābhāsamānatāsāratvāt vastutāyāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3224: yo 'pi ābhāsasya prāṇabhūto vimarśaḥ so'pi pratyābhāsameva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3227: arthakriyākāritvamapi anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ pratyābhāsameva niyataṃ ---- sadābhāsena hṛdbhaṅgaparihāramātrasya saṃpādanāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3228: tatra ābhāsāntarasya yā apekṣā sā agnyābhāsena arthakriyāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ pātrābhāsasya iva tadābhāsanāntarīyakatvena ābhāsāntarasyāpi niyatasya apekṣaṇāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:3229: evaṃ yena yena mukhena artho vicāryate tena tena ābhāsamātrātmaiva tathaiva pratibhāsanāt vimarśanāt arthakriyākaraṇācca iti siddham /
GSP30abhiprvu:3230: evaṃ prasiddhataraprasiddhāprasiddhatvātiśayena eko'pi arthogranthakāreṇa traidhaṃ nirūpito dīrghavṛtteti dhūmeti saddhaṭeti //5//
GSP30abhiprvu:3231: nanu evaṃ pratyābhāsameva vastutve eko ghaṭātmā na vastu syāt ityāśaṃkyāha
GSP30abhiprvu:3234: ābhāsānāṃ miśraṃ yadrūpaṃ tatra avaśyaṃ kaścidābhāsaḥ pradhānatvena anyābhāsānāṃ viśrāntipadīkāryaḥ sa teṣāṃ samānamadhikaraṇam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3235: tena saha yasteṣāṃ saṃbandhaḥ tat sāmānādhikaraṇyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3236: tena upalakṣito yaḥ pratibhāsaḥ ---- arthonmukhaḥ prakāśaḥ tadanuprāṇakaśca napadātmā parāmarśaḥ ---- tasya sarvasya ekābhāsaviśrāntatāniyamāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3237_0: tasmāt taṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyābhāsaṃ samanughrāṇayati yo vākyātmā vākyārthaparāmarśarūpo
GSP30abhiprvu:3237_1: vimarśaḥ ---- iha idānīṃ eṣa ghaṭo'sti ityevaṃrūpaḥ tato hetoḥ ye abhedina ekasvalakṣaṇatām
GSP30abhiprvu:3237_2: prāptā na ca svarūpabhedam ujjhantaḥ teṣām anyā viśiṣṭā samuditā arthakriyā /
GSP30abhiprvu:3238: ābhāsavimarśabhede punaranyā niyatā ekaikamātrarūpā ābhāsapratibhāsaśabdābhyāṃ sūtre vimarśo'pi ākṣipto mantavyaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3239: punaḥ śabdo viśeṣadyotakaḥ kākākṣivat ubhayatra yojyaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3241: tatra ca aikyāvabhāse paratantraṃ sat pṛthaktvaṃ yadā ābhāsānāṃ tadā samānarūpavyaktyuparañjakatvena pāramārthikaṃ sāmānyarūpatvam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3242: ghaṭābhāsasya tu śuddhasya svatantraparāmarśe yogyatāmātreṇa sāmānyarūpatā na vastuto ---- dravyādanyo hi sarvaḥ padārthaḥ paratantratāsāraḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3243: evam eko'pi ghaṭātmā ca ityapi satyameva ---- ābhāsavimarśārthakriyābalena tathā vyavasthāpanāt iti //6//
GSP30abhiprvu:3246: ābhāsāśca bhinnā api yadi ekām arthakriyāṃ kartuṃ miśrībhavanti ,
