GSP30abhiprvu:3539: tathā paśulokasya bhāsamāna eva ātmani nāhamīśvaraḥ ityādi mohādabhimanvato moho 'pohyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:3540: yo hi jñānakriyāsvātantryayuktaḥ sa īśvaro yathā siddhāntapurāṇādiṣu prasiddhaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3542: yadi vā yasmin yadāyattaṃ sa tatreśvaro rājeva svamaṇḍale ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3546: yat khalu yallagnaṃ bhāti tattena pūrṇaṃ nidhānamiva maṇibhiḥ tvallagnaṃ ca viśvam , ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3548: sa tāvati vyāpakaḥ samudga iva maṇiṣu ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3549: tvayi ca saṃvidrūpe dharādisadāśivāntaṃ śāstraprakriyoktaṃ viśvam , ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3550: yasmin sthite yadudeti līyate ca tat tatpūrvāparabhāgavyāpi yathā bhūmāvaṅkuraḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3551: tathā ca tvayi prakāśarūpe viśvam , ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3552: evam anye 'pi dharmāḥ sahasraśo 'pi āgamādisiddhā yojyāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3553_0: tadevaṃ vyapohite vyāmohe sthite'pi tatsaṃskāramātradhṛte śarīrādau anātmatābhimānapuraḥsara
GSP30abhiprvu:3553_1: evātmatābhimāne ghaṭādau ca prakāśamāna evānātmatābhimāne jñātendrajālatattvasya
GSP30abhiprvu:3553_2: paśyato'pi indrajālaṃ yathā na tattvato vyāmohaḥ tathā pratyabhijñātātmasvarūpasya /
GSP30abhiprvu:3555: abhyāsabhāvanābalena tu śiva śāsanopadiṣṭena dehaghaṭādāveva parameśvaratāsamāveśamabhiniviśya paśyata ihaiva śarīre pārameśvaryāṃśadharmodgamaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3562: tasyāpi karṇapathagamanāt saṃskārapakināvaśyaṃ kadācidbhaviṣyatyeva svarūpalābhaḥ iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3564: ityādiślokadvayena yaduktaṃ tadeva viśvavaocitrya ityādiślokatrayeṇopaskṛtya punarnirūpitam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3565: evaṃ bhūtaṃ tāvat pramāṇam tadevaṃ bhūte bhagavati kathamupapadyatām /
GSP30abhiprvu:3566: tataśca yuktamuktaṃ śāstrādāviti maṅgyantareṇa idānīṃ tadeva nirvāhitam ---- iti śivam //17// āditaḥ 120//
GSP30abhiprvu:3567: iti śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptācāryaviracitāyāṃ pratyabhijñāsūtravimarśinyāṃ kriyādhikāre mānatatphalameyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma tṛtīyamāhnikam // 3 //
GSP30abhiprvu:3571: kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ ca yaścitraṃ taṃ stumaḥ śivam //}
GSP30abhiprvu:3574: ---- eṣa ca ityādi evamicchaiva hetutā kartṛtā kriyā ityantam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3575: tatra ślokena svamate kartṛkarmabhāva eva kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3578: tataḥ ślokaṣaṭkena cetanasyaiva kartṛtārūpā kāraṇatā prasādhyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:3590: evaṃ kriyāśaktimukhena pramātrekarūpatāṃ bhagavati vyavahartavyāṃ prasādhya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3596: eṣa eva purāṇaḥ pramātā amūn bhāvān ābhāsitapūrvān ābhāsān ābhāsayati avicchinnena prabandhena /
GSP30abhiprvu:3597: katham , icchāyā īśiturabhinnāyā avikalparūpāyā akramāyā vaśena sāmarthyena kutrāsya te bhāvāḥ sthitāḥ ?
GSP30abhiprvu:3599: viśve hi bhāvāstasyaiva śaktirūpeṇa svarūpātmatvena sthitāḥ ; ityuktaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:3608: jaḍasya tu na sā śaktiḥ sattā yadasataḥ sataḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3612: iti tu svavācaiva virudhyate tat kimanena /
GSP30abhiprvu:3614: tarhi tasyāsadrūpataiva paramārthaḥ iti kathaṃ svarūpaviruddhaṃ sattvamabhyupagacchet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3615: na hi pādapatanaśatairapi nīlamātmani pītimānaṃ mṛṣyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:3616: atha sanneva ghaṭastarhi kimanyat upayācyate daṇḍacakrasūtrāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:3625_0: kumbhakārahṛdaye antarmanogocaratvāt pūrvamapi svasaṃvidekātmatayā vicitratvena viśvasya
GSP30abhiprvu:3630: na ca kumbhakāre prāṇapuryaṣṭabuddhiśūnyadehaprāye tadetat sthitam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3633: tasya kasyāpi iti pūrvamuktasya acintyāparyanuyojyamahimna ityarthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3634: naca vācyam ubhayendriyavedyatvamapi sadasad vā iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3635: yato'yamatra paramārthaḥ ---- yathā darpaṇāntaḥ kumbhakāranirvartyamānaghaṭādipratibimbe darpaṇasyaiva tathābhāsanamahimā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3637: tathāpi tanmahimnaiva etena idaṃ bahiḥ sphuṭarūpaṃ kriyata ityabhimāna ullasati /
GSP30abhiprvu:3638: evaṃ saṃvinmahimnā kumbhakṛti daṇḍacakrādau ghaṭe sthite tanmahimnaiva abhimāno jāyate ;
GSP30abhiprvu:3643: tatra jaḍasya mṛdāderdūrāpeto'bhimāna iti saṃvitsvabhāve kartṛtvaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:3644: nanu bhāvarūpameva itthaṃ bhāsyatāṃ kiṃ dvayendriyavedyatvenoktamatra ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3647: anena ca vicāreṇa prakṛtamapi kriyāsvarūpaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3649: evam ekā kriyā saiṣā sakramāntarbahiḥ sthitiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3651: saiṣeti , yasyāḥ svarūpata āśrayataśca nopapadyate iti upālambhaḥ kṛtaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3653: yataḥ saṃvidrūpādāntarāt prabhṛti indriyagocaratayā bahiṣparyantatayā sthitirābhāsanārūpā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3656: sa caika āśrayaḥ saṃvidrūpatvena svacchatvasvatantratvābhyāmubhayamapyantarbahīrūpaṃ sahata iti //5//
GSP30abhiprvu:3658: yatra tu bījāṅjurādau cetanānupraveśo na dṛśyate tatra kathaṃ bījasyaivāṅkuraḥ kāryo na bhavati ?
GSP30abhiprvu:3665: tataśca yad vastu yamapekṣya antarityuktaṃ tad vastu tasyaiva āntararūpaviparivṛttimātrasya bahiṣkāryaṃ bahiṣkaraṇārhaṃ bhavati /
GSP30abhiprvu:3666: saṃvidrūpaṃ ca pramātāramapekṣya antarābhāsino bhāvāstadapekṣayaiva bāhyābhāsā iti tenaiva eteṣāṃ bahiṣkaraṇābhāsanaṃ yuktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3667: tataśca pramātaiva kāraṇaṃ bhavati na jaḍaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3669: yasmāt sa pramātā kāryasyāntarbahirābhāsanadvayanimittatayā sthitastena vinā tadapekṣasyābhāsadvayasyānupapatteḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3670: tasmādekasya pramātureva na tu kathaṃcit jaḍasya uditā prasādhitarūpā kriyā nirmātṛtā bhavatīti //7//
GSP30abhiprvu:3675: ata eva naiyāyikādibhiraṅkurādau buddimāneva parameśvaro hetutvena iṣṭaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3677: samavāyikāraṇanijāvayavārambhaparamparayā tu tata īśvarādanyasyāpi bījabhūmijalāderhetutā kathitā /
GSP30abhiprvu:3683: nanuparidṛṣṭabījādivyatiriktabuddhimatkāraṇakalpanena vinā kimuparudhyata iti parasya bhrāntiṃ bhindannāha
GSP30abhiprvu:3686: tathā hi iti nidarśanopakrameṇa vyāptirevaṃbhūtaiva dṛṣṭā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3689: mṛdādayo yadi hi sannidhānamātreṇa vidadhyuḥ kumbhakāreṇa kimatra kṛtyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3691: sā ca kumbhakārāyattā iti cet siddhaṃ naḥ sādhyam ---- śivikasaṃpādane 'pi te cetanapreraṇāmapekṣante iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3695: tataśca yat acetanaṃ kāryakāri tat cetanāpekṣaṃ mṛdādaya iva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3700: iti tat cetanapreraṇaṃ yadi na nimittīkuryāt vyāpakaviruddhamanimittakatvaṃ prasajyeta ;
GSP30abhiprvu:3705: tadetadāha ---- īśvararūpayā vyavasthayā yaḥ sa sa mṛddaṇḍacakrādīnāṃ saṃskāraḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3712: kiṃ ca yadi na krudhyate vastutaḥ kumbhakāro'pi aiśvaryaiva svatantraviśvātmatārūpayā vyavasthayā mṛdādisaṃskārāpekṣayā pradarśitaniyatyabhidhānanijaśaktivijṛmbhāto janayet ;
GSP30abhiprvu:3715: tadetadapi uktam anenaiva sūtreṇa tathā hi iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3719: tathāpi samastetaranirmāṇamadhya eva idamapi parameśvareṇaiva nirmitaṃ yadavicalastasya kumbhakārapaśormithyākartṛtvābhimānaḥ pratibhuva iva adhamarṇatābhimānaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3720: yadi punarīśvarasyecchaiva iyamīdṛśī mā asya abhimāno'yam udgamat iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3722: tadidamapi uktaṃ sūterṇaiva tathā hi iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3723: kumbhakārasyāpi mṛdādisaṃskāra krameṇa kiṃ ghaṭaṃ janayāmi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3724: uta na janayāmi iti ya ekapakṣaniścayāya saṃpraśnātmā vicāraḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3725: sa īśvarasaṃnamdhina eva vividhāt svarūpāvacchādanatattvaprakāśanarūpāt avasthānāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3727: tasmāt vastuta īśvara eva sarvatra kartā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3728: ahaṃ ca sa eva iti na parimite kartā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3730: ---- iti etāvati sarvathā hṛdayena avadhātavyam iti sthitam //9//
GSP30abhiprvu:3731: dṛśyate 'sya cetanasya svātantryameva sarvatra jambhamāṇaṃ jaḍānapi yat svātmatāmāpādayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3737: yadiha cetanapreritaṃ kāraṇam iti prasiddhaṃ mṛdādi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3739: tadeva yadi paramārthataḥ kāraṇaṃ syāt tat tadvyatirekeṇa ghaṭāṅkurādeḥ kathaṃ yogīcchāmātreṇa janma syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3741: athocyate ---- anye eva te ghaṭāṅkurādayo mṛddhījādijanyāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3747: tasya ca icchā tādṛgeva ghaṭo bhavatu yo mṛdādikṛtakumbhasaṃbhavabhūryarthakriyākaraṇacaturavṛttiriti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3748: tadetadāha ---- tasya tasya sthirasya arthakriyāviśeṣasya karaṇe hetutacchīlānukūlarūpaṃ ghaṭādi jāyate , ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3750: yogī tu icchayā paramāṇūn paśyan saṃghaṭṭayatīti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3751: te vācyāḥ ---- yadi khalu anvayavyatirekāgamādiparidṛṣṭaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo yogiṣu na viparyeti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3752: ---- iti hṛdayamāvarjayati vaḥ tat kiṃ paramāṇugraheṇa ;
GSP30abhiprvu:3753: no cet ghaṭasya kapālāni śarīrasya svāvayavāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3754: teṣāṃ nijaṃ nijaṃ prasiddhaṃ tṛṇaśastilaśo 'pi anyathābhavabanasahamānaṃ laukikameva kāraṇam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3756: dehe strīpuruṣasaṃyogādi ubhayamapekṣyaṃ dehādisaṃbhavo duḥsamartha eva /
GSP30abhiprvu:3757: cetana eva tu tathā tathā bhavati /
GSP30abhiprvu:3759: ---- ityatra pakṣe niyatyanuvartinaḥ laukike prasiddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve svātantryaṃ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3764: cetano hi svātmadarpaṇe bhāvān pratibimbavadābhāsayati iti siddhāntaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3770: nanu yadi prasiddhakāraṇollaṅghanenāpi tatkāryaviśeṣatulyavṛttānyeva kāryāṇi jāyante ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3772: tathā hi mathamanyadanyatra niyamavadbhavet ityāśaṅkya prāmāṇikatarammanyaistādātmyatadutpattī niyamanidānamupagate /
GSP30abhiprvu:3776: evaṃ nirhetuke bhinnahetuke ca kārye vācyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3778: svahetuta eva hi śiṃśapā vṛkṣasvabhāvāvyabhicāriṇī jātā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3789: kāryaṃ hetuḥ svabhāvo vāta evotpattimūlajaḥ // Ipk_2,4.11 //
GSP30abhiprvu:3790: yogīcchāpi sarvathā tādṛśameva na tu vṛścikagomayādisaṃbhūtavṛścikādinyāyena kathaṃcit rasavīryādinā bhinnaṃ kāryaṃ janayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3791: ---- iti yat kathitamata evāsymādeva hetoḥ kāryaṃ vā dhūmādi agnyādyanumāne ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3796: anye ca yauktikā yogipratyakṣakalpapratyakṣasadbhāvaṃ samastavastugrahaṇāya kalpitavantaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3802: , āha ---- vṛkṣatvāvyabhicāriṇyāḥ śiṃśapāyā utpatteryanmūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ tata eva sa sanmātrānubandhī svabhāvo jāyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3807: nanu ca vṛścikādīnāṃ kīṭagomayādyanekakāraṇakatvaṃ tāvat dṛṣṭaṃ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3812: na hi nīlaṃ sadevānīlaṃ yogīcchayā bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3818: tatra ādyasya tāvat kāryakāraṇabhāva eṣa mūlam ---- iti kiṃ tatrocyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:3820: yadi tāvat kṛtakatvasya kāraṇāyattatvaṃ nāma svabhāvaḥ katham abhavanaparicchinnabhavanasvabhāvatā nāmānityatvaṃ svabhāvaḥ syāt ābhāsabhedāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:3821: abhede tu ābhāsasya hetusiddhāveva sādhyasya siddhatvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3831: tasmāt niyataḥ śiṃśapābhāsavṛkṣābhāsayoḥ pūrvanītyā sāmānādhikaraṇyābhāso hetubalāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:3833: tata eva sāmānyenedamuktaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ ---- sarvaḥ svabhāvaheturutpattimūlajaḥ , ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3836: tataśca śiṃśapāyāmekasyāmeva sṛjyamānāyāṃ śākhādimadarthāntarāṇāmasṛṣṭervṛkṣābhāsasya sāmānyātmanaḥ sādhyasya nāmāpi nāsti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3838: yattu tadekarūpaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ vṛkṣatvaṃ tat khalu śiṃśapātvameva tacca siddham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3842: evamarthakriyākāritvābhāve 'pi kṣaṇikatvābhāsābhāvaḥ iti niyatyapekṣayaiva sarve svabhāvahetavo nānyathā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3852: ---- iti svābhāsayoreva kāryakāraṇatā gṛhītā na tu santānāntaragatayostadīyavṛttāntasyāsaṃvedanāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:3853: tataścedānīmanumānaṃ na bhavet svasantānagatāt dhūmābhāsāt krimisarvajñādipramātṛsantānāntaraniṣṭhasyāgnyābhāsasya iti niścayaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3854: iha tu darśane vyāptigrahaṇāvasthāyāṃ yāvantastaddeśasaṃbhāvyamānasadbhāvāḥ pramātārastāvatāmeko'sau dhūmābhāsaśca vahnyābhāsaśca vāhyanaye iva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3858: ---- iti vyāptau gṛhītāyāṃ bhūyo'pi parvate yo dhūmābhāsaḥ so 'pi agnyābhāsādeva iti vyāptiṃ smṛtvānuimimīte atra parvate agnyābhāsaḥ iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3859: tāvati dhūmābhāsaviśeṣe pramātrantaraiḥ sahaikībhūya vahnyābhāsasāmānyāṃśe parokṣarūpāṃśasahite viśeṣābhāsāntaravivikte pramātrantaraiḥ sākamekībhavati , iti yāvat /
GSP30abhiprvu:3860: bhūya iti vyāptiṃ gṛhītvā punarapi yo dhūmābhāsaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3861: ādigrahaṇādaṅkurābhāsādirgṛhyate so'pyābhāso nūtano 'pūrvo na tu dhūmajadhūmavadapratyagraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3862: sa ca adhipaterasaṃcetyamānāt vahnyābhāsāt bījābhāsādeva vā bhavet tata eva janituṃ śaknoti nānyataḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3867: tato dhūmābhāso'syaivāgnyābhāsasyāvyabhicāritaṃ kāryaṃ liṅgaṃ yogikṛtatvābhāve niścite sati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3868: ---- iti tasmāt kāryāt so 'numīyate yataḥ parokṣo 'sāvadhipatitvādeva //12//
GSP30abhiprvu:3873: paro nūtanādanyo yo dhūmābhāsaḥ sa dhūmābhāsādeva pramātrantaravartino'dhipatirūpāt parokṣāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3874: ---- iti tathābhūtāt dhūmābhāsāt kathamakāraṇabhūto vahnyābhāso'numīyatām ityabhiprāyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3877: ---- ityāśayena nūtanamiti yatsūcitaṃ tadeva vyavacchedyadvāreṇa sphuṭīkṛtam //13//
GSP30abhiprvu:3881: tathāhi vīje satyaṅkuro bhavati iti yadetat dṛṣṭaṃ dhūmāgnivadeva tat kathamanādarāspadam ?
GSP30abhiprvu:3886: bhāvadvayamapi ca na yugapadbhāvi kāryakāra.anarūpaṃ ghaṭapaṭavat ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3888: niyatakramikatve 'pi na pūrvabhāvi kāryamuttarakālabhāvi ca kāraṇam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3889: ---- ityevaṃ niyatapūrvabhāvaṃ kāraṇaṃ niyataparabhāvaṃ ca kāryam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3891: tatra svarūpādanadhikā cet pūrvatā paratā ca tat bhāvadvayamātraṃ sa ca sa ca , ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3892: cārtho 'pi vā na kaścit tasyāpyapekṣārūpatvāt sa sa ityeva hi syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:3893: atha pūrvatā nāma prayojakasattākatvaṃ paratā ca prayojyasattākatvaṃ tarhi vījasyāṅkuraprayoktrī sattā aṅkuraviśrāntā aṅkurāntarbhāvamātmanyānayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3894: aṅkurābhāve prayoktṛtvamātraṃ syāt tadapi na kiṃcit anyāpekṣatvāt tasya /
GSP30abhiprvu:3896: evaṃ na kevalaṃ bhāvamātrameva kāryakāraṇatā ityādayaḥ pakṣā nopapannā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3898: ---- ityevaṃ rūpāpi yā kāryakāraṇatā sāpi nopapadyate pramāṇena na saṃbhavati jaḍānām ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3899: anyonyāpekṣā hi atra jīvitaṃ sā ca jaḍānāṃ na saṃbhavati //14//
GSP30abhiprvu:3908: tataśca yadi bījaṃ sadaṅkuro'san athāpi viparyaya ubhayamapi vā sat yadi vāsat ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3916: saptamīrūpāyā vibhakteranyasyā api vā yo'rthaḥ kriyākārakabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ sa eva tāvadbhāvānāṃ samanvayo nānyaḥ śuṣkaḥ kaścit /
GSP30abhiprvu:3917: sa ca yadi svatantre cidrūpe bhāvadvayaṃ viśrāmyati tadopapadyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3919: tathā hi vikalpenāpi asau vyavahriyamāṇo na vastuniṣṭhatayopapadyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3926: ---- iti ca svatrantracidrūpapramātṛviśrāntatve sarvametadyujyate nānyathā , iti //16//
GSP30abhiprvu:3928: tarhi kāryakāraṇayostādātmyavādināṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ mate sā saṃbhavatyeva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3933: yadi bījasyāṅkuraḥ svbhāvastarhi aṅkura eva na bījaṃ syāt kiṃcit viparyayo vā syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3934: ---- iti kiṃ kāraṇaṃ kiṃ vā kāryam ;
GSP30abhiprvu:3938: nanvevamapi bījamaṅkurādivicitramavabhātaṃ dīrghadīrghaparāmarśaśālibhiḥ srotovadavicchinnasvarūpameva nirbādhaṃ pratyavamṛśyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:3945: bhāgābhiniveśavaśāt tu kāraṇakāryatāparikalpanaṃ tasyaiva bhāvasya viśasanaprāyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3948: tathā syāt kartṛtaivaivaṃ tathāpariṇamat tayā // Ipk_2,4.18 //
GSP30abhiprvu:3949: iha dīrghadarśinā pratyakṣānumānāgamānyatamapramāṇamūlāṃ pratyabhijñāmāśritya tadevedaṃ sukhaduḥkhamohasāmyamanantaprakāravaiṣamyāvalambanena viśvībhūtam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3951: tatra pratyabhijñānabalena yadekātmakamekasvabhāvaṃ tasya yo bhedo'nyānyarūpatā iyameva sā kriyocyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3953: te hi anyānyasvabhāvā yugapat na bhānti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3955: yata evaṃ kriyā tathā iti tena prakāreṇa pradhānādeḥ kriyāviśeṣalakṣaṇena kartṛtaiva syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3957_0: yato hetoḥ tathā iti tena tena mahadādiprakāreṇa satatameva krimikāṃ tathābhāsanarūpāṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:3957_1: pariṇāmalakṣaṇāṃ kriyāmāviśataḥ pariṇamattā kiṃcidrūpaṃ parivarjya tyaktvā vyāvartyamanuvartanīyaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:3964: evamityabhinnarūpasya dharmiṇaḥ satatapravahaddharmabhedasaṃbhedasvātantryalakṣaṇaṃ pariṇamanakriyākartṛkatvaṃ yaduktaṃ tat pradhānāderna yuktaṃ jaḍatvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3965: jaḍo hi nāma pariniṣṭhitasvabhāvaḥ prameyapadapatitaḥ sa ca rūpabhedādbhinno vyavasthāpanīyo nīlapītādivat ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3967: na tu sa eva svabhāvo bhinnaścābhinnaśca bhavitumarhati vidhiniṣedhayorekatraikadā virodhāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:3970: dvau tarhi imau svabhāvāvekasya svabhāvasya bhavetām ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3973: iti nyāyāt / evaṃ jaḍasya idam iti pariniṣṭhitāmāsatayā sarvataḥ paricchinnarūpatvena prameyapadapatitasya nāyaṃ svabhāvabheda ekatve satyupapadyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:3974: yattu prameyadaśāpatitaṃ na bhavati kiṃ tu cidrūpatayā prakāśaparamārtharūpaṃ cidekasvabhāvaṃ svaccham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3977: na ca rajatadvicandrādi yathā śuktikaikacandrarūpatirodhānena vartate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3979: darpaṇasya hi tathāvabhāse darpaṇataiva sutarāmunmīlati ---- nirmalo'yamutkṛṣṭo 'yaṃ darpaṇaḥ ityabhimānāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:3980: na hi parvato bāhyastatra saṃkrāmati svadeśatyāgaprasaṅgādasya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3983: na paścāt tatrādarśanāt dūratayaiva ca bhāsanāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3984: na ca tannipatanotphalitapratyāvṛttāścākṣuṣā mayūsvāḥ parvatameva gṛhṇanti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3988: ---- iti cidrūpasyaiva kartṛtvamupapannam . abhinnasya bhedāveśasahiṣṇutvena kriyāśaktyāveśasaṃbhavāt //19//
GSP30abhiprvu:3989: nanvetāvatā vijñānameva brahmarūpamimāṃ viśvarūpatāvaicitrīṃ parigṛhṇātu kimīśvaratākalpanena ityāśaṅkyāha
GSP30abhiprvu:3994: ---- iti na saṃgacchate brahmaṇo hi vidyaikarūpasya kathamavidyārūpatā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3995: na cānyaḥ kaścitasti vastuto jīvādiryasyāvidyā bhavet /
GSP30abhiprvu:4004: ---- iti cet saṃvedatiraskāriṇī kā khalu yuktirnāma ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4018: viparītasaṃvedanodaya eva hi bādho nānyaḥ kaścit /
GSP30abhiprvu:4021: bhāsanamavadhīrya āgamapramāṇako 'yamabhedaḥ ---- iti cet āgamo 'pi bhedātmaka eva vastubhūtaḥ pramātṛpramāṇaprameyavibhāgaśca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4023: tasmāt vāstavaṃ cidekatvamabhyupagamyāpi tasya kartṛtvalaks.aṇā bhinnarūpasamāveśātmikā kriyā nopapadyate ;
GSP30abhiprvu:4024: parāmarśasvarūpaṃ tu svātantryaṃ yadi bhavati tadopapadyate sarvam /
GSP30abhiprvu:4028: ityatra / tena svātmarūpameva viśvaṃ satyarūpaṃ prakāśātmatāparamārthamatruṭitaprakāśābhedameva sat prakāśaparamārthenaiva bhedena bhāsayati maheśvaraḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4036: cikīrṣārūpeṇa nirmātavyābhedaparāmarśātmanā vinā ekā cāsau kriyā kathaṃ bhinnayoḥ svabhāvabhūtā bhavet /
GSP30abhiprvu:4038: kārakāntarāṇyapi tu ekakartṛtvānupraveśīni paramārthato'nyathā karaṇādau bhinne kārakavrāte kathamabhinnā sā /
GSP30abhiprvu:4039: yadi vā ābhāsena yau bhinnau jaḍacetanau tayoryā cikīrṣā ekasyeṣyamāṇatā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4041: yadvā ābhāsabhinnayoḥ ahamidam iti yaḥ parāmarśa ekaviśrāntirūpaścikīrṣātmā taṃ vinā , ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:4042: ābhāsabhinnayorekaparāmarśaṃ vinā cikīrṣālakṣaṇā kathaṃ kriyā , ---- iti vā /
GSP30abhiprvu:4043: evaṃ kriyāṃ vā cikīrṣāṃ vā parāmarśaṃ vā apekṣya ṣ.aṣṭhī ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4048: yathā na jaḍasya kāraṇatā na kartṛtā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4050: ityanenaiva hetutāprakāreṇedaṃ jātaṃ yat ya eva tathā cikīrṣustasyaiva sā cikīrṣā bahiṣparyantatāṃ prāptā kriyā ityabhidhīyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4051: saiva ca kartṛtā tadeva ca hetutvaṃ nānyat kiṃcit /
GSP30abhiprvu:4052: tena ghaṭastiṣṭhati ityayamarthaḥ ---- ghaṭātmanā tiṣṭhāsuḥ svātantryāt sthānamabhyupagacchan na tu tadrūpamasahamāno yo maheśvaraḥ prakāśaḥ sa tiṣṭhati ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:4053: ghaṭapaṭādyābhāsarūpaṃ yatkila jagat tadātmanā yaḥ tathā iti tena tena tajjagadgatajanmasthityādibhāvavikāratadbhedakriyāsahasrarūpeṇa yaḥ sthātumicchuḥ svatantraḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4054: tasya yā evamiti vicitrarūpecchā saiva kriyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4056: tena maheśvara eva bhagavān viśvakartā , ---- iti śivam //21//
GSP30abhiprvu:4065: yadantarbhāti tattvānāṃ cakraṃ taṃ saṃstumaḥ śivam //}
GSP30abhiprvu:4067: athedaṃ vaktavyaṃ kriyā nāma viśvapadārthāvabhāsalakṣaṇā ityuktaṃ samanantarameva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4068: ke ca te viśve padārthāḥ , iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:4069: tatrābhāsarūpā eva jaḍacetanalakṣaṇāḥ padārthāste ca kriyatā rūpeṇa saṃgṛhyante ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4072: na hi yadyadasti tatra tatra liṅgavyāptyādigrahaṇasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:4074: iti tadanusāreṇa padārthanirṇayaṃ viśvaprameyīkaraṇapratilabdhatadviśvottīrṇapramātṛpadahṛdayaṅgamīkārābhiprāyeṇa nirūpayitumācārya āgamādhikāraṃ tṛtīyamārabhate /
GSP30abhiprvu:4075_0: tatra ślokaikādaśakena evamantarbahirvṛttiḥ ityādinā sthūlasūkṣmatyabhedataḥ ityantenāgamasiddhaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:4077: taṃ parameśvarāgamasiddhaṃ yuktyāpyavagataṃ pratyekatastattvagrāmaṃ darśayati ityāhnikatātparyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:4078: tatrādhikārasaṃgatiṃ yojayan pūrvapakṣapratikṣepaṃ copasaṃharan śivatattvasvarūpameva darśayitumāha
GSP30abhiprvu:4081: evamiti , yataḥ paradarśanoktaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo jaḍarūpapratiṣṭho na kathaṃcidupapannaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4082: kintu cidrūpa evāntarbahirātmanā prakāśaparamārthenāpi vapuṣā tathābhāsanarūpeṇa vartamānaḥ kālakramamākṣipan kriyābhidhīyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4088_1: yat tadupadeśabhāvanādiṣu tathābhāsamānamanābhāsamapi vastutaḥ śivatattvamityuktaṃ bhavati //1 //
GSP30abhiprvu:4089: nanyevaṃbhūtaṃ śivatattvaṃ cet tarhi tato'natiricyamānamidaṃ viśvamiti kimanyat tattvaṃ syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:4090: ekacittattvaviśrāntau ca tattvānāṃ kathaṃ kramo bhavet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4095: yadyapyekameva śivatattvaṃ tathāpi tadīyameva svātaṃtryaṃ svātmani svarūpabhedaṃ tāvatpratibimbakalpatayā darśayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:4098: tataścāntarī jñānarūpā yā daśā tasyā udrekābhāsane sādākhyam sadākhyāyāṃ bhavam /
GSP30abhiprvu:4103: bahirbhāvasya kriyāśaktimayasya paratve udrikābhāse sati pārameśvaraṃ parameśvaraśabdavācyamīśvaratattvaṃ nāma /
GSP30abhiprvu:4107: ---- iti bhinnānāṃ vargāṇāṃ vargīkaraṇanimittaṃ yadekamavibhaktaṃ bhāti tattattvam /
GSP30abhiprvu:4108: yathā girivṛkṣapuraprabhṛtīnāṃ nadīsaraḥsāgarādīnāṃ ca pṛthivīrūpatvamabrūpatvaṃ ceti /
GSP30abhiprvu:4111: tathā saṃhāre ca dhvaṃsonmukhatayā tathābhūtameva cakāsti pratibimbaprāyatayā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4112: tasya caitanyavargasya tādṛśi bhāvarāśau tathāpravanaṃ nāma yaccidviśeṣatvaṃ tatsadāśivatattvam /
GSP30abhiprvu:4113: mantreśvarādirūpasya tu caitanyarāśeḥ sphuṭībhūtamasmadbahiśkaraṇasaraṇisaṃprāptabhāvavargapratimaṃ viśvaṃ pratibimbakalpatayā bhāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4115: yastu sadāśivabhaṭṭāraka īśvarabhaṭṭārakaśca dhveyopāsyādirūpatayā sa brahmaviṣṇutulyaḥ pṛthageva mantavyo na tu nāmasārūpyāt bhramitavyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:4116: yathāhureke brahmaviṣṇurudrā api tattvamadhye kiṃ na gaṇitāḥ iti //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:4129: parameśvarasya hi paramārthata etāḥ śaktayo yastattvagrāmaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4130: kācittu śaktiranyabahutaraśaktikroḍīkāraṃ kurvatī nikaṭatvādupāsyā ghaṭasyeva ghaṭatvātmikā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4132: evaṃ nimeṣonmeṣaśaktī eva sadāśiveśvarau tayostvadhiṣṭhātṛdevate api tathānāme //
GSP30abhiprvu:4136: sa ca svaprakāśamātre punarananyonmukharūpe viśrāmyati paramārthataḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:4137: tatrādye vimarśaṃ śivatattvam dvitīye vidyeśatā madhyate tu rūpe ahamidam iti samadhṛtatulāpuṭanyāyena yo vimarśaḥ sa sadāśivanātha īśvarabhaṭṭārake ca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4139: ye ete aham iti idam iti dhiyau tayormāyāpramātari pṛthagadhikaraṇatvam aham iti grāhake idam iti ca grāhye ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4140: tannirāsenaikasminnevādhikaraṇe yatsaṃgamanaṃ saṃbandharūpaṃ prathanaṃ tat satī śuddhā vidyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4142: tatra yadā aham ityasya yadadhikaraaṇaṃ cinmātrarūpaṃ tatraivedamaṃśamullāsayati tadā tasyāsphuṭatvāt sadāśivatā ahamidam iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:4143: idamaham iti tu idamityaṃśe sphuṭībhūte 'dhikaraṇe yadāhamaṃśavimarśaṃ niṣiñcati tadeśvaratā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4152: ata evedamityevaṃbhūtenocitena parāmarśenopapannānāṃ parāmṛśyamānānāṃ bhāvānāṃ bodha eva prakāśātmā sārarūpaṃ vastu ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4154: tadeṣāṃ yadeva pāramārthikaṃ rūpaṃ tatraiva prarūḍhatvāt ahamodamityasya śuddhavedanarūpatvam //4//
GSP30abhiprvu:4161: atra ca tattvadvaye bhāvānāṃ dhyāmalādhyāmalarūpāṇāmubhayāṃśasparśāt parāparatvamiti /
GSP30abhiprvu:4163: yā tu tanniṣṭhasaṃvedanadaśā sā śuddhā vidyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4165: evamekeṣāṃ mate aham ityācchādako yo bhāgaḥ tatprathāpradhānā śuddhavidyā /
GSP30abhiprvu:4168: anyathā hi sa idamaṃśaḥ kena bhāsyatāṃ māyāyāstatrābhāvāt bhāve vā prarohaprasaṅgāt ;
GSP30abhiprvu:4169: ata eveyaṃ prarohāsahiṣṇuṃ yata idantāṃ bhāsayati tataḥ śuddhā /
GSP30abhiprvu:4174: māyāśaktyeva sā vidyetyanye vidyeśvarā yathā // Ipk_3,1.6 //
GSP30abhiprvu:4176: cinmātra eva pramātari kartari ca sati cidekarūpaṣvapi bhāveṣu yadacidrūpatayā bhedaprakāśanalakṣaṇaṃ svātantryaṃ sā śuddhavidyā māyāśaktyā tulyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4181: te hi śuddhacinmātragṛhītāhaṃ bhāvāḥ svatastu bhinnaṃ vedyaṃ paśyanti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4183: evaṃ grāhake'ṃśataścaitanyarūpāt paramārtharūpe grāhyaviparyāsanaśaktiḥ śuddhavidyā vidyeśvarāṇām //6//
GSP30abhiprvu:4189: grāhakagrāhyobhayaviparyāsasaṃskāre tu avinivṛtte'pi yadetat vastuparamārthaprathanaṃ tatra vidyāśaktivyāpāro yogijñāniprabhṛtiṣvapaśupramātṛṣu /
GSP30abhiprvu:4193_1: satyapi jāte pūrvoktayuktibalena yadetadaiśvaryamuktaṃ tasya yā prakāśikā parameśvaraśaktiḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:4193_2: ---- yadvaśāt kecideva tā yuktīrādṛtya tadā śvastahṛdayāḥ kṛtino bhavanti ---- sā vidyāśaktiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:4198: māyāśaktiḥ punaracidrūpe śūnyādau pramātṛtābhimānaṃ prarūḍhaṃ dadhrtā bhāvānapi cinmayān bhedenābhimānayantī sarvathaiva svarūpaṃ tirodhatte āvṛṇute vimohinī sā /
GSP30abhiprvu:4204: śūnye buddhe śarīre vā māyāśaktirvijṛmbhate // Ipk_3,1.8 //
GSP30abhiprvu:4205: suṣupte pralaye na ityabhāvasamādhau ca tāvacchūnyamākāśakalpamanātmarūpaṃ vedyabhāvocitam aham ityātmatvena vīkṣyate ;
GSP30abhiprvu:4207: svacchodakāśayakalpā vedyapratibimbanavatī vā buddhirabhiniviśyate antarahaṃ vedmi duḥkhyahamiti cintādyavasthāsu ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4208: śarīrameva tu pṛthivīprāyaṃ kṛśo'hamityādidaśāsu ahamityātmatayā bhāti /
GSP30abhiprvu:4209: sarvameva cedaṃ śūnyādi vastutaścinmātrasārameva māyayaiva tāvadacidrūpatayā bhāsitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:4210: tathāvidhameva tu sat ahamiti saṃvidrūpatābhiniveśasthānaṃ saṃpāditamapraśāntajaḍabhāvameva iti atiduṣkaravastusaṃpādanāpratīghātarūpā parameśvarasya māyāśaktiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4216: yaś ca pramātā śūnyādiḥ prameye vyatirekiṇi /
GSP30abhiprvu:4217: mātā sa meyaḥ san kālādikapañcakaveṣṭitaḥ // Ipk_3,1.9 //
GSP30abhiprvu:4219: tathāhi sati prameyamapyasya nīlādivyatiriktatayā naiva bhāseta /
GSP30abhiprvu:4221: sa yāvadeva svarūpādvyatirekābhimate nīlādau prameye pramātā tāvadeva svayamapi meyabhūtaḥ eva san mātā /
GSP30abhiprvu:4225: parimitatvaṃ ca śūnyāderahaṃbhāvasya yat tadeva kālādipañcakam . tathā hi kālaḥ kramamāsūtrayan pramātari vijṛmbhamāṇastadanusāreṇa prameye 'pi prasarati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4226: yo'haṃ kṛśo'bhavaṃ sa sthūlo varte bhaviṣyāmi sthūlataraḥ ityevamātmānaṃ deharūpaṃ kramavantamiva parāmṛśaṃstatsahacāriṇi prameye'pi bhūtādirūpaṃ kramaṃ prakāśayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:4227: asya śūnyāderjaḍasya vidyā kiṃcijjhatvonmīlanarūpā buddhidarpaṇasaṃkrāntaṃ bhāvarāśiṃ nīlasukhādiṃ vivinakti /
GSP30abhiprvu:4231: atra cāṃśe tukye'pi kiṃcittve kasmādidameva kiṃcit ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4232: ---- ityatrārthe'bhiṣvaṅgarūpaḥ pramātari dehādau prameye ca guṇādyāropaṇamaya iva rāgo vyāpriyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:4234: taddhi sthūlaṃ vṛddhasya pramadāyāṃ na bhavedapi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4237: atraiva kasmādabhiṣvaṅga ---- ityayamartho niyatyā niyamyate iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:4239: idaṃ kurvāṇo'tra rakto'traiva ca yaḥ so 'ham ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:4251: yat kāryakaraṇarūpaṃ trayoviṃśatiprakāraṃ yacca tasya mūlabhūtaṃ kāraṇaṃ sarvakāryakaraṇāvibhāgarūpaṃ pradhānaṃ nāma tatsarvaṃ meyam ---- iti sambandhaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:4256: ---- iti pramātṛśaktisvabhāvatvāt na prameyatvenehāvasare māyāpramātṛcyatiriktaprameyaprastāve gaṇitāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:4257: vastuto hi atratyo'yaṃ pramātāpi prameya eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4259: nanvatra trayoviṃśatau kiṃ kāryaṃ kiṃ karaṇam ?
GSP30abhiprvu:4275: ---- bahirviṣayaḥ yat tatra pāṇiḥ pāyuḥ pādaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4301: atra pṛthivyādyābhāsā eva miśrībhūya ghaṭādisvalakṣaṇībhūtāḥ karmendriyairupasarpitāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4316_0: evaṃ tattvarāśau nirṇīte etadantarbhāvenoltamapi mukhyatayā nirṇetavyaṃ pramātṛtattvaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:4316_1: vitatya nirṇetuṃ tatraitanmātṛtāmātra ityādi vyānoviśvātmakaḥ paraḥ ityantairviṃśatiślokairāhnikāntaraṃ prastūyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:4318: sa hi heyamupādeyaṃ ca svaṃ svabhāvaṃ vidvān paramopādeyarūpaṃ śivasvabhāvaṃ svātmānamabhedenāviśan jīvanneva mukto bhavati , ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:4328: tatreti , evaṃbhūte 'sminnāgamasiddhe yuktyanugate ca tattvasvarūpe sati yadetat kālādipañcakaveṣṭitaṃ pramātṛtārūpam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4329_0: tadeva yasyāṃ śuddhamupasaṃhṛtaprameyajātaṃ bhavati daśāyāṃ saṃhārākhyāyāṃ tasyāmadhiṣṭhātṛdevatātvaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:4329_2: ca bhajamāno bhaṭṭāraka īśvara eva rudro bhagavān ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4331: bhinnasya tu prameye tatsaṃtānapravahaṇalakṣaṇe prasare 'dhiṣṭhātṛdevatā viṣṇuḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4332: ata eva tayoḥ prameyaprasararūpasya idaṃ nīlam ityevaṃ prakāśātmanaḥ prādhānyāt aham iti pramātṛdaśāveśaśūnyatvāt na tṛtīyanetronmīlanam /
GSP30abhiprvu:4335: yadetanmātṛtāmātramuktaṃ tasya vibhāgamāgamikaṃ ca saṃjñābhedaṃ nirūpayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:4341: ata eva karmāṇi svātmano bandhakānyabhimanyamāna eṣa iti kālādiveṣṭitaḥ śūnyādipramātā saṃsarati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4345: vidyayā tu svarūpaprakāśanaśaktyā pratyabhijñāpadaṃ prāpitamaiśvarayaṃ yasya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4346: ata eva śarīrādyapi viśvamapi ca saṃvedanamevābhimanyamāno'ta eva cideva ghanā anvācidrūpavyāmiśraṇaśūnyā yasya rūpam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4347: sa punarjanmabandhavirahāt dehe 'pi sthite mukta iti vyapadeśayogyaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:4348: patite tu śiva ekaghanaḥ iti kaḥ kuto muktaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:4351: yaścāsau muktaḥ sa bhāvān svāṅgavadabhimanyamānaḥ pramimīte iti sa teṣāṃ svāmī ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4353: māyāśaktikṛtabhedān vyatiriktāneva sato yadā mimīte tadā taireva meyaiḥ pāśarūpaiḥ pāśitaḥ iti paśuruktaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:4364: kartaryabodhe kārmaṃ tu māyāśaktyaiva tattrayam // Ipk_3,2.5 //
GSP30abhiprvu:4366: tasyāpahāro nāmāṇavaṃ malaṃ yenāsāvaṇuḥ saṃkucito jātaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:4368: tatsthite bodharūpe kartṛtvalakṣaṇasya svātantryātmanaḥ svarūpāntarasya nimīlanaṃ viparyayo vā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4370: atraiveti , satyāṇave male dviprakāre svarūpasaṃkoce vṛtte bhinnasya yatprathanaṃ tasya māyīyam iti saṃjñāmātram /
GSP30abhiprvu:4372: tatra karturabodharūpasya dehāderbhinnavedyaprathane sati dharmādharmarūpaṃ kārmaṃ malam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4373: yato janma bhogaśca sa ca niyatāvadhikaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4376: athaiṣāṃ malānāṃ viviktaviṣayanirūpaṇāt svarūpaṃ sphuṭīkartuṃ svātanryahānirbodhasya ityasya tāvadviṣayamāha /
GSP30abhiprvu:4378: nirmitāḥ svātmano bhinnā bhartrā te kartṛtātyayāt // Ipk_3,2.6 //
GSP30abhiprvu:4379: yeṣāṃ cinmātrameva paramārtho na tu aham iti svātmaviśrāntyānandarūpaṃ pramaṃ svātantryam /
GSP30abhiprvu:4380: te parmeśvareṇa tayā nirmitāḥ svātmanaḥ sakāśādvyatiriktāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:4381: atra hetuḥ ---- kartṛtāyā uttamasvātanryalakṣaṇāyā atyayāt abhāvāt ;
GSP30abhiprvu:4384: nanvasmāddhetorbhavatu parameśvarāt teṣāṃ bhinnatvamanyonyatastu kathaṃ bhedo bodharūpasya vyāpitvanityatvakṛtasya ca deśakālābhedasya samābatvāt ;
GSP30abhiprvu:4385: anyonyabhedābhāve ca nirmitāste iti kathaṃ bahuvacanam ?
GSP30abhiprvu:4389: iha hi sarvatrāpratihataśaktiḥ parameśvara eva tayābubhūsaṃstathā tathā bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4395: ---- ityādau vijñānaṃ bodhātmakaṃ rūpaṃ kevalaṃ svātantryavirahitameṣāmiti //7//
GSP30abhiprvu:4396: evaṃ svātantryahānirbodhasya ityasya bhāgasya vijñānākalaviṣayatāmuktvā svātantryasyāpyabodhatā ityamumaṃśaṃ viṣayapradarśanena spaṣṭayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:4398: teṣāṃ kārmo malo'pyasti māyīyastu vikalpitaḥ // Ipk_3,2.8 //
GSP30abhiprvu:4400: yadi vā prāṇe buddhau vā yeṣāṃ ahamiti camatkārayogāt kartṛtvaṃ te pralayena kṛtāḥ akalāḥ kalātattvopalakṣitakaraṇakāryarahitā abodharūpāḥ kartāraśca /
GSP30abhiprvu:4401: pralayāvadhi hi te tathākṛtāḥ uttarakālaṃ tu kāryakaraṇasaṃbaddhā eva bhavanti ;
GSP30abhiprvu:4403: ava eva malo yāvat kārmo 'pi vāsanāsaṃskārarūpo dharmādharmātmāstyeva /
GSP30abhiprvu:4407: tena māyīyo mala eṣāṃ vikalpito vyavasthitaviṣayatvena /
GSP30abhiprvu:4408: tathā hi ---- ke'pi śūnyādibhāgaviśrāntā gāḍanidrājaḍīkṛtā apavedyasuṣuptapadabhājaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:4414: adhunā punarāṇavakārmamaladvayābhāve'pi śuddho'sti māyākhyasya malasya viṣayaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4418: ye cinmātramevātmatayā paśyanti aham iti ca camatkārollāsāt kartārastata eva sarvajñāḥ sarvakartāraśca te vidyeśvarāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:4419: kintu tanukaraṇabhuvanādi yadeṣāṃ vedyatayā kāryatayā ca bhāti,
GSP30abhiprvu:4422: atha malatrayasyāpi yaugapadyena yo viṣayastaṃ darśayitumāha /
GSP30abhiprvu:4423: devādīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ bhavināṃ trividhaṃ malam /
GSP30abhiprvu:4427: ye tvete māyātattvāntarālaparivartino devādayaḥ sthāvarāntāśvaturdaśa śāstreṣu parigaṇitāste sarve bhavinaḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4429: nanu malatrayamadhye katamo malaḥ saṃsaraṇameṣāṃ saṃpādayet ?
GSP30abhiprvu:4430: āha , tatrāpi teṣu triṣvapi satsu kārmaṃ malaṃ mukhyatayā saṃnipatya saṃsaraṇe kāraṇam . yathoktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:4432: iti / tanukaraṇaviṣayasaṃbandha eva ca vartamāno bhaviṣyaṃśca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4434: āṇavamāyāmalau tu yadyapi na kāraṇaṃ saṃsāre ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4436: ---- iti mukhyaṃ kārmameva malaṃ saṃsārakāraṇaṃ tatra tatra śāstre gaṇyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:4450: etacceti , yat tridaśādīnāṃ bhavināṃ caitanyaṃ kartṛtāṃśasya prādhānyānmalena saṃvidbhāgasya nimajjitatvāt kartṛtāmayam cidrūpasya tattvaṃ svātantryam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4463: vidadhatā tataḥ śūnyādeḥ prameyādunmajjyevāsyate tadā turyātītāvasthā /
GSP30abhiprvu:4466: seyaṃ dvayyapi jīvanmuktāvasthā samāveśa ityuktā śāstre /
GSP30abhiprvu:4473: ityādi ca / samāveśapallavā eva ca prasiddhadehādipramātṛbhāgaprahvībhāvabhāvanānuprāṇitāḥ parameśvarastutipraṇāmapūjādhyānasamādhiprabhṛtayaḥ karmaprapañcāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:4478: tadetadāha --- yat punaḥ kartṛtāyā mukhyatvaṃ tannāntarīyakaśca śūnyāderguṇabhāvaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4479_1: cito yaḥ paro'pyātmabhāgo bodhalakṣaṇo malena nyakkṛto'bhūt tasyāpi adhunonmagnatvena mukhyatvam /
GSP30abhiprvu:4482: tadetanmukhyatvaṃ samāveśasya lakṣaṇaṃ yena dehasthito'pi patiḥ iti muktaḥ iti śāstreṣūktaḥ //12//
GSP30abhiprvu:4483: nanvevaṃ patyuḥ samāveśātmikā turyatadatītarūpā bhavatu daśā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4492: iha cittattvaṃ svasvarūpamācchādayat jñeyarūpeṇa buddhyādinā dehāntena ghaṭādinā vābhāsate /
GSP30abhiprvu:4494: na tvatra vāstavaḥ kramo vā bhedo vā /
GSP30abhiprvu:4496_1: yadā viśrāmyati tadanudayādvā tatpradhvaṃsādvā pralaya iva tadanādaraṇādvā nidrāsamādhimūrcchādāviva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4497: tatraiva cāhantārūpaṃ kartṛtāyāḥ padaṃ parāmarśo 'sphuṭatvādarūpātmanā saṃskāreṇa śuddhena vedyapadavīmaprāptena yukto bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4498: tadā saivāvasthā netyevaparāmarśaleśānapekṣitaniṣedhyabuddhyādiviṣayasuspaṣṭaparāmarśasaṃbhedāpi avaśyaṃbhāviniṣedhyayogāt akiñcano'ham itivat svīkṛtasāmānyākāraniṣedhyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4502: iyameva hi sarvatrābhāvo na tu satāṃ sarvātmanā vināśaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:4503: tatraiva śūnye pramātari samavetā prāṇāpānasamānodānavyānātmake vāyucakre preraṇātmikā śaktiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4504: sā ca vidyākalayoḥ prapañcabhūtau yau krameṇa buddhīndriyakarmentriyavargau tayorāntarī vṛttiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:4507: iti / evaṃ śūnya evāhantā akṣacakropodvalitā jīvanam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4508: iti sa śūnya eva jīvaḥ saṃsarati /
GSP30abhiprvu:4509: yadi vendriyaśaktīnāmeva yāntarī sādhāraṇaprāṇanātmikā prāṇaśabdavācyā prāṇādimārutaviśeṣapreraṇāmayī saiva aham ityadhiśayānā jīvanam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4513: prāṇādipañcakaṃ buddhīndriyavargaḥ karmendriyagaṇo niścayātmikā ca yato dhīrvyajyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:4519: evaṃ yadubhayātmakaṃ puryaṣṭakaṃ tāvatyeva śuddhe yā viśrāntiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4520: tasyāṃ satyāṃ yadahantāyāḥ suṣuptāyā bodhalakṣaṇaṃ bhāvarūpaṃ karma ca kriyāsvabhāvaṃ tat sauṣuptam /
GSP30abhiprvu:4521: malena hi pramātā suptaḥ kalayā tvasupta iva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4522: atra tannimajjane suṣṭhu suptastasya bhāvaḥ karma vā , ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:4525: prāṇasuṣupte tu sparśakṛtasya sukhaduḥkhāderbhāvāt māyākhyamasti malam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4542: spaṣṭāvabhāsā bhāvānāṃ sṛṣṭiḥ svapnapadaṃ matam // Ipk_3,2.16 //
GSP30abhiprvu:4544: sṛṣṭiḥ sādhāraṇī sarvapramātḥṇāṃ sa jāgaraḥ // Ipk_3,2.17 //
GSP30abhiprvu:4546: na ca teṣu nimīliteṣu bāhyendriyagrahaṇavyāpāro dṛṣṭaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4547: tena śuddha eva manomārge rūpasparśādayo bhāvā akṣagrahaṇasamucitena spaṣṭena vapuṣā bhāsanayogyāḥ parmeśvareṇa sṛjyante ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4551: ata eva manomātrasthitatvādeva na pramātrantarasādhāraṇīyaṃ sṛṣṭiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:4557: yāni hi pramātrantarāṇi svapne sventriyāṇi ca bhānti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4568: evaṃbhūtā yā sṛṣṭiḥ sā paśoḥ svapnasamaye bhāvāt svapnapadaṃ svapnakāle viṣayaḥ iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4569: tathābhūtaviṣayaṃ pramātṛttvaṃ paśoḥ svapnāvasthā iti yāvat /
GSP30abhiprvu:4571: yatra tu bāhyākṣavi.ayaṃ sarvapramātṛsādhāraṇatvaṃ ca niścayānuvṛttyā bādhārahitayā paramārthatvena cakāsti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4572: tata eva sthairya viṣayasya sā sṛṣṭiḥ paśoḥ jāgaraḥ ;
GSP30abhiprvu:4577: svapne 'pi dīrghe yatra svapnāntaraṃ sa tadapekṣayā jāgradeva ;
GSP30abhiprvu:4578: jāgradabhimatamapi vā dīrghadīrghaṃ kālāntare niścayānuvṛttinirpdhājjāgradantarāpekṣayā svapna eveti mantavyam //17//
GSP30abhiprvu:4579: āsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ heyatvapradarśanena turyāvasthātaḥ prabhṛtyupādeyatvaṃ sūcayati
GSP30abhiprvu:4588: tadā tasmin guṇībhūte prāṇādeḥ prādhānyaṃ sphurati /
GSP30abhiprvu:4589: tathā ca tasya cidrūpasya yathāyathā hānistathātathā duḥkhopacayo ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4594: yastu samāveśatattvajñastasya tatkāle duḥkhānudaya eva / yadāha
GSP30abhiprvu:4597: iti / evaṃ prāṇādeḥ prādhānye kartṛtāyā guṇabhāve sukhaduḥkhavaicitryaśatayogaḥ prayāsabhūmiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4601: ekarasānandaghanasvabhāvalābhe upāditsā -- jihāsā -- vaivaśya -- pariśrama-- praśamāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4603: nanu prāṇādiprādhānyaṃ heyatāyāṃ kāraṇamuktaṃ taccejjāgradāditraya eva tarhi turyādau tadabhāvāt tatsamāveśe vyutthāmānupapattiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4606: tacchedātmā samānākhyaḥ sauṣupte viṣuvatsv iva // Ipk_3,2.19 //
GSP30abhiprvu:4609: prāṇa iti prāṇāpānarūpā jīvanasvabhāvā yeyaṃ cidrūpasya sthitiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4611: dehaprāṇāderacetanasya cetanāyamānatāsaṃpādanātmikā ahamitisvātranryāropasārā satī vikalpaparāmarśamayī saiva prāṇāpānādiviśeṣātmanā pañcarūpatāṃ bhajate /
GSP30abhiprvu:4612: tatra kiñcijjahatī kvacitpatantī ca śvāsaniḥśvāsarūpā krameṇa prāṇatvamapānatvaṃ ca viśeṣaṃ darśyati /
GSP30abhiprvu:4613: tadidaṃ viśeṣadvayaṃ jāgrati tāvat sphuṭameva dehāt prasṛtya viṣeye viśrānteḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4615: smṛtyādau vābhyantare vedye viśrānteḥ prāṇāpānayoḥ suspaṣṭatvāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:4617: svapato 'pi hi prāṇāpānau nirgamapraveśātmānau sphuṭameva pareṇa lakṣyete /
GSP30abhiprvu:4618: svayameva ca vedya saṃvedanāt tyāgopādānarūpā sthitiḥ saṃvedyata eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4622: tadeva tu yadā sutarāṃ puṣṭaṃ bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4627: tathāpi tayormadhye yā viśrāntihṛdayasadane nirindriye pradeśe tadeva mukhyataḥ suṣuptamiti /
GSP30abhiprvu:4628: tatra prāṇāpānayoryaśchedo viśrāntiḥ kaṃcitkālaṃ tadātmā sakalarasādivargasyordhvādharatiryakṣu samānīkaraṇavyāpārātmā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4629: tata eva hṛtpadmavikāsadānādbhuktapītajaraṇakārī samāno dinarātrirūpayoḥ prāṇāpānayoḥ kaṃcitkālaṃ sāmyādvicchedācca viṣuvatkālatulyaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:4633: upamāne vatereva cāvyavatvam uddhato nivataḥ iti prayogāt ;
GSP30abhiprvu:4637: tatra ca viṣuvati vicchidyamānasya prāṇāpānasya saṃskārarūpatayā sadbhāvaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4638: saiva hi vicchedo na tu sarvātmanā nāśo'sti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4642: yadā tu sā prāṇanāvṛttirvāmadakṣiṇamārgau khilībhāvayantī madhyarūpeṇordhvena pravahati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4643: tadā tatpravahaṇaṃ sakalasya bhedasyābhedasāratādānalakṣaṇaṃ vilāpanamāśyānasyeva sarpiṣo vidadhatī udānavṛttirvijñānākalādārabhya sadāśivāntam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4647: vilīne tu bhede sarvavedyarāśirūpatattvabhūtabhuvanavargātmaladehavyāpanarūpeṇa prāṇavṛttirvyānarūpā viśvātmakaparamaśovpcitā turyātītarūpā /
GSP30abhiprvu:4648: prāṇa eva pramātā prāṇāpānarūpaḥ samānarūpa udānarūpo vyānarūpaśca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4653_0: yadyapi turyatadatītayorapyasti prāṇanā ---- anyathā jīvatvasya vyutthānasya cānupapatteḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:4654: suṣuptādau tu saṃskārarūpatvāsphuṭavedyollāsasphuṭavedyāvabhāsarūpasya bhedasya vidyamānatvāt asti sukhaduḥkhādivaicitryam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4667: ātmānaṃ yaḥ prathayate bhaktānāṃ taṃ stumaḥ śivam //}
GSP30abhiprvu:4668_1: vitatya nirṇītaṃ tadeva saṃkṣepeṇa śiṣyabuddhiṣu niveśayitumāgamārthagrahaṃ ślokāṣṭādaśakena
GSP30abhiprvu:4668_2: darśayati svātmaiva sarvajantūnām ityādinā utpalenopapāditā ityantenaikenāhnikena /
GSP30abhiprvu:4669: tatra 'lsokena pāramārthikaṃ rūpamuktvā ślokanavakena bandhasvarūpaṃ pramātṛprameyatattvadarśanadiśā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4677: idamiti hi jaḍaparāmarśo'hamiti saṃvitparāmarśa eva viśrāmyati /
GSP30abhiprvu:4678: tataśca jaḍā nirātmāna iti jantava eva jīvāḥ sātmānaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4679: teṣāṃ ca maheśvara eva svātmā sa eva maheśvaro na tvanyaḥ kaścit /
GSP30abhiprvu:4681: saṃvidaśca na deśena na kālena na svarūpeṇa ko'pi bhedaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4684: ---- ityeka eva cidātmā svātantryeṇa svātmani yato vaiśvarūpyaṃ bhāsayati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4687_1: bhāvarāśerjajjñānaṃ karaṇaṃ ca tadekatra cidātmani , ---- iti //1 //
GSP30abhiprvu:4688: nanu yadyeka evāyaṃ maheśvararūpa ātmā kastarhi bandho yadavamocanāyāyamudyamaḥ ?
GSP30abhiprvu:4692: tatraivaṃ svātmani maheśvare sthite tasminneva prakāśarūpe svātmadarpaṇe tenaiva parameśvareṇa svātantryāt tāvatsṛṣṭaḥ saṃkocapuraḥsara idaṃbhāgaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4693_2: parāmarśena bhāsamānaṃ cakāsti ahaṃ devadatto 'haṃ caitra iti //2 //
GSP30abhiprvu:4699: tatra sṛṣṭau kriyānandau bhogo duḥkhasukhātmakaḥ // Ipk_4.3 //
GSP30abhiprvu:4700: satyam , paramārthato na kaścid bandhaḥ kevalaṃsvasmādanuttarāt svātantryāt yadā svātmānaṃ saṃkucitamavabhāsayati sa eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4701: tadā svasya pūrṇasya rūpasya yadaparijñānaṃ bhāsamānatve 'pyaparāmarśarūpaṃ tadeva kāraṇatvena prakṛtaṃ yasya sa pūrṇatvākhyātimātratattvaḥ puruṣaḥ ityucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:4703: sa ca pumān bhoktā sambandhanaṃ bhogalakṣaṇamanubhavati /
GSP30abhiprvu:4704: bhogaśca nāma tasya yau kalpitau kriyānandau ,
GSP30abhiprvu:4709: nanu sṛṣṭāvityanena kiṃ vyavacchedyaṃ kiṃ ca saṃgrāhyam ? ityāha ----
GSP30abhiprvu:4710: svāṅgarūpeṣu bhāveṣu patyurjñānaṃ kriyā ca yā /

GSP30abhiprvu:4743: dvayātmā tadrajo duḥkhaṃ śleṣi sattvatamomayam // Ipk_4.6 //

GSP30abhiprvu:4800: pratiprāṇisvavāsanānusāreṇa tattadvicitrasukhaduḥkhādyupayuktābhiḥ smaraṇe utprekṣaṇe saṃkalpane 'nyatrānyatra ca vikalpayoge /
